Title: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)

Who else has the same problem? and what shall we do? Also wanted to ask: as far as I know we can cancel our order in 4 days if it was not marked - in transit, but do we have all bitcoins (money) back, or SK takes it's charge?
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: juswannaschmoke on May 05, 2013, 09:39 am
I had a similar issue with theDankBank, he sent me a pm today to let me know he'd be shipping on Monday.  I think it is just because of all the craziness this past week. Think about it, bit coin crash, the ddos fucker attacking the road and tormail was down. Buyers were still getting on and making orders intermittently, I think the vendors were just overwhelmed with not having access to the road. Give him a few extra days before you cancel, he may send you something extra or heavy. Did you send him a pm?

Hey guys,

My order with TopNotch from last Wednesday is now marked at in transit.

As for other UK vendors I have tried BestOn3 and theXchange. Both were decent gear, I think I preferred BestOn3 as it was cleaner on the foil. Both sent out with good stealth and next day. Very quick like TopNotch but not as strong.

I don't IV anymore, just smoke, so I can't help you out in that regard.

I also ordered on Saturday from c63amg, he has kept me updated with messages and it was dispatched yesterday as per his details on his page. Coming from the Netherlands so maybe it will arrive this week.

Hope that helps some of you out  8)

Be safe

I try to score about £20 a day.I'm currently unemployed so coming by a lump sum of cash is rare for me atm.I used to buy 8ths and q's and sometimes halfs and make it last but since the quality went to shit about 2-3 years ago I havnt been able to buy amounts of anything decent.There are 3 dealers where I'm from that have top goods but all 3 just sell bags (0.1 btw) for £10 and you'd be lucky to get an extra one if you goto them wanting 10.
I could buy large amounts from the other 100 or so but its crap! ranging from 0/10 to 3/10 whereas the bags are 8/10 to 9/10 so I'd rather go for quality over quantity anyday.btw im a very hard marker.I hear people giving the crap gear 7/10 to 10/10 all the time and just sigh or chuckle to myself depending what mood im in.So if I say its 8/10,you'd better believe your going to be leaving holes in the duvet or blisters on your chest  ;D

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: pakchoi23 on May 07, 2013, 04:27 pm

TopNotch's gear is #3 mate.

#3 is the stuff you smoke, or if you IV it you need to add citric to make it dissolve in water.

#4 is the stuff that just dissolves into water with no citric and you can't smoke it (if it's proper #4) I call it China White not #4

If you want a #4 vendor you're going to need FrankMatthews from the Netherlands, or there are a few US /Canada vendors.

Smile Awhile has the best #4 apparently, so does King David but he only ships to the USA.

Like I said if you want UK - UK then your main choices are TN, Dispater, theXchange, and BestOn3.

1- TN
2= theXchange, BestOn3
?- Dispater; not tried yet.

If you look at the Netherlands it's c63amg or Frank Matthews.

If I was into banging up still I wuold probably do it though to try some Black Tar Heroin or some of King Davids #4.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 08, 2013, 01:55 pm
No, that's fine matrix, it's a stimulant very similar to crack when crack is IV'd, it makes you very focused, it's really clear headed. If I was at school/college or something it would be a fantastic study aid! There's the same rush you get with crack/coke, but doing brown at the same time or shortly after is like, turning up the volume on the meth to 11. You get this light headedness similar to going unconscious, if you know what that's like. I would say, it makes you feel clear and focused, and a bit determined on it's own. I much prefer crack though.

Hey sweetpoison.

To get your stats up quickly so you can order (NEVER FE!!!) why not buy  a few digital books @ ~$1.65 or try a lottery or digital goods? If you can afford to throw out $10-20 you can get your 10 transactions. Make sure you pick a good vendor though so you're not left waiting for your digital goods as your transactions to increase!

You don't have to download or open the files if you are worried about malware/viruses. Also remember not to open ANYTHING you have downloaded with TOR, when TOR is still running. It is a security risk.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Zooey on May 08, 2013, 05:03 pm

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: charas420 on May 08, 2013, 05:19 pm
NoAddedSugar.  When you wash Coke into Crack (freebase) you are turning the coke from a Salt back to a base, A salt is water soluble and the Base is not its turned into a salt to make it able to be snorted or IVed. Crack as you will know needs vitC or Citric acid to break it down, making it dissolve in the water. which is basically turning it back to a water soluble salt. Another point is that a Salt cannot be smoked as its vape temp is too high while the base vapes at a lower temp and can be smoked.
 It is the same as the difference between heroin no3 (smoking Heroin) and no4 (snorting, IV) no3 being the Base and no4 being the salt.
 You can wash H No4 back to No3 with Bicarb the same as making crack from Coke, and add citric/vitC to no3H to be able to IV it. Its all to do with the PH of the Coke/Gear.
  I hope this makes a little sense, it took me a long time to get my head around.
 Try washing a bit of Coke it really is very easy , and very difficult to fuck up.
 In answer to the question, they should be the same but IMO I think the hit from the crack when IVed is better than a coke hit and that even when they originate from the same batch of Coke. IMO Crack gives a much better high than Coke, saying that I like working on Coke and I can't say that about Crack.
C

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 08, 2013, 10:41 pm
It literally feels like the night before xmas aged about 7, as TopNotch said he posted my gear today. I hope I can sleep. I used the crack earlier, but it wasn't that good, I even ate about an hour after. There was no anxiety though, which was a plus point. It occurred to me earlier, aren't we nice and eloquent for druggies? Society sees us as the shit stain on the underwear of life, yet, we have wonderful people in our midst. I have known a few dealers in my time. I've resorted to running in the past, quite a few times too. Met the lowest of the low, been robbed, fucked over, taken advantage of (like the naive prick I was/am), but on here, I think I can find like minded people. I would really like to keep in contact with you all, because I know that there's others out there who aren't stereotypes. There's great libertarians too. If we don't keep this thread alive, I'd like to thank you all for being awesome, and I hope we can talk again. peace and love to all you fuckers, take care xxxxx

Hello brother

Yes it is nice here. It does help to remind yourself that you are not a worthless piece of shit simply because you exploit your nervous system's reward structure in a prohibited manner.

I do like the politics too. It shows that mutualism works better than imagined. Also it is odd to build a rapport with hard drug dealers. It is odd to see how much of that vile propaganda about evil drug users that we end up internalising. It is as poisonous as the finger wagging closet homosexuals who bleat so loudly about 'morality'.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 09, 2013, 12:15 pm
Nicely put AgentLee, I also haven't used the forums before until this recent mess. My TopNotch order arrived this morning, I was so happy! It's the first time I've bought the Afghan #3 from TN, I usually buy the street gear, as I had about a year break from using H and knew I didn't need amazing stuff. Today I used roughly about 0.1 in one hit. When dissolving the brown I noticed quite a lot was just floating around, so I added more citric. Still floaty stuff going on.  ??? . I didn't want to over do it with the acid, I'm quite low on good sites I can use and would prefer it if I had a few veins left to transport the red red groovy around. Anyway, I left the lumps alone and drew up what had been dissolved, injected, then I think I nearly passed out! Good god, it's strong stuff. I would recommend it to anyone who hasn't tried it. Do any of you lovely folk know about MindGuru's Pakistani #4? I might give that a go sometime. Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: sweetpoison on May 09, 2013, 10:22 pm
Hi, everybody! Yes, lets keep this tread going, so we can discuss our H and vendors and other things about SR service.
I got my H today, happy with the quality again.
2 ShiftingSands - about how to make your own H,- you buy opium and acetic anhydride ( i think there is only one vendor on SR who does it, i think he is from Polland, but i never bought from him). Disolve opium in some water in aluminum coated pan and evaporate it, so you get like a pancake at the bottom of your pan then spray it using syringe with anhydride, i'd say 0.5-1 ml of it, cover the pan with cling film, put onto small gas , you will get acetilation reaction going, leave it for some time, remove cling film, evaporate till dry, then i'd put some water into it, so all stuff at the bottom of your pan disolved and evaporate again, then put water again,-  decide yourself how much water, depending on your dosage,- 1 ml is one dose, suck the quantity into syringe, using filter (better cotton wool tightly on the needle of the syringe) - and off you go, IV :) smth like that, someone to correct me or add details?
P.S. TN's listings are still down which is sad, in his message he said - today or tomorrow, so hopefully tomorrow now :)

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: AgentLee on May 12, 2013, 12:27 pm
What a tremendous relief it is to see that TopNotch has returned. I shall be ordering a gram from him as soon as my coins drop on to SR.

I have bought a gram of the regular 3 from Beston3 - whose delivery service is frankly incredible  - but the product was relatively weak and I have torn through it like nobody's business.

On a side note I have discovered a way to buy BTC with a credit card - I paid $15 per coin over the going rate mind - but it does work.

It was buybitcoins.com if anyone cares. There is no review of this lot anywhere and I am suprised that it turned out to be entirely legitimate. The fellow even phoned me up since I was foolish enough to register under a nickname - and he was concerned that this did not match my credit card and ID.

I did a writeup in the 'security' section of this forum. Briefly the only downer is that you have to identify yourself (passport, phone number). Upside is it's fairly cheap, very quick and you can buy from anywhere in the world provided you have a credit card.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: AgentLee on May 12, 2013, 12:36 pm
Quote from: sweetpoison on May 12, 2013, 12:14 pm
I was doing lottery to get to 10 stats to be able to order from BestOne3 without being asked to FE but now i don't need that cuz TN is back
But what i've noticed is  by reading all BO3 feed backs that every so often, about once a month people who FE for 1 grm H from him don't get their order! That's odd! What do you think?

I cannot account for these no-shows. Given my experience of TopNotch I would offer - by way of baseless speculation - that perhaps he is being scammed. Are the buyers new? Do they return? I do not like making unevidenced claims - yet read on and see why I personally consider it very unlikely that TopNotch is responsible for these perceived problems.

I have never had any trouble from TopNotch. In fact, I once bought some #3 from him which was poor quality. I messaged him politely saying that his dope did not work (it didn't, sadly) and expected to be ignored.

To my amazement he replied promptly with an apology whose sincerity was underlined by the arrival the next morning of a replacement gram at no extra cost. In my long, uh, 'career' I have never known the like.

Besides this I have only bought his Afghan no. 3 and that has been consistently excellent - better even than the dope I bought from c63amg and Frank Matthews. I think his product is justifiably more expensive as it is consistently better. In every case my order has arrived the next day, so his delivery is in my experience 100% reliable. His business is built on high grade drugs sold at a premium price and I cannot therefore see the benefit to him in selectively scamming a customer base whose loyalty he has earned through outstanding service.

I hope this helps, coming from one who has bought from him since he first appeared here.

Hello there Darktime old chap. Well I have a mixed tale - a tale of opiophiliac bliss and personal fuckwittery.

On the latter note I ordered from UglyDoll last week. I had a little bit of loot left and the two 0.2 bags seemed attractive. I was messaged to say it would be sent out Monday. Well Monday comes and -almost- goes and not a sausage. Until, that is, my order is cancelled. UglyDoll messaged me and informed me that I had put the wrong postage option on my order. In short, I am a lettuce. So naturally a review of the product will have to wait until I can read.

Regarding the bliss - well - I simply take my hat off to this Beston3 fellow. His 'no joke' superior heroin is very, very good. I recieved it today. The weight is slightly over, the packaging very good, his communication prompt and informative.

Delivery is very quick. This man is a professional. I recommend his service without hesitation as it is excellent in every regard.

I have ordered frequently from TopNotch and would be very surprised if his orders failed to show. I am sure they will - in time - and I have one outstanding myself.

In the meantime I suggest you order from Beston3. I would not bother with the cheaper heroin. Whilst a gram of the strong Afghan will last me around ten days, this cheaper stuff went in three.

I do hope everyone's King Lear arrives tomorrow. Especially you, UKdabbler. Sorry to hear about your job. Good luck friend.

TN's orders and other orders i had before show as $ being in escrow
but my esterdays ones - jor and dispater show as BTC being in secrow
Why is that? (i thought everything's tagged to $ on SR)
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 14, 2013, 11:17 am
Hey poison, I believe it's because one of them aren't hedged. Have you looked up about hedging? If they're hedged, they're held in dollars, so if it's cancelled or whatever, you'll get the same dollar value back, but if they're unhedged, it's held in BTC, so you get the exact same BTC back, even if the value has changed. Hope that helped

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 14, 2013, 11:45 am
I believe that's right SP. It helps us too though, because of how volatile the BTC price has been, if it's hedged, we technically won't lose out. We may get less coins back, but if we're just using them on here, they'll still be as valuable, as prices are pegged to the weighted average at Mt.gox.

They are a heartless business but without them I would be fucked.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: AgentLee on May 14, 2013, 12:43 pm
Well I have had a look at this unspecified weight listing for BO3 and I can see why that would look suspicious. Also thanks for the mention of DPR's policy on FE, pakchoi. I didn't know about that. I suppose having FE'd consistently for Frank Matthews I didn't find it unusual.

I only hope that my experience of BO3 - 2 perfect orders - proves to be the case for everyone, and that he keeps up this level of service.

On the matter of pawning  - as with shoplifting and prostitution - well I see these regrettable behaviours as a direct consequence of our stupid drug laws. How sad that what was once called the 'English solution' has now all but vanished, where doctors would prescribe heroin to addicts.

In less tabloid-dominated countries we can expect to present ourselves at a legal clinic and administer as much dope as we need for nothing. I think of this measure every time I hear of heroin related poverty. It is simply cruel on the part of legislators to permit this state of affairs to continue. The true cost provides an overall benefit to society, as the expense of setting up and maintaining free dope clinics is more than defrayed by the abolition of heroin-related crime and disorder.

95% of the time I get them back - sometimes with interest (but I'm not worried about interest). If they don't repay they go on the 'shit list' which means no-one will lend them anything again - so in a way it's sensible to pay back as you never know when you might need a helping hand.

And lets be honest we're not talking big loans. The biggest I lent someone was $35 but I knew them quite well through my year on SR and I got it back no problems at all.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: AgentLee on May 14, 2013, 04:19 pm
Quote from: NoAddedSugar on May 14, 2013, 12:59 pm
Very well said AgentLee. I've watched many programmes on the subject. There was also a very good Guardian article on the "war on drugs" and how legalizing heroin would stop virtually all the negative issues. It's been tried not that long ago, and Brighton are prescribing diamorphine injections now, and opening up some rooms where users who buy street heroin can go to use in a safe, clean environment, Very forward thinking

I am firmly in support of harm reduction programmes (such as needle exchanges and so on) and shall continue to campaign for 'shooting galleries'.

It is encouraging that attitudes generally towards drug usage have altered (in line with sanity) considerably for the better in recent times. Stigma is diminished and drug use is seen as being mainstream.

I am also encouraged by the responses I find to the 'true cost' argument: that is, the total social cost of this or that policy in terms of personal suffering, crime, cost of criminal proceedings and punishment, efficacy of punishment regarding recidivism and so on. In short people are more willing to listen to alternatives - especially when the alternatives (such as decriminalised and free  supervised usage) are far more sane than the effective persecution of poor people who use some drugs.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: pakchoi23 on May 14, 2013, 08:24 pm
My heart goes out out all of you with your coin tied up in orders with Top Notch...

Sweetpoison - don't worry mate, the postie will have no clue what is in your package. I get loads of stuff delivered from airsoft guns to overseas ebay shit all the time.

Unless you're ordering big amounts then the worst that will happen is it will not turn up, or you will get a letter saying your letter has been seized. Tought shit basically, they won't chase you for small amounts but assume your address may well be marked from that point on. Time ot find another drop.

Darktime - would be cool if you could hook up TN with your local top gear! £10 a point is OLD SKOOOL! :) In fact fuck it I want to know where you live, hook me up now ;)

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 09:40 am
HI londonpride, are you not on a methadone script or anything? If not, get to the pharmacy and  buy some co-codamol for the clucks. There's instructions online for a cold water extraction of the codeine so you can just take the codeine and give your liver a bit of a rest if you need to take a lot.
Morning all. My dispater order just arrived, it looks like a generous 0.3, without scales it's anyone's guess. I had my works organised so everything was ready from last night. I had to move in with my folks after splitting up with my daughter's mother and being kicked out of the house, and not having a job, so even though I said my works were organised, they were still hidden in a shoe box in my room, and they've been used before, only by me (my meth pharmacy isn't a needle exchange, there isn't one in my fucking town!) I borrowed some jif lemon from the kitchen (no citric, no needle exchange) and locked myself in the downstairs loo. Cooked up all the 0.3, drew half up, cooled it down, miraculously found a vein in my wrist first time and injected...
2 minutes later I felt a mild rush and my lids became slightly, SLIGHTLY, heavier. It's very very mild gear, not even up to the standard of TopNotch's cheaper "street" gear. I would not recommend it, at all. Can someone (possibly sweetpoison as I think you're getting loads of different stuff today) please compare this dispater crap to BestOn3's gear for me, or to c63amg's or FrankMatthews? I would appreciate it lots. Thanks for reading this essay first thing in the morning, lots of love to you all. Peace xx

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Japan1980 on May 15, 2013, 09:51 am
Also if worst come to the worst - Nurufen Plus have 12.8MG of codeine in and 200mg ibuprofen - so a whole box of 32 is over 400mgs of codeine.

Not overly advisable but I've ate 32 in one go a number of times and had no problem with the ibuprofen side effects - and depending on the size of your habit, it should hold you.

Approximately £6-£7 pound in any chemist for a box of 32

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Japan1980 on May 15, 2013, 10:05 am
Quote from: londonpride2 on May 15, 2013, 09:54 am
Quote from: Japan1980 on May 15, 2013, 09:51 am
Also if worst come to the worst - Nurufen Plus have 12.8MG of codeine in and 200mg ibuprofen - so a whole box of 32 is over 400mgs of codeine.

Not overly advisable but I've ate 32 in one go a number of times and had no problem with the ibuprofen side effects - and depending on the size of your habit, it should hold you.

Approximately £6-£7 pound in any chemist for a box of 32

I cant take NSAIDs either :( could do a CWE with paracetimal if I get desperate. Perhaps a bit of pain will do me good.

suphedrine max is the equivalent to nurofen plus - it has 12.8mg of codeine in and 500mg paracetamol - but you'd have to to a CWE with that as I certainly wouldn't advise eating 32x500mg of paracetamol. Although eating 16 would be fine and you'd still get over 200mg of codeine in you.

But the CWE is probably your best bet.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 10:57 am
Oh, Sweetpoison, I forgot to say, I ordered from dispater on Saturday, Silk Road said on Monday that it was "in transit" but only arrived today. I get paid on every other Saturday, so that's such a ball ache. I want to order straight away, but the soonest I can get my orders is Tuesday because of our god dang post. It's a good job I don't have a habit. Do you work, sweetpoison, and japan1980?

And a question for everyone, how long have you all been using the road, and how did you learn of it? I've only been using it for just over a month, I was looking at Mexican pharmacies and such online and during one search I found this review of SR on this Anarchist sort of website, with instructions on downloading Tor and the address for SR too. I couldn't believe it. I immediately learned about BTC, spent a few days transferring my Sterling into Euro's via Transferwise, sent the Euro's to Bitstamp (this whole process took 5 days!), bought some BTC, sent them to my desktop wallet then ordered from SR. It was very exciting. I hadn't heard of the Hidden/Deep/Dark web before then! I'm not really a social network sort of person, I just used the internet for downloads and porn! I know this is off topic, but I'm thinking of all you motley bunch of like minded users as mates now, so, it's nice to learn about you.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 11:08 am
I said it in this thread a few days ago, I'll say it again. It's really refreshing to know that there's like minded nice people out there, well, here. When we have such a bad reputation, I believe I said we're considered as the shit stain on the underpants of society. I had no idea people were so trusting and kind, I shall be taking a leaf out of your book, Japan, when I have some money at the weekend. I've always been the person IRL who lends money and helps people out (not trying to blow my own trumpet here) but I have always been fucked over and taken advantage of. But you lot have restored some of my faith in humanity, and in the "drug culture" if there is such a thing. I wish I could go out with you all for a beer. Maybe one day, eh.  Cool Japan, I have a mate who does GC animation at home. So cool. I wish I had learned something useful instead of dossing at college!

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 11:36 am
Yeah, londonpride. I believe you, that you're in need and not trying to take advantage of Japan's generosity. It's even harder on here to tell if someone is legitimately in need or just being a scrounger. And Japan is incredibly decent, and you are obviously and clearly grateful. On a day that's pissing it down with rain outside, it certainly has brightened up here. I've also been pleased to see genuine intelligence and humour here. I have never seen the like in the street users I've met in the past. I have never met a Jack Kerouac or Burroughs character in the real world, even though I thought they must exist. I've always thought I was the odd one out (in no way am I comparing myself here!). In my meetings at the drug worker place I've always been told that I don't seem the type to be a user, and I've always thought, why?, what is the type? The stereotype moron thief? Well, those are the only ones I've met so I can understand that being the general consensus at Addaction. I knew that there must be creatives and funny people and genuine people who like to use drugs, it's only society who think that drugs and stupidity go hand in hand. I have been stupid in the past though, ended up with an addiction I couldn't afford and on the streets, sleeping rough, begging in the town center, but, I've never intentionally hurt someone. Anyway, I think my point is, it's nice to know we're not all stereotypes, and I'm lucky and honoured to have had this chance to "meet" you all.
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: ukdabbler on May 15, 2013, 11:53 am
Quote from: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 11:08 am
I said it in this thread a few days ago, I'll say it again. It's really refreshing to know that there's like minded nice people out there, well, here. When we have such a bad reputation, I believe I said we're considered as the shit stain on the underpants of society. I had no idea people were so trusting and kind, I shall be taking a leaf out of your book, Japan, when I have some money at the weekend. I've always been the person IRL who lends money and helps people out (not trying to blow my own trumpet here) but I have always been fucked over and taken advantage of. But you lot have restored some of my faith in humanity, and in the "drug culture" if there is such a thing. I wish I could go out with you all for a beer. Maybe one day, eh.  Cool Japan, I have a mate who does GC animation at home. So cool. I wish I had learned something useful instead of dossing at college!

I feel exactly the same way, it's such a wonderful community and I'm so glad I've finally started joining in on the SR forums. Once I get back on my feet I'm going to be helping out with lending some btc here and there. I am still bowled over by agentlee's generosity and can't wait to repay the favor. 99% of people would never believe people like us would be capable of such things and you're absolutely right mate it has restored a lot of my faith in humanity, and on SR of all places.

You're all a bloody good bunch

On a side note, bestonlin3's standard gear is rather weak but I'm feeling rather nice now after smoking a lot more than I usual have to.
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: ukdabbler on May 15, 2013, 11:57 am
Quote from: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 10:57 am
Oh, Sweetpoison, I forgot to say, I ordered from dispater on Saturday, Silk Road said on Monday that it was "in transit" but only arrived today. I get paid on every other Saturday, so that's such a ball ache. I want to order straight away, but the soonest I can get my orders is Tuesday because of our god dang post. It's a good job I don't have a habit. Do you work, sweetpoison, and japan1980?

And a question for everyone, how long have you all been using the road, and how did you learn of it? I've only been using it for just over a month, I was looking at Mexican pharmacies and such online and during one search I found this review of SR on this Anarchist sort of website, with instructions on downloading Tor and the address for SR too. I couldn't believe it. I immediately learned about BTC, spent a few days transferring my Sterling into Euro's via Transferwise, sent the Euro's to Bitstamp (this whole process took 5 days!), bought some BTC, sent them to my desktop wallet then ordered from SR. It was very exciting. I hadn't heard of the Hidden/Deep/Dark web before then! I'm not really a social network sort of person, I just used the internet for downloads and porn! I know this is off topic, but I'm thinking of all you motley bunch of like minded users as mates now, so, it's nice to learn about you.

To answer your SR question; I found out about SR on reddit quite a while ago and then found out my dealer at the time sourced all of his stuff on there. I became quite good friends with him and he showed me how to get set up and what precautions to take etc. I ordered from him from time and paid him a bit extra as he was taking the risk of getting it delivered to his house and all that. Now I don't see him due to him being in rehab so I order everything myself instead as I wouldn't want to jeopardize his hard work in getting clean.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 05:24 pm
Hey dabbler, the mods are always saying that they have nothing to do with the SR site, they're purely forum moderators and you are to  either "report vendor", pressing this will bring up options and a text field, or use the resolve/cancel button. If yours is still "processing" then cancel is available after 4 days from placing the order. TN is getting a reputation for being notoriously hard to contact
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 15, 2013, 05:28 pm
Regarding Tar, I made a thread a few hours ago asking about the different types of heroin and got this great reply.........
#1 and #2 you never need to worry about..that is for morphine base and unrefined heroin.....
#3 is usually for smoking, like chasing the dragon on foil and is a base and weaker than #4...it needs to be combined with acid to be iv'd and can not be snorted...though some will claim they can snort...its not water soluble so you will not get high
tar and powder are both #4 that were created in different ways.....generally powder is more refined and therefore more pure and potent.....but tar has additional properties and can be smoked as is so there is a big following here on sr for it....and I have personally bought from almost every us vendor and the most potent stuff on the road is tar...and if you are a iv user....it has legs!!!! it last for a whole day and you wont wake up sick the next morning like you do with powder.....
anyways...pm if you need any help

I've smoked the black tar in the past, but never injected it. I'm keen to try though now

I asked the pharmacist for a bag of 2mls, she disappeared and brought an assistant from the back, who just happened to be a friend of my parents. That was buttock clenching, lower iris puckering moment. I've not seen this woman for 10 years, she may not recognize me. One can only hope. Also, they gave me a paper bag with 5 x long orange pins, 5 x blue, 5 x syringes and 5 x wipes. No citric. That's what I needed most! Brilliant. I have no citric/ vit C at all. You wouldn't believe how hard it is to get new pins near here. Where I used to live, on the south coast, you could get them in every pharmacy and in the drug treatment place, probably even Toys 'R us! edit. What a nice guy Japan

There is definitely a shortage of top notch (hehe) UK heroin vendors. It's ridiculous, having to order from abroad and have to potentially wait a week for your drugs. Although, during the last attack, and when this thread was started, it took me over a week to get my TopNotch gear anyway. It is always worth it though, even his cheaper stuff beats the living shit out of Dispater's and BO3's (I have only tried BO3's cheaper gear, there's not that much difference in the price,  I doubt there being much in the quality. Has anyone here tried both of BO3's gear? Also, has anyone noticed how consistent the quality has been from Dispater and BO3? TopNotch's has been the same exact gear every time, in my opinion.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Japan1980 on May 16, 2013, 01:36 pm
The only reason there was an influx of people using Beston3 is because TN was messing about and you can order from Beston3 up until 5-6pm and receive it the next day. It's the same on the street sometimes, it's good gear and sometimes it's not so good. I do know that Beston3 changes his gear on a regular basis so it does vary from batch to batch - I ordered a couple of weeks ago off him and got some seriously strong ass shit.

I've had both his current cheap stuff and his better stuff - and there is definitely a noticeable difference.

I don't smoke my gear so can't comment on how it runs - but in a pin I think it's not too bad, personally. But I often mix my gear with diconal, for the extra BOOOOM.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: pakchoi23 on May 16, 2013, 01:46 pm
Quote from: sweetpoison on May 16, 2013, 12:52 pm
Has any of you ever experienced that their UK to UK packages were missing, not arrived, intercepted,.,.,?
Or it's pretty much 100% luck of delivery. My packages from Tn always arrived, i only had one package not to arrive with BO3 , being brand new i had to FE, so can't be 100% positive he sent it
To make it shorter, what the chances my TN and dispater orders turn up later? (marked in transit on tuesday)

Edit: got another question,- i have 3 orders on my order list including TN's all of them were marked in transit the same day, on tuesday and were all saying 17 days to auto finalize, but today i discovered that two orders are saying 15 days left as they are supposed to say, but TN order says 16, what does it mean?

My dispater order was marked in transit Tuesday morning and it showed today... Sometimes the mail is delayed by a day or even two in some areas due to various reasons. if it doesn't show by Saturday I'd be worried it's gone walkabout.

I think the autofinalise times are done from the time the order was made. For example, you could place order #1 at 9am on Monday and order #2 at 5pm on Monday.  On Tuesday order #1 will click over to 16 days at 09:01 while order #2 will stay as 17 days until 17:01. That make sense? LoL




Gear report - I am sat here smoking dispaters gear and it's crap. Not utter crap, I can feel a bit but I think I am going to have to smoke the whole g to maybe get a nod. It's a bugger cos it's the nod I'm after... Oh well, i've had worse, but been spoilt by TopNotch and c63amg.  Annoying, cos last week after 0.15 of dispaters gear I was throwing up and pinned to fuck.... meh

I found that UK doctors are normally alright to prescribe you what you ask (on reasonable level! ),- last time i've been to a doctor and asked for tramadol, with my prescription i could have up to 10 caps a day, also they gave me temazepam ( not sure but i think it is benzo as well, isn't it?
2   NAD - thanks for compliment about my english

Regarding needle exchange service,-there are packages of 2ml or 1 ml syringes. Every package has 10 syringes, swabs, spoons with filters, citric acid and used needle containers. So every time you come for a new pack, you bring the container with used syringes back to them. They don't ask for name, ID or  address.
:)

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Darktime on May 17, 2013, 06:54 pm
no,your not in trouble but just think before you type.any info is info to the pigs
when i googled it,it brought up about 6 of those chemists,all in the same location.its only a small chain.not 100s of them but 6!
the police go about finding people a bit like a huge game of 'guess who'dont know if you ever played this game but its a popular childs game where you get a board of around 30 different people on flip cards and you play it by asking questions about the person you pick at the beggining of the game such as"is it a man?"if it is they flip all the women over..."has he got glasses?"if yes you flip over the ones without glasses and so on until your left with 4 or five until you "guess who!"
ok,now imagine I wanted to find you.there are 70 million people in the UK,51% are female so that cuts the number down to 35 million.you live in the city I googled earlier which say has a population of 80,000 so that gets the number down to 40,000.your russian say 1% of the city are russian,thats 400 now.your a user of opiates thats registered that probably takes the number down to about 5
Ive got you down to 5 posible people...5!!! and Im not a copper with the technology to actually find you.
now you see why revealing even the slightest details about yourself can reduce the possibility's of who you are,sometimes by great numbers.
BE CAREFULL!!

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: sweetpoison on May 18, 2013, 09:45 pm
Hi peeps!
I think i've overdosed today.
I've cooked normal/usual amount of TN's strong afgan and a couple of minutes later after i shoot it i  fainted (for 30 min or so), when i goback i could not understand where i was, what was going on and the syringe was pricking my palm. All day today i couldn't see properly,- just couldn't focus my eyes, i think i'm just starting to feel normal now. Either the H is stronger this time or may be cut with smth like benzos or fentanyl. Has anyone who had his last batch noticed anything?
Regarding junkie life in russia,- i'd say its bad,-  H quality these days is very poor, from what i've heard,- they say it's probably maximum 20% of H in powder which is sold as H. I  came off it before it became bad. Also there is not much junkies can do now to treat withdrawals, because codeine containing tablets are not available without prescription any more and in russia there is no substitute treatment program. The only thing people are left with now is - pregabalin (Lyrica).
 Here in the UK no one seems to know about poppies growing everywhere (in my area anyway), because they grow everywhere, so not sure if anyone harvests them here.
Regarding renaming the thread,- if you tell me how to do, i'm quite happy to give it any name you suggest :)

It could be cut with benzo's. When you cooked up the powder, after the liquid cooled down, did it crystallize in the spoon? Did it look different at all? Are you feeling sleepy now still? If you do stay at home and go to bed, prop some pillows up to your side to keep you from rolling onto your back. Did you get any chest pain after injecting? Anything different than a normal strong hit? I'd definitely go to the hospital if you think you could have OD'd

Russia is definitely much less liberal than Europe in general, so it's way easier to get into trouble with the law, and the repercussions can be bad, and I'm talking really bad! So you've gotta be careful with any banned substances over there.

One of the coolest people I ever met while still there was this guy who'd done pretty much every drug known to man, read a lot of Castaneda's stuff and played guitar and drums. I heard a lot of stuff from him regarding the cliches that are prevalent in society and the lies we are being constantly fed. If you weed out all the materialistic biatches (haha) then you can be sure to stumble upon some amazing people.  8)

Not sure what conclusion to make from this - but the main thing is you're still with us Bro, just be careful in the future.

That is one problem buying H over the internet you never know if someone has gone completely mental and poisoned their batch (not that I'm saying he has) but it's anonymous so potentially someone could get away with mass murder. On the street it's the same to a certain extent, but you hear from word of mouth who's got good gear etc etc...

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Darktime on May 19, 2013, 05:11 pm
Quote from: ukdabbler on May 19, 2013, 03:34 pm
Hey everyone,

Hope you're all doing well and had a good weekend...

Just letting you know my order from TN arrived on Friday, it was .15 overweight. The quality was ok. I also had a delivery of bo3's no joke gear which was nearly on par with TN's order in my opinion (smoking).

I placed an order with c63amg and for his afghan and I'm really looking forward to having something that hits me like a brick wall :)

One more thing, I ordered a couple of Diconal's. I've never had them before, are the similiar to an OC 40 for example?

Thanks :)

The main preparation of the drug commercially available is mixed with cyclizine (Diconal, Wellconal) which has the advantage of reducing nausea, vomiting and histamine release associated with strong opioid therapy.[2]

Dipipanone was also available as an oral mixture 10 mg/5ml without the cyclizine during the 1970s - 1980's in the UK. This form was rare and used normally only in drug trials and in specialist diconal addiction clinics.

Usage [edit]

Dipipanone is now unavailable in most countries of the world either by laws prohibiting its medicinal use as in the United States or by falling out of production as more modern analgesics took its market share. Great Britain, Northern Ireland and South Africa are known to continue to use the substance but it is infrequently prescribed.

Chemistry [edit]

Chemically, dipipanone belongs to the class of opioids called the 4,4-diphenylheptane-3-ones. It closely resembles methadone, the only structural difference being the N,N-dimethyl moiety of methadone being replaced with a piperidine ring. Other related compounds with equivalent activity where the piperidine ring has been replaced by other groups, include the morpholine derivative phenadoxone, as well as the corresponding pyrrolidine derivative.[3] The general procedure for synthesis is illustrated by nucleophilic attack of diphenylacetonitrile on 2-chloro-1-piperidyl-propane. The resulting aminonitrile is then converted to the ethyl ketone with ethyl magnesium bromide by way of the ketimine which is hydrolyzed by cold aqueous acid.[4][5]

Medical use and recreational abuse [edit]

Prescription of dipipanone is discouraged apart from in exceptional circumstances, because of the perceived risk of abuse - the BNF marks the substance as "less suitable for prescribing" along with other older compounds such as pethidine and pentazocine with unusual abuse patterns. The combination with cyclizine leads to a very strong "rush" if the drug is injected, however the tablets contain insoluble binders which led to many limb amputations and some fatalities (as with temazepam). During the late 1970s to early 1980s in the UK, many deaths were blamed on misuse of this preparation. As supplies became unavailable, opiate users would mix crushed methadone tablets or Physeptone ampoules with crushed Valoid (a cyclizine containing antihistamine) tablets, in an attempt to replicate the effect of Diconal.

Hey Dabs, It will hit you, it's fantastic (c63's gear). I just managed to spread 0.5g out into 6 small hits and one bigger hit over the course of yesterday and today. About 60-90 minutes ago I had the last of these, the biggest one, roughly eyed to be 0.2g. I have one eye open and keep nodding onto my keyboard (producing lines of bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb... etc that I have to keep deleting, the simple process of typing a message takes 10 times as long as it should!) as I lie in bed. I would recommend this to anyone. I've never taken Diconal, I'm very anxious to hear the effects. Please do fill us in after you try.  Lovely weather today to sit outside gouching out, if away from prying eyes of neighbours of course!

Diconal mixed with H in a pin is the ultimate opiate buzz - you can't get better except possibly diamorphine amps. BTW -  from Harley Street Doctors in London you can still buy them on a private script (diamorphine amps) if you know the corrupt doctors, 10-15 years ago it was a wide spread occurrence, I used to get boxes of them weekly, although they've tightened up on it these days, however it still goes on.

But regarding dicanol and H - be very, very careful - it's so powerful mixed together, it's easy to OD. Lost a few good friends many years ago to it. And another word of advice - a lot of the dicanol that is sold on SR is generic shit - occasionally a good batch comes in but not often.

Today i did a small dose - got nice opioid buzz (didn't faint lol) and then.. didn't want to smoke and was sleeping half a day. I feel alright now, not withdrawing yet. So this H is quite strong then. Because i wasn't taking subutex fro 4 days, i would be already withdrawing if all H went of my system. I put it away for now, i ll come back to it sometime later, so back to subs from tomorrow :) And, Yes, the next time im purchasing H on SR i'd try c63..,- so many compliments on his H here :)
 I didn't have any chest pains or any abnormality,- just gone from usual dose.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Japan1980 on May 20, 2013, 05:39 am
Quote from: NoAddedSugar on May 20, 2013, 12:04 am
Subutex used to make me very anxious, that's why I moved to Methadone, SweetP, Subbies aren't meant to give you a buzz That's part of the appeal If you actually want to get clean, alond with the blocking effect.

That's if you take them how then chemist suggest. If you crush them up and snort them or even IV (they cook up completely different to H, be careful or they'll turn to gel) them you get a nice buzz. Not overpowering but nice all the same. If you take them under the tongue you won't feel a thing except they'll help with withdrawals. That's exactly why they bought out suboxone - because allegedly you can't abuse suboxone. But they fucked up because you actually can if you know how  ;) 

Did you know - that in the British Prison system Subutex is the most abused drugs by prisoners. In the 80's/90's it was Cannabis, but due to drug testing and Cannabis staying in your system so long it then changed to Heroin in the late 90's to arly 00's. But due to the crack down of getting large amounts in - Subutex has now taken over and is by FAR the most abused drug in any prison in the country.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Japan1980 on May 20, 2013, 11:59 am
Quote from: NoAddedSugar on May 20, 2013, 09:12 am
I was lead to believe Suboxone couldn't be snorted, Subutex could though? I've never heard of anyone IVing Subutex or Suboxone. I used to hang around  people who injected anything, is the high pretty shit compared to gear or prescription Opiates?

Suboxone CAN be snorted, and also IV'd (but not very effective IV'd). Both Subutex and Suboxone can be snorted or IV'd to get a buzz - however Subutex is stronger due the less amount of Naxloxone in it.

DO NOT EITHER USE WHILE ON OPIATES - AS YOU WILL GO INTO INSTANT WITHDRAWALS  :(

Suboxone : (hexagon), CAN BE SNORTED, AND INJECTED.

Subutex:   (can be both small, or larger oval sized), CAN BE SNORTED, CAN BE INJECTED.

Subutex snorted actually gives me a very pleasant high - bit like a more energetic H buzz.

My personal opinion is that Subutex snorted is better than most prsecription opiates, such as OXY's (obviously, depending on the amount used).

Yeah the buzz is not as good a H but for me (personally) I have a soft spot for Subutex - and have had some extremely good nods off it. Some people don't like the stuff, but for me I really like it. Whether or not my tolerance is high or low at the time has no effect on the feeling - obviously having to dose higher when tolerance levels are higher is a must.

If you ever decide to IV either look into how it's done as it's different to preparing a H hit as heating it with citric will just turn it into a sludge - but if prepared correctly it could be a very nice surprise.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Darktime on May 20, 2013, 12:17 pm

Subutex used to make me very anxious, that's why I moved to Methadone, SweetP, Subbies aren't meant to give you a buzz That's part of the appeal If you actually want to get clean, alond with the blocking effect.

That's if you take them how then chemist suggest. If you crush them up and snort them or even IV (they cook up completely different to H, be careful or they'll turn to gel) them you get a nice buzz. Not overpowering but nice all the same. If you take them under the tongue you won't feel a thing except they'll help with withdrawals. That's exactly why they bought out suboxone - because allegedly you can't abuse suboxone. But they fucked up because you actually can if you know how  ;) 

Did you know - that in the British Prison system Subutex is the most abused drugs by prisoners. In the 80's/90's it was Cannabis, but due to drug testing and Cannabis staying in your system so long it then changed to Heroin in the late 90's to arly 00's. But due to the crack down of getting large amounts in - Subutex has now taken over and is by FAR the most abused drug in any prison in the country.

Currently £50-60 per 8ml inside

Unfortunately there isn't much choice. Avoid dispater's gear like the plague, it's shite.

Beston3 has a listing "very good no joke" which is ok, but again not great.

TN's standard uk no.3 is around the same kinda strength as beston3's "no joke" stuff.

Tn's afghan is your best bet but he is having stock issues at the moment so that's out of the question. Personally I'd go with beston3's "no joke" stuff as it is next day delivery and Tn's a bit all over the place at the moment.

Cheers

Tha'ts all I've tried UK 2 UK.

You only really have 2 choices mate,

http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/item/59db7c3f07 - not tried myself but seems ok feedback

http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/item/9889ad6358 - tried a couple of weeks back and thought it was not bad (extremely fast delivery too). However, reports since then have been hit and miss.

OR - it would be interesting to see what this is like, never tried it but the chemical components make it sound like it could be strong, as Fentanyl is seriously fucking strong.

http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/item/53f2c6e351

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Darktime on May 21, 2013, 03:09 pm
Hey SP
get a piece of tin foil and make a tube about 3 inches long,this is put in the mouth to suck up the vapor.get another flat piece about 7inches by 5 inches and put the h in a small pile on the foil.hold a lighter underneath it and suck it up.theres all sorts of personalised ways peeps do it but you will learn the best way for you.dont let it run off the foil though!Try to 'run' the liquid in a line up and down the foil dont just keep it on the same spot or it will burn.
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: sweetpoison on May 21, 2013, 03:32 pm

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 21, 2013, 06:36 pm
You just want aluminum foil, it's sold in any corner shop or super market. Bacofoil is a brand, I've used it fine. Avoid the very cheap very thin foil like "happy shopper", that's crap. You can unroll the tube you put in your mouth when you've finished, smoke concentrates into a brown thin goo inside.
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Darktime on May 21, 2013, 09:47 pm
Most consider the cheap foil the best.Personal choice though obviously.As NAS said,after your smoke,if youve got nothing left,unfold/roll your 'tooter' and there will be a little gear stuck to the inside which you can smoke.If you got lots of h,just let it build up until a)it runs out while your smoking a line or b)If it blocks,heat it a little with the lighter and drip it onto your foil.I've even picked this 'collect' off the toot and cooked it up as sometimes your collect can be stronger than your h!!Hardly any cut as well cos you've smoked that and whats collected is pretty pure.
SS,ask Japan about the fentanyl cos I think I remember him saying it isnt as strong as it used to be.
Why dont you try some 'refined opium'?Its a reasonable price and the refined stuff you can smoke in a pipe.Ive had it in tea and it was lovely.I had been out raving all night,had e's and whizz,was flying!Had about 0.2gr in some tea and within 30 mins was buzzed right up!Heavy legs,stoned feel in the eyes,big cheesy grin.It was very nice.Horrortrips seems like a nice guy to get it from but his isn't much good for smoking he said.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Japan1980 on May 22, 2013, 04:46 am
Quote from: shifting sands on May 21, 2013, 03:44 pm
as there are no decent uk h vendors I have been researching alternatives. One could be Pure Fentanyl Citrate.
It comes as a patch or as a nasal spray. It seems to be much stonger that h. anyone have any advice or comments regarding this product.

Fentanyl is one of the strongest opiates out there - I read somewhere in a book it was about 100x stronger than diamorohine. That's why they mainly do patches, as it's a bit like a nicorrette patch it slowly releases it into your body over a period of time (usually 72hours) - there are ways to turn the patch into instant release seriously strong shit (google it) - But yeah Fentanyl gets a massive thumbs up from me. Once again be fucking careful with the stuff - as if you work it properly it would overdose an elephant. I get mine very rarely off a friend IRL - but from what I hear the quality is good on SR. Darktime's comment regarding me was towards the diconal on SR not the Fentanyl.....

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: Japan1980 on May 22, 2013, 06:26 pm
Quote from: NoAddedSugar on May 22, 2013, 05:29 pm
Hello JJ, yes, I said stupid 1st transaction (just my opinion) and then yes, I did say poor little idiot, I agree, that wasn't very nice, I feel sorry for you, losing out before you've even got going, I still think that buying BTC from a SR vendor isn't a good idea. 100% positive feedback doesn't mean he won't run off with your money, search the forums for SamGiancana. He was a top vendor and went rogue in the last week or two, stealing thousands from people on here. There's no Escrow to protect you if you deposit cash into someones bank account. But, I can't make you do anything you don't want to. How much does this vendor charge for 1BTC? Can I ask, are you using TOR to get onto SR?

Hi NAS,

You mention SamGiancana as a recent scammer - not sure if any of you guys on this thread have been around long enough to remember the biggest scammer in SR history - a vendor called Tony, about a year ago or so - built up an amazing reputation, was known as the best vendor on SR for most products - literally had 100's of customers on a weekly basis. Built up huge trust over a long period of time, then suddenly came up with a huge scam saying he needed FE off everyone for him to reduce prices and buy bulk of amazing product to then sell on etc etc etc. It has been estimated he scammed approximately 2 hundred thousand dollars or more then vanished into thin air.

No-one saw it coming as he was seen as 'the best of SR' - That was the first big scam, there have been others since but none anywhere close to that level - he really planned it and pulled off the ultimate scam.

The moral of the story is, don't trust vendors. They're simply drug dealers on the internet, and should be treated that way.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: NoAddedSugar on May 22, 2013, 07:35 pm
Yeah, his was the FE 420 scam, wasn't it? I think that I could have just coined that phrase, Tony FE420, or to be a complete prick. Wise words from Japan 1980. But we can only go so far and give so much advice. JJ says he hasn't got a bank account. From what I've seen here, most balls ups happen to n00bs who are to eager to start buying. More haste, less speed. Take your time, do some research, do your homework, and stay in Escrow. These are words to live by whilst meandering down the Silk Road, It is a great place, full of wonder and delights, but they'll still be here tomorrow, so don't rush, don't make mistakes with privacy or security. Taking the time to do your homework properly, and talking to people who've been around longer is invaluable. There's plenty of help in these forums, and some great people to chat to. People here will answer any questions you have. Stay safe, stay secure, shop smart, shop Esmart.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: shifting sands on May 23, 2013, 01:16 pm
Guys, Thanks for the opinions on Fentanyl. I have taken it all on board. I think I will go for the powder and also the nasal spray. I have found out that it passes through to the brain much quicker than other opiates and that makes it quite dangerous especially if you IV. Another trait that makes it dangerous is it does not break down quickly so the next day if you take the same dose or more like you would with other opiates you could be looking at an OD. You need to reduce the dose or not do it at all. Anyway I am sure to tell you all about it after. I have had my habit  for over 20 years so my tolerance is quite high but i will be careful anyhow.
If anyone knows how I can make the powder smokable,  I.E what do i need to add to make it run on the foil i would be very grateful.

I'm impressed again. I ordered from c63 at the weekend, we know he was absent until Tuesday, I think Pakchoi figured out it was a Dutch Bank Holiday. My order went to "in transit" at about 9:30am on Tuesday morning, I got the automated PM straight after, with a little note and question tailored for me, asking how I liked my first order from him, which was nice. Then this morning at 10:00am, (lazy postie today, usually get it earlier than that) that lovely envelope landed on my doormat. That is fast. I am so impressed, I didn't think it was possible for mail from The Netherlands could get to me in UK that quick. And, of course, absolute quality gear. No question, hands down, the best I've ever had. I'm so impressed by this vendor, my Dispater order took the same amount of time from being marked "in transit" to arriving here. I have no reason to go elsewhere in future. Providing I have enough cash!

c63 wanted to know how much I liked his product, well, I'm having to type this one-handed, (ha! I'm not wanking, I don't like it that much!) I have no co-ordination.   
I have one eye closed, the room is too bright for my sensitive eyes. It's taking me forever to type this message through trying not to make mistakes, and nodding. I open my eyes and realise I've typed 6 rows of "K's". Then I start deleting the rows of letters, start to nod again and start deleting parts of the good message, which, in turn, needs retyping. All good fun though, even though it's really pissing me off!
The only thing that I find is less than perfect with c63's package (the stealth is fantastic) is the "bag" it's in. We can't go into detail on this, but those of you who have ordered in the past will know what I mean. I lose quite a lot through transferring from the bag to a wrap, but hey-ho, you can't have everything. Right I'm going to have a nod to Batman. Happy nods to all and to all a good nod. Peace. xx

Post by: zazoo on May 24, 2013, 12:25 am
You will learn to love that 'bag' when you run out.  Has a surprising capacity to hold a decent amount.  Glad you like his gear.  TN's strong afghan is good for domestic but I was disappointed when I received it as someone compared it to c63.  Even Frank Matthews #3 blows any UK stuff out the water.  I do only smoke tho.  Can we get this thread changed to Euro Heroin thread or something as well please?

Sick of those yanks ignoring legitimate questions.  Rather than give reviews or import from the much cheaper and relative safety of Canada, several people report they have an order in transit from Deezletime or some shit.  They then discuss shipping options and in a couple weeks they do it all over for the new vendor of the month. 

Any of you guys try NorthernDancer?  $190 for afghan and it is supposed to be fire.  Would be interested to try it and see if it smokes.  Also, for those that haven't I can't recommend Frank Matthew's #4 more, especially at that price.
FE is a risk but wow is it strong.  Not sure of this batch but I'm comparing to SmileaWhile here and the gulf isn't as big as one would imagine with a good price.

Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: horsetank on June 07, 2013, 03:39 pm
^^^I have and it was good, but it wasn't brown. The test is whether it dissolves in water without citric. It should dissolve in plain water to clear or light golden with very little heat. In fact its best not to heat it.
Title: Re: TopNotch processing orders
Post by: pakchoi23 on June 08, 2013, 03:12 pm
Update on Jimmy Boyles ridiculously priced #3.

Well at £180 a gram I was wanting miracles and it came close. Really strong and clean. Must be the purest stuff I have ever had. It felt like a shit ton of morphine, it was gouchy, it was buzzy, it was everything really.

Just wish it wasn't so fricking expensive.

To compare, I would rather buy TopNotch's best H than this, much better value for money. However, it is the best SR H I have tried.

I have a feeling this may be better in the pin than on foil.


Would I buy again? Yes, but I would try c63amg again first as his good shit is better value.

Hello all!

Dabbler - what a miserable situation. I do hope it turns up for you. Let me know if you need a hand, as it were.

Naturally I'd like nothing better than to see the legendary TopNotch return, but in the interim let's keep on sharing that info on what is available.

Finally, after a week in which I was a rather sick little bear - my order from theXchange did not show, my two grams from Dr Holland looked like they had vanished - my order from Dr Holland arrived and it is excellent. It took a week - but that's perhaps due to one postage stamp instead of the usual two from NL.

Rather worryingly a corner of the envelope was also torn off. This would not be enough to inspect the contents due to the manner of packaging, but a smaller item would have easily been liberated through this hole. I've informed the vendor - thanks to the packaging my order got to me - but were it not so difficult to extract from the envelope I'm certain it would have been taken.

Has anyone seen this before? Makes me a little reluctant to order again, frankly. Is this just a cheeky postman?

Best wishes to all on what has turned out to be an excellent week for a formerly poorly little bear.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on June 12, 2013, 04:42 pm
Just a bit of info that may help people that are clucking or waiting and forced into WD's

This is an absolute godsend -

Loperamide is one of the strongest opiates out there and you can buy it over the counter, it's as strong as fenatyl - however does not cross the BBB so you don't get a a buzz off it, but it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms as it binds to the other receptors in the body.

It's the active ingredient in Imodium, but in any main supermarket you can buy the cheap own brand boxes for like 79p for 6 (2mg each).

I've had this little trick up my sleeve for a few years and for me it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms at a dose of 16-20mg (8-10 tablets as they have 2mg in each), for me. Other people need less, or some more - but IT WORKS.

If you google about it there is a wealth of people that it's helped. Seems to work for most people, but not for the small minority.

I once done a gram a day habit withdrawal using Loperamide only and felt fine all the way through.

Just thought I'd throw it out there for people that are not well and fancy getting well by simply going to the supermarket! 

Peace
J

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on June 12, 2013, 06:39 pm
Quote from: jdddd on June 12, 2013, 06:31 pm
Nice one, can I ask what would the best way be to take the AMPs? And what kind of buzz would you describe on them (in general I hate that question but I just mean is a zoned out or relaxed etc?)

They are dry AMPS so simply snap off the top add water and draw straight up into a syringe, no need for filters etc.

The best way to describe the Buzz is a very clean opiate H type buzz - very clean, beautiful buzz.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: sharliecheen2 on June 12, 2013, 08:03 pm
Hey, sorry to break in but who/what would you folk recommend to an opiate-naive newcomer?

I smoked some standard BestOn3 gear awhile back, and couldn't help but feel like I fucked it up. I did it in 3 sessions of 100mg each, and only really felt anything substantial the final time. This leads me to believe I wasted most of it through poor tooting skills.

Given I'll never inject, I'm hoping to snort my next opiate as it's easier and your dose is more guaranteed. I also want to keep domestic. #4 H in the UK is rare and incredibly expensive. I was sold on SunWu's fentanyl/lactose powder until I read lots of people saying there's no euphoria with fentanyl - it's too 'clinical' and boring. That defies the point for me.

So that leaves crushed up morphine sulphate from MidnightCowboy / ByronLugosi / Pure1, codeine from UK1Hash or oxycodone from ByronLugosi. I'm hoping I'm wrong about the fentanyl - but if not I'm leaning toward morphine or oxycodone.

Am I right in thinking you can't snort #3? I can get about 300mg morphine sulphate for .5BTC vs. maybe 50-100mg oxycodone. Bang for buck the morphine is clearly the better deal?

But i had situations in my life when i couldn't find a vein and my syringe was full of blood and the solution wasn't injectable any more what i did was i dropped it under my tongue, not all of it straight away, just some drops every 10 seconds or so and it was fine. Also heard people plug it,- never tried myself but people say it's a good alternative. I myself tried smoking and never been successful in it,- wasted it every time.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: jdddd on June 12, 2013, 09:41 pm
sharliecheen2 when your smoking #3 are you remebering to let the powder turn to an oil then make sure and tilt the foil so it can run it should start letting off a lot more smoke at this point, (if you dont let it run it can burn up all at once my guess is this happens because you are letting one piece of the foil get too warm but this is purely a guess anyway), inhale this through your toot (some people seem to reccomend a cardboard toilet roll holder for me this is far far too big as u suck in too much air, I use a rolled up piece of foil as it catches left over gear inside your toot which you can then smoke, but this takes a while to get right a decent enuff go to toot is a rolled up bank note some residue gathers on the inside of this over time which can be scraped off and smoked. If you search google youl find some useful info on smoking gear on drug-forum some of it is in reference to tar as it seems to be mostly US but the process sounds fairly similar). Just dont put out too much till you get the process right but when you do I think you will enjoy it, even the ritual brings a smile to my face now :D.

Sorry im not much use when it comes to what is the more valuable option in terms of the morphine but im sure someone will be able to help. Dont know if any of the above will be of any use to you but im a dab hand at smoking it now (at least i think i am). Good luck

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: AgentLee on June 13, 2013, 11:51 am
Quote from: Japan1980 on June 12, 2013, 04:42 pm
Just a bit of info that may help people that are clucking or waiting and forced into WD's

This is an absolute godsend -

Loperamide is one of the strongest opiates out there and you can buy it over the counter, it's as strong as fenatyl - however does not cross the BBB so you don't get a a buzz off it, but it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms as it binds to the other receptors in the body.

It's the active ingredient in Imodium, but in any main supermarket you can buy the cheap own brand boxes for like 79p for 6 (2mg each).

I've had this little trick up my sleeve for a few years and for me it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms at a dose of 16-20mg (8-10 tablets as they have 2mg in each), for me. Other people need less, or some more - but IT WORKS.


Well said that man. I took this recently and my symptoms vanished. It certainly does work and is an excellent way of remaining well in times of no dope.

I was thinking about theXchange, but I read he actually have some problem with delivery. I need in max 1 week...

any other good vendor out there?

Thanks

Post by: Darktime on June 13, 2013, 12:09 pm
You can do what you like with #3 ,snort,smoke or IV...stick it up your ass if you like(that's always good)the only 2 things i suggest you don't do is eat it or when injecting,IM or skin pop as this is very painful and will probably lead to massive abscess's.
The guy who said he wasn't getting anything from smoking it,I would suggest trying another vendor.most of the uk vendors have shit ATM apart from that guy who does a gram for £180,which is outrageous but is supposed to be the nuts kit.
Even if you are not running it good you should get something of a 0.2g and BTW use foil tooters and only foil tooters.just wrap it round a pencil or whatever.after some time you'll learn how to get the most out of your toot.LOL at bog roll cardboard tube!!!
For the guy who said He will never use a pin.....yeah,ok..how many times have I heard that?!?!...sounds like me about 15 years ago.
as for sniffing MST...I pity your nose cos its gonna hurt and I dont think you'll get much of a buzz.try crushing up a 100mg mst and you'll know what im talking about.

My best advice for newbie opiate users is to stop using right now!!before its too late.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: AgentLee on June 13, 2013, 12:12 pm
Quote from: sharliecheen2 on June 12, 2013, 08:03 pm
Hey, sorry to break in but who/what would you folk recommend to an opiate-naive newcomer?

Hello sharlie, and welcome to the (mainly UK) dope fiend thread.

My advice to you would be - be very careful.

I would strongly advise you *not* to do fentanyl, as it is extremely potent and is likely to kill you.

This is not an exaggeration. From memory Fent is about 30x stronger than morphine and is commonly associated with clusters of overdose, usually resulting from fentanyl being sold as #4 heroin. It is short acting, meaning the buzz wears off in about an hour, and therefore encourages dependency. People describe it as 'heroin without a soul', if that makes sense - it does not have the euphoric effect peculiar to God's own medicine.

If you are going to smoke heroin, here's a few tips:

#1 Get the foil you are going to smoke from and pass a lighter up and down the dull side. This will help 'clean' the foil. Make sure the foil is smooth before you apply the dope.
#2 Remember you are trying to heat, and not burn the dope. Place your little pile of powder on the foil, stroke the underside of the foil with the flame until it melts. When it has done so, you're ready to chase it.
#3 Pass the flame up and down the area containing the dope. 'Stroking' it with the flame gives the right idea - you are trying to heat the dope and the foil in front of it, to cause it to run.
#4 Avoid keeping the flame stationary: this will toast your dope in one go. Tilt the foil in the direction you wish the dope to run.
#5 Keep the tooter close to the rear of the dope and be prepared to inhale shortly after you start heating it. It's a good idea to exhale before you go near it when the dope is still in powder form, as you can accidentally blow it into the carpet. Cue bitter tears.
#6 Learn how to make a proper tooter. There is a video on www.exchangesupplies.org which shows you how. The idea is to fold the foil in a certain way so as to preserve any residue for that rainy day which will certainly arrive. Remember to 'clean' the foil beforehand, too.
#7 Give it a good ten minutes to feel any effects before you smoke again. People think you can't go over smoking heroin - and whilst it isn't easy to do so, it isn't impossible, especially for a person with low tolerance like yourself.
#8 I find it easier to move the foil rather than the tooter. Get used to doing two actions at once - perhaps do a 'dry run' where you simply mimic the actions of 'stroking' the foil with a lighter flame and moving the foil with the other hand. It sounds odd, but the action is a little unnatural and a bit of practice will probably help you get the most from your stash.
#9 Be aware that 'he who rides the tiger can never get off'. This is the cautionary bit, where I condescend to you in the manner of a drawling, strung out if well meaning father figure.

Personally I can manage my tolerance and pay for my habit. It is rather moreish and may turn out to be more than a dalliance. If you intend to 'chip' - use recreationally and avoid dependency - then you might want to look at heroin helper. Google it - it's written by the chap who wrote the heroin user's handbook, and contains good tips on how to use whilst minimising the risk of dependency.

I hope this helps. Do please stay away from fentanyl and happy tooting.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: AgentLee on June 13, 2013, 12:24 pm
Now it's time to review. Having messaged Dr. Holland about it,  I can now tell you about the product I got from him.

Hours after ordering I got a message from Dr. Holland saying he had mistakenly sent me two grams of number four heroin, instead of the #3 I ordered. He asked whether this was acceptable, which I thought very decent of him. Naturally I was happy and told him so.

After a rather difficult week, the package arrived. The bag contained a light yellow powder with many granules and larger clusters, similar in colour and appearance to cornflour. It most certainly is not. Unless you wish to murder your dinner guests I would advise against adding this to your gravy.

Dr Holland informs me that he will soon be listing his #4, and that is a very good thing. In my, uh, 'career', I have had pharmaceutical heroin, morphine ampoules, MST, and the usual array of street opiates. I have never experienced such a powerful rush and durable effect from any opiate other than the good doctor's #4.

When he does list this, I suggest you buy it. Be very careful, as if I had taken my usual dose I would certainly be dead. It is very potent indeed and the man is prompt, considerate and well mannered to a fault.

I can't recommend Dr Holland enough. I waited for him to confirm that my reviewing an unlisted 'mistake' item was acceptable, so here it is.

Right, that is quite enough thread-hogging from me. Time for a stroll. Best wishes to you all and I hope this proves helpful.
