I have just written a review of Dr Holland's #4 (unlisted) heroin. Given the quality of this product I expect his #3 to be equally impressive. I have not tried it myself, but his #4 is the best heroin I have ever seen. His reviews are all favourable and I recommend him to you, given that c63amg is experiencing some trouble, and of course Frank Matthews requires you to finalise early.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: JJRocks7 on June 13, 2013, 12:30 pm
Posted this on a seperate post, my first 3 weeks on SR but I think some of the guys in this thread may find it useful, atleast the vendor reviews....

hey guys just started using sr for last few weeks, mainly treating myself to a little splurge on heroin...

last time I had used h before this was over a year ago but I had smoked a bunch of oxys at one point and had to go thru some pretty bad withdrawals just about 10 months ago but only ever smoked the h...

Leaving uk for the states in a few days for some fun in the sun but no drugs, besides weed and occasional xanax

As we speak I'm experiencing some mild to moderate withdrawals but I am using a combo of otc codeine/nurofen pills and lots of weed and feel ok, wish these xanax I bought on here were working but they suck, which will lead me to my first vendor review...

Chillzon3too-
This is the guy I got the C10 3.5 mg xanax from, I bought 20 for half a coin... was excited by the 3.5 dosage... first let me say the guy is not a scammer, I rated him 5/5 and would recommend him to other noobs... He had great reviews, but anyway this batch that he received were apparently no good, anyway good communications and full refund, didnt require fe and just canceled my order after I had already received the product... So sum it up would try him again

fromonetoanother-
Bitcoin seller for uk on here, deposited £ straight into local bank acct, no name given nor needed by either party and always came thru perfect and expediently. definitely would recommend... Let me also write as a warning to other noobs and I've already posted this when it happened to me, my first btc deposit was instantly stolen, I was tricked into a stupid phishing version of sr from a link that popped up on google. I admit now I'm an idiot for falling for it and I entered my pin. Made a new acct and the vendor even agreed to sell me half his minimum purchase due to what happened just bc I was nervous about the first issue....

Heroin- only used 2 vendors
I myself am not much of a user tbh, I like to go thru 2 week splurges like once a year but keep it strictly to smoking and try not to use more than 2 days without a 2 day break. I've prob never used the premium pulp fiction gear in my life and never IV only smoke, snorted once in amsterdam. Cant become an addict it would just ruin my life so this is what works best for me to manage my life and my "demons"

dispater-
Used him 4 times, I personally like his gear, way better than street and always lasted me a while, 1g lasted me from saturday afternoon till tuesday late night. Had to fe with him but was willing to risk on $40 or so purchase for half g first couple times. First couple orders were processed super quick and arrived next day on midday purchases. Last couple were kind of annoying and took like 24hours to show in transit but still arrived withing about 48hrs or 2 mail days. Def recommend

theXchange-
Solid vendor. Instant responses and super fast shipping, stealth far more advanced than dispater, his gear is cheap and still good but slightly below dispaters for my personal taste on the foil but its also a descent amount cheaper and turnaround and comms were way quicker... def recommend also didnt have to fe which is nice



sk0rt-
bought 10mg valium off him, blue ones by auprin, they were legit and did the trick for me, comms and turnaround two thumbs up. Didnt have to fe, only problem he's been out of stock ever since, would def recommend if he comes back. Stealth was descent.


    ByronLugosi-
Just ordered a few subutex from him, didnt have to fe, hoping to receive tomoz, comms were great and he even added a free shipping option when I messaged him about the .08 btc shipping charge on a .15btc purchase. So far excellent and I'm sure I'll receive tomorrow or friday....

Also did a few lotto purchases, didn't bink anything...

Overall so far I have to agree with this chick I know who I showed the site to "this is definitely one of the coolest things I've ever seen in my life." I'm personally surprised by how easy it is to send packages domestically uk-uk with royal mail. Overnight service from her majesty!

Gonna take a  break now from anything heavy, florida hurricanes and humidity with a bit of sun and women, probably a lot more booze and xanax in my near future. Hope some newby uk members find this useful

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: shifting sands on June 13, 2013, 02:10 pm
Quote from: Japan1980 on June 12, 2013, 04:42 pm
Just a bit of info that may help people that are clucking or waiting and forced into WD's

This is an absolute godsend -

Loperamide is one of the strongest opiates out there and you can buy it over the counter, it's as strong as fenatyl - however does not cross the BBB so you don't get a a buzz off it, but it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms as it binds to the other receptors in the body.

It's the active ingredient in Imodium, but in any main supermarket you can buy the cheap own brand boxes for like 79p for 6 (2mg each).

I've had this little trick up my sleeve for a few years and for me it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms at a dose of 16-20mg (8-10 tablets as they have 2mg in each), for me. Other people need less, or some more - but IT WORKS.

If you google about it there is a wealth of people that it's helped. Seems to work for most people, but not for the small minority.

I once done a gram a day habit withdrawal using Loperamide only and felt fine all the way through.

Just thought I'd throw it out there for people that are not well and fancy getting well by simply going to the supermarket! 

Peace
J

mate that's fantastic i have a mate who is desperate to give up. this will really help. Thanks my first +1 to you

It's the active ingredient in Imodium, but in any main supermarket you can buy the cheap own brand boxes for like 79p for 6 (2mg each).

I've had this little trick up my sleeve for a few years and for me it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms at a dose of 16-20mg (8-10 tablets as they have 2mg in each), for me. Other people need less, or some more - but IT WORKS.

If you google about it there is a wealth of people that it's helped. Seems to work for most people, but not for the small minority.

Hey p23, let me know how you get on. I think it would be hard to make it work with meth. what ml are you on. I do know that as it can't cross the BBB it works on opiate receptors in the GUT. If you take it with white or pink Grapefruit juice that will help the  Loperamide cross the BBB. For those on methadone you will need all the help you can get to cross the BBB. If you look Loperamide and graopefruit juice and you did not have a habbit you would get stoned. Please not if you are on Blood preasure pills or other medication then you must check if its safe to consume grapefruit juice. If certain drugs cross the bbb or the bbb lets to much of that drug in you could od. I know its mad but check out grapefruit and the effect it has on helping some drugs get to your brain.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: pakchoi23 on June 14, 2013, 03:20 pm

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on June 14, 2013, 04:47 pm
Quote from: shifting sands on June 14, 2013, 12:21 pm
Quote from: pakchoi23 on June 13, 2013, 04:33 pm
Quote from: shifting sands on June 13, 2013, 02:10 pm
Quote from: Japan1980 on June 12, 2013, 04:42 pm
Just a bit of info that may help people that are clucking or waiting and forced into WD's

This is an absolute godsend -

Loperamide is one of the strongest opiates out there and you can buy it over the counter, it's as strong as fenatyl - however does not cross the BBB so you don't get a a buzz off it, but it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms as it binds to the other receptors in the body.

It's the active ingredient in Imodium, but in any main supermarket you can buy the cheap own brand boxes for like 79p for 6 (2mg each).

I've had this little trick up my sleeve for a few years and for me it completely removes all withdrawal symptoms at a dose of 16-20mg (8-10 tablets as they have 2mg in each), for me. Other people need less, or some more - but IT WORKS.

If you google about it there is a wealth of people that it's helped. Seems to work for most people, but not for the small minority.

I once done a gram a day habit withdrawal using Loperamide only and felt fine all the way through.

Just thought I'd throw it out there for people that are not well and fancy getting well by simply going to the supermarket! 

Peace
J

mate that's fantastic i have a mate who is desperate to give up. this will really help. Thanks my first +1 to you

I am going to try this, I hope to fook it works ok with methadone...


Thanks for the video NAS.

Hey p23, let me know how you get on. I think it would be hard to make it work with meth. what ml are you on. I do know that as it can't cross the BBB it works on opiate receptors in the GUT. If you take it with white or pink Grapefruit juice that will help the  Loperamide cross the BBB. For those on methadone you will need all the help you can get to cross the BBB. If you look Loperamide and graopefruit juice and you did not have a habbit you would get stoned. Please not if you are on Blood preasure pills or other medication then you must check if its safe to consume grapefruit juice. If certain drugs cross the bbb or the bbb lets to much of that drug in you could od. I know its mad but check out grapefruit and the effect it has on helping some drugs get to your brain.

It does work with meth - you just need a lot more pills to hold the W/D's off.

Grapefruit juice WILL NOT help it cross the BBB. Loperamide is kept from crossing the BBB via P-glycoprotein(PGP) and grapefruit juice won't do shit - although grapefruit juice is an opiate potentiator, quite useful to get max effects if you have a shit bit of gear.

The only real research that shows how to make lopermide cross the BBB is to do with Quinidine as it is a p-glycoprotein inhibitor - however the research is very much non-conclusive.

Tonic water contains quinine which is a weaker version of Quinidine, so if you drink a few litre's of tonic water before taking Lopermide you may have a slim chance of some crossing the BBB.

But in all honesty - it doesn't have to cross the BBB to relieve W/D's. People have been trying to get lopermide to cross the BBB for years now, and there still isn't any concrete evidence it can. Although snippets here and there suggest it can. Also as soon as it becomes abusable in that way it won't be an OTC drug.

The whole point of my original post though was not so people can start getting off their tits on Imodium, but simply to use it as a tool to get clean, or use it on days where they can't score.

But trust me grapefruit juice is a waste of time with lopermide - all grapefruit juice can do is potentiate opiates, but there are far better potentiaters out there than G juice anyway.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on June 15, 2013, 05:56 pm
ahhh I see I was looking at your page earlier and was so close to making an order!!

Over all my years of using opiates I've never had crushed pod tea, what's your unbiased opinion of it? Will I get a nice buzz from it, and also how easy is it to prepare? I'm a lazy arse, so can't be bothered with some long drawn out mission to make some tea!

I kinda get the idea to let leave it in hot (not boiling) water for 20(ish) mins and then strain and drink - I take it that's the basics?

But what standard houseold item would you suggest to strain it with? and from what I gather you can re-use the same bit again and again, obviously losing strength each time.

Anyway it's always really good to see vendors on the forum - so nice one  8)
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: OpiumTea on June 15, 2013, 06:55 pm
Quote from: Japan1980 on June 15, 2013, 05:56 pm
ahhh I see I was looking at your page earlier and was so close to making an order!!

Over all my years of using opiates I've never had crushed pod tea, what's your unbiased opinion of it? Will I get a nice buzz from it, and also how easy is it to prepare? I'm a lazy arse, so can't be bothered with some long drawn out mission to make some tea!

I kinda get the idea to let leave it in hot (not boiling) water for 20(ish) mins and then strain and drink - I take it that's the basics?

But what standard houseold item would you suggest to strain it with? and from what I gather you can re-use the same bit again and again, obviously losing strength each time.

Anyway it's always really good to see vendors on the forum - so nice one  8)

Haha nice one! Your have to let me know if you ever order with a reminder ; )

But yeah.. in all honesty im very surprised more opiate lovers / addicts / do not use it as it can provide me (and many others) with a great buzz.. also the tea lasts for a stupidly long time.. id love to know why.. but drink a decent size brew at 10am and your be seen through till evening which is a great advantage compared to other stuff as we all know ; )

You got the method spot on there. Thats really all there is too it.. just add water that has already been boiled to the pod powder (I say about 2 cups per 10g's roughly) for strength then I say if you have heavy opiate tolerance than try 15g and work up from there.. some people buzz off 5gs but i personally would need a lot more. Also when brewing if you add some lemon juice when you add the water it helps with the extraction of the morphine / codeine etc and if you can handle drinking the tea cold (ish) then i would leave it for as long as you can and stir from time to time as I beleive (again just a personal thing) this produces a stronger high.. when you strain the tea just use a household civ, nice n easy ; )

The slush can indeed be used after its initial use.. I'd say up to 4 times but probavbly no more. Now this is a GREAT way to get the most out of your money and drugs and is surprisingly effective.. I put this on my vendor page but I guarantee 90% or so of the people that buy the tea from me dont do it!!

OPIUM TEA DRINKERS RE-BREW YOUR LIQUID IT WILL SAVE YOU A QUICK QUID  8)

Hope this helps!

OT

So I wanna leave a quick short review for my main UK to Uk Heroin #3 vendor. Of course I'm talking about : dispater =)

Quality has always been consistent as well as quantity and each time I receive one of his nice big fat chunky rocks of gear, it makes me wanna JIZZ IN MY PANTS!

Shipping is always under 24 hours which is what makes his service unbeatable compared to others. It's faster for me to buy gear off of him compared to buying it on the street! In fact I don't ever PM the guy. I just place the order, wait half a day and then wake up to a nice lovely package with my name on it waiting for me at the door the very next morning! It's like Christmas for me at least 3 times a week hahahaha =)

His communication is excellent. If I do ever PM him, he gets back to me within a day which is a lot more than I could say compared to other vendors who are just as busy, yet only reply once every couple days!
Packaging is perfect as always for domestic orders. Very secure and quite simple too.

So all in all dispater is the most professional, organized and extremely generous vendor here at the road for the best UK to UK Gear! I'm chasing a nice fat rock of heroin on foil at the moment, my eyes are so pinned I'm surprised I even managed to type this well! Gear always runs so smooth, tastes so good and feels so clean! Has some great legs too and keeps me high all day!!!  8)

Thanks man, keep it up! I'll always be back for more...

My experience with Dispater -

I had a couple of questions for him about his heroin which he replied to within a couple of hours, politely and intelligently. So I decided to place an order for 0.5g.

I finalized early due to this being only my 9th transaction, though I did it with confidence after having dealt with him before. The order was quickly processed and arrived the next morning.

The product was put in a baggy then vacuum packed and the package was inconspicuous. I weighed the two little rocks at 0.6g. The quality was excellent for the price.

From now on I won't look further than Dispater for my coke or heroin. Professional service & great communication.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on June 16, 2013, 10:18 am

    I have used Dispaters services many times over the past few months, buying my Coke and Gear off him.
The service is second to none, the product is nearly always with me within 24hrs, and the few that have not made it in 24hrs have been with me in 48hrs.
    His packages are always vac sealed and blend in with the regular mail, very professional.
My most recent buy, half a G of both Brown & Coke.
The Gear was really very good. Over the past few years I noticed that a lot of UK street gear and some of the SR gear 'Runs' with a 'Red' tinge which I do not like it seems to indicate that the H is not very strong, I'm not sure what it is but I guess it must be some sort of 'Cut'.
Dispaters H does NOT run with a 'Red' tinge. It comes in Rocks and is always a little over, which is great. It runs lovely on the Foil and tastes of Poppies, which for me, is a really good sign.
I have tried all the UK vendors and apart from one other vendor Dispaters is the BEST!! The other vendors gear may be a bit stronger but it is more than 3 times the price of Dispaters. I choose Dispaters, I have a habit and value is really important to me. Dispaters H is the best value I
have found on Silk Road.
The Gear is fast acting and I don't have to smoke a whole half G to get a buzz. The feeling is a proper old skool No3, very euphoric and makes me talkative with a lovely sense of  well being. My tolerance is quite high and I take Subutex most days, but Dispaters Gear 'breaks' through the Subbies within a few lines, which is something a lot of the H on SR does not do.
I will be continuing to buy Dispaters Heroin, & if you like clean No3 that is excellent value for money, supplied with a near faultless service, I suggest, you give it a try.
C

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on June 16, 2013, 12:50 pm
Quote from: FocusUK on June 16, 2013, 09:37 am
Quote from: Japan1980 on June 15, 2013, 05:56 pm
ahhh I see I was looking at your page earlier and was so close to making an order!!

Over all my years of using opiates I've never had crushed pod tea, what's your unbiased opinion of it? Will I get a nice buzz from it, and also how easy is it to prepare? I'm a lazy arse, so can't be bothered with some long drawn out mission to make some tea!

I kinda get the idea to let leave it in hot (not boiling) water for 20(ish) mins and then strain and drink - I take it that's the basics?

But what standard houseold item would you suggest to strain it with? and from what I gather you can re-use the same bit again and again, obviously losing strength each time.

Anyway it's always really good to see vendors on the forum - so nice one  8)

I can recommend OT and his pods :) He seems a really nice guy and the pods do the trick.

Though I don't bother making the tea now I just grind 15g in my pestle & mortar down to a very fine powder then mix with orange juice and knock the whole thing back  8)

Do you grind it and knock it back, purely due to the quickness of it. Do you get as good results? Or is the tea a better method if you've got the time!
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: FocusUK on June 16, 2013, 01:03 pm
Quote from: Japan1980 on June 16, 2013, 12:50 pm
Do you grind it and knock it back, purely due to the quickness of it. Do you get as good results? Or is the tea a better method if you've got the time!

I do it for the convenience and effects, I find it takes a little longer to come on but that the results are better. It is quite a lot of powder to swallow though and needs to be ground very fine :)

dispater asked me to write a review on this thread,
I have ten orders through dis over the last month and 9/10 landed the next day. The packaging was great with the product in a sealed vac bag. As for product the H has been of good quality - i seemed to have had two different batches with the lighter one possible a touch stronger, no idea how it goes on the foil cos that aint my thing but in the spoon it cooks clear. I wont score it out of ten cos i think everyone has there own scoring method but for me a 15 yr user it was plenty strong enough and cheaper than some SR vendors. I tried two other vendors but I'm a Dispater fan for now, hope this continues for a long time.

Post by: linas879cizauskas on June 17, 2013, 10:09 am
RE: Dispater...

Dispater was the first person i ordered from on SR, and he has helped me all the way. Understandably, he is sometimes busy, but he has ALWAYS replied to my PM's within a few hours and my 3 items ive had off him ALL arrived next day.
(i guess im just a lucky S.O.B lol)

RE: Stealth: 5/5 Im not going to reveal the stealth, but rest assured you dont know whats in the package until you open it. This is perfect stealth for UK-UK.

Like ive read previously, ive also had 2 different batches so far off dis, one lighter, one darker, and the lighter one was stronger, and cleaner cooking in the spoon, although the darker one was still better than street level gear round my way.(ive been an IV user for 6months, Smoker for 10years previous, and on a 60ml a day methadone script)

I have ordered H off another vendor as well. (UK-UK)  He accepted my order within MINUTES and sent me a message to say it was in the post....This was 3hours before dis accepted mine, but his arrived and the other didnt. (it could be due to the distance from where i am, to them) THIS IS NOT A MESSAGE TO PUT THE OTHER VENDOR DOWN, IM JUST RELAYING MY EXPERIENCES, (gear was good too, it just took a day longer to get to me lol)

Sorry for typing a novel for you all to read, but being a newbie to the forums, i wanted to put some detail into my review, as some people don't trust newbies reviews (as said previously in this thread)

In conclusion, thanks Dispater for making my first, second and third journey along the road a happy one (although most of my clothes now have burn-holes and dribble-marks on!)

Thanks, and i'll be ordering again on thursday...

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion
Post by: xiferz on June 18, 2013, 06:24 am
Someone above talked about fake reviews - i don't think there is a need for that.  There aren't too many  H vendors on here from the UK - and I'm sure folk with bad experiences do post them.
Topnotch and Dispater gear about the same for me - better than local street but not as good as FrankMathews #3 (  I prefer FM#4 of course but waiting for international orders messes my head up too much  - someone else noticed that the postie seems to turn into 'the man' when he's got something for us in that we always gotta wait).

 I've been ordering from Dispater ever since TN made a mistake with one order - genuine mistake which then had further delays in comms due to site problems.  I'd have no problem ordering from TN again but have no reason to as Dispater's Dispatch is second to none, I've ordered after 5pm and still got next day delivery.  Gear is good, double smellproof wrap with quality stealth.  Comms have been good - had no issues to discuss except once when i forgot to finalise (actually had a timeout and then forgot to go back to do it again) and then he was polite about reminding me so it didn't get as far as auto-finalise which would have looked bad for me. 

There are a couple of lower priced options but i get put off those as there is always talk of delays etc in the fb.  Dispater has 100% rating and you don't get that without making the effort to get it right. 

jm2c

2 weeks ago i got 3.5g #3 from frank , and to be honest it was garbage , terrible nothing like the quality i had been getting from him , i was really pissed off about it , i put a few comments on the forum about it pluss starting a thread about the quality of franks #3 . that day his account was suspended for something else .
i thought that was it my money lost as i had fe'd.
when his account went back up i messaged frank to tell him about it , and by this time he had got a new batch of #3 in .  and fair play to the guy he got back to me asking if i wanted a reship of the new stuff .
a few days past , i thought he was going to make out he had sent it but really he had not . then yesterday i got a little surprise in the post .
hats off to the guy he sent it , and lets face it he didnt need to bother i dont think my review would have made much difference to his sales , but that tells me he is a very good vendor , a straight up honest guy , that wants to help his buyers sort any problems out . i have bought from frank now over 15 times always received my order , in good time, 2 days normally . and this has only reassured me that frank can be trusted

What an outstanding vendor. I haven't tried his #3 yet as I am still soaring on that exceptional #4 he sent me.

@ Dabbler - I had some of uglydolls gear about 2 weeks ago and I thought it was good gear, no complaints here. Although, I know it varies from batch to batch with uglydoll.

Logged in briefly to see what you thought of dispasters h. alas i will log in tomorrow instead.

No need really.

I've just had a hit, and it's not great. Don't get me wrong it's not bad - and for the price and the extra I got I'm happy with the purchase. I doubt I would buy any more from dispater though as there is much better gear about then theirs.

Overall, I'm pleased as I got .73 for 0.59BTC - but I wouldn't recommend his gear. It's handy if you need next day and are desperate, because you WILL get it next day.

The gear itself isn't too bad and better than most street gear, but on SR there is much better quality about. Put it this way, I wouldn't be able to type properly if it was top quality gear. I'm typing with one eye closed and I did get a gouch off the hit, but it was quite a big hit

I'd give it a 7/10.

I gave a 5/5 rating on his page, and I intend to leave it at that - purely for the rapid delivery, great comms, and the fact it was so over weight. If it wasn't these things I would edit it and give it a 3 or 4 out of 5.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on June 19, 2013, 03:11 pm
Quote from: theweeman on June 19, 2013, 03:06 pm
i found the stealth good , without going into detail it was double vac sealed . i can understand people being worried about post from the netherlands , but in over 20 , 25 orders from there i have never had any trouble .

That's true - I've probably had 50+ orders from the Netherlands and not had one single problem. Our customs are so slack it's no problem at all.

Countries such as Australia and the US it's a different case entirely, but the UK isn't a problem with dutch orders.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on June 19, 2013, 04:03 pm
Hello
I got home from work today to a letter from FOREVER young , its not the first time I have used him, & although his packing is a bit suss I always get it. This time I had messaged him to ask for the Gear to be put in a wrap before he put it in his little plastic sealed bags. He had not done this, when I opened the letter the gear was stuck to paper and the bag had burst, most of the gear stuck to the glue from the sticker & it was impossible to get the gear & there was dust all over the paper, Gutted!! I tried to scrape as much as I could up, but I must of got a bit of glue or paper in it and when I tried to smoke it, it just frazzled. I have sent him a message & I have not finalized yet. What is the best thing to do, please, I'd be grateful for any advice. Somebody else had already moaned about his bags, and my last order, even though it was way over was in a huge bag with loads stuck to the bag and little 'puffs' of dust when you moved the 'sealed' bag.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on June 19, 2013, 04:46 pm
Quote from: charas420 on June 19, 2013, 04:03 pm
Hello
I got home from work today to a letter from FOREVER young , its not the first time I have used him, & although his packing is a bit suss I always get it. This time I had messaged him to ask for the Gear to be put in a wrap before he put it in his little plastic sealed bags. He had not done this, when I opened the letter the gear was stuck to paper and the bag had burst, most of the gear stuck to the glue from the sticker & it was impossible to get the gear & there was dust all over the paper, Gutted!! I tried to scrape as much as I could up, but I must of got a bit of glue or paper in it and when I tried to smoke it, it just frazzled. I have sent him a message & I have not finalized yet. What is the best thing to do, please, I'd be grateful for any advice. Somebody else had already moaned about his bags, and my last order, even though it was way over was in a huge bag with loads stuck to the bag and little 'puffs' of dust when you moved the 'sealed' bag.

Firstly DO NOT FINALISE.

Send him a message explaining what the issue is and ask for a reship. If you have a camera take a photo, there are plenty of photo uploading sites on tor so it will be anonymous. If you send him a photo and he still won't reship or refund, then wait and go to resolution and explain exactly what happened.

If you don't have a camera it won't matter, just follow the same procedure and if they won't reship or refund still take it to resolution. They should help you out, as the resolution center isn't just for non-arrivals, it's for all sorts, including not being happy with product or packaging. A photo would help in resolution, but it's not vital.

Just don't finalise, even if they say they'll reship - wait till the reship arrives then finalise.

Hope that helps a little bit.....The main thing is to not finalise. They may say 'finalise and we'll send a reship' so many people have fallen for that as you'll probably not get the reship as it wont be sent.

I would be gutted, I hope things work out for you man  8)
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: OpiumTea on June 19, 2013, 04:56 pm
As J said the site is run tighter than most other sites out there  8) so the support team will help you out.. thats if it ends up gettin that far as hopefully it wont!

OT

the #3 is right good stuff , would say its better than franks and a bit better than c63 . it runs nice on the foil , clean and its got a very good taste . well worth the money .
i messaged the dr yesterday to say to him about waiting , he got back within a couple of hours saying on my next order he would make it up to me .
i will defo order from him again cause it seems he has got the postage sorted out

so is it good?

cause I tried H yesterday for my first time, I never used tinfoil before so my technique sux! but after some try and wasted H I didn't burn and it slide very well.
But I don't get a lot of smoke to inhale, why? what am i doing wrong?
I didn't felt much! and I smoked, or tried to, more than recommended dose for a first timer on opiaces...

p.s. sorry if Im ot, but I was wondering where is the problem, me or h? :D
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: pakchoi23 on June 20, 2013, 08:14 am
Quote from: TorXic on June 20, 2013, 07:40 am

so is it good?

cause I tried H yesterday for my first time, I never used tinfoil before so my technique sux! but after some try and wasted H I didn't burn and it slide very well.
But I don't get a lot of smoke to inhale, why? what am i doing wrong?
I didn't felt much! and I smoked, or tried to, more than recommended dose for a first timer on opiaces...

p.s. sorry if Im ot, but I was wondering where is the problem, me or h? :D

It's good.

If you're not getting much smoke coming off the gear as it runs, you need to increase the heat a bit. Either run it more slowly or turn your lighter up a touch.

Want the advice of someone who has been using H for 16 years? Throw it away and don't do it again.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: ukdabbler on June 20, 2013, 11:45 am
Hey all,

So after my statement that dispater's gear is "utter shite" the other day I decided to give it another go as after all it was a few months back I tried it.

It arrived today, which was amazingly fast considering I ordered after 6pm.

Stealth was perfect.

I'm gonna to have to bite my tongue on this one as the gear is actually alright! It's better than beston3's stuff and slightly better than forever young I'd say. I'm quite happy with it and think this will be my emergency backup for when I run out of c63amg's gear or am in between orders.

Thanks

I smoke mate,

Have you tried c63amg's gear? It isn't a patch on that.

I guess I would rank it as follows. (UPDATED)

c63amg - 9/10

Forever young - 6.5/10

Dispater (current batch)- 5.5/10 (previous batches 2/10)

Beston3's stronger stuff - 4/10

To be honest though it does vary batch to batch, the UK vendors I wouldn't bother with unless you are absolutely desperate and have ran out or something. It's best just to stock up on c63amg's stuff.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: jdddd on June 20, 2013, 07:35 pm
UKDABBLEr ive been using H on the road for the last year maybe 13months, I tend to make 1 or 2 orders a month and just use back to back for guts of a week then take a week off then re-order etc.etc. Only recently set up a forum account as never bothered about it. I have used a lot of vendors and generally speaking I found c63 number 3 to be better than franks but not by too much. Ive never tried number 4 as im shite at waiting for a drug to kick in so I would definitely be a prime candidate to re-dose thinking what i had was shit and then OD. Just as a heads up I got 2.5 of c63 no 3 current batch last friday and I have to say I was very happy nice strong buzz and plenty of light nods done, my only issue is that it was too good as I intended trying to make the 2.5 stretch a bit more than usual and yet wednesday night I ran out now for an anxious wait to put some money a side and re-order.

Just wondering has any of you ever tried the 10mg tablets of oxycontin??? I can get these fairly easily and often just eat them BUT i was wondering if there is anyway to smoke them I have tried before but didnt have too much success and I am convinced Im just wasting my shit?

And im really glad to hear of dispater stuff imroving just incase there any delays on the dutch stuff in future a wee .5 too keep u going while you wait would be nice

thanks for any help its great to see people having a laugh and generally help each other out as it proper casts aside the image the media places on "junkies" particularly if opiates are your thing.

Hi there mate,

Yeah this forum is a great place and there are some really wonderful people here. I love this community.

With regards to oxycontin, it is an absolute waste to smoke them. The best way is to crush em up and eat them. I sometimes get 80's on SR as a treat (not recently as time are tough). They are brilliant and have a great uppy kinda buzz. How much do you pay for the 10's if you don't mind me asking?

I find with the UK no3 I end up smoking it non stop all day chasing that buzz I get from the dutch gear but never quite seem to get there and then left with terrible lungs!

I've been toying with the idea of plugging recently, has anyone tried it?

Cheers.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: jdddd on June 20, 2013, 10:36 pm
"Hi there mate,

Yeah this forum is a great place and there are some really wonderful people here. I love this community.

With regards to oxycontin, it is an absolute waste to smoke them. The best way is to crush em up and eat them. I sometimes get 80's on SR as a treat (not recently as time are tough). They are brilliant and have a great uppy kinda buzz. How much do you pay for the 10's if you don't mind me asking?

I find with the UK no3 I end up smoking it non stop all day chasing that buzz I get from the dutch gear but never quite seem to get there and then left with terrible lungs!

I've been toying with the idea of plugging recently, has anyone tried it?

Cheers."

To be honest man my dad has a really bad condition and is prescribed a shit load of pain relief oxycontin (10 mg), tramadol (50mg) and k-pak (codeine) tablets among others and various pain patches (possibly fent but I need to chech), but the last few years he found himself too doped up and as such generally tries to hold back on taking what he is supposed to and instead lives with a lot of pain, what this means is he tends to have a lot of stuff left over and as i dont live with him but visit him every few weeks i go through his old stuff and steal a few strips or boxes of stuff and either he doesnt notice or doesnt mention it. I have a good respectable job (not meant in a big headed way) and wouldnt come across as someone who takes the shit I do so even if he did think he lost some I would doubt he would think it was me particularly as I dont be in his house for any great lengths of time. But on the same hand I try not to do this too often as if I ever do get caught the game would be well and truly up. Plus as I have old injuries that play up at times I can usually get a few strips of tramadol if I say im in pain and need help getting to sleep which I find can take away any urges if im waiting on an order. But i do what you said and just chew and swallow a lot of them in one go 14 tonight (taken in 2 goes of 7 with about a 3 hour space).

 I was wondering but I dont tend to get much of a rush or buzz of this at all do you think this is simply due to tolerance or would chewing/ crushing one 70mg oxy have a greater effect than eating 7 10 mgs at once??

And your right about the community im really enjoying chatting and reading a lot of what has been said and I am now glad i have an account set up.

Is there any other opiates you would reccomend when your trying to have a break from the H?

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: ukdabbler on June 20, 2013, 11:03 pm
Quote from: jdddd on June 20, 2013, 10:36 pm
"Hi there mate,

Yeah this forum is a great place and there are some really wonderful people here. I love this community.

With regards to oxycontin, it is an absolute waste to smoke them. The best way is to crush em up and eat them. I sometimes get 80's on SR as a treat (not recently as time are tough). They are brilliant and have a great uppy kinda buzz. How much do you pay for the 10's if you don't mind me asking?

I find with the UK no3 I end up smoking it non stop all day chasing that buzz I get from the dutch gear but never quite seem to get there and then left with terrible lungs!

I've been toying with the idea of plugging recently, has anyone tried it?

Cheers."

To be honest man my dad has a really bad condition and is prescribed a shit load of pain relief oxycontin (10 mg), tramadol (50mg) and k-pak (codeine) tablets among others and various pain patches (possibly fent but I need to chech), but the last few years he found himself too doped up and as such generally tries to hold back on taking what he is supposed to and instead lives with a lot of pain, what this means is he tends to have a lot of stuff left over and as i dont live with him but visit him every few weeks i go through his old stuff and steal a few strips or boxes of stuff and either he doesnt notice or doesnt mention it. I have a good respectable job (not meant in a big headed way) and wouldnt come across as someone who takes the shit I do so even if he did think he lost some I would doubt he would think it was me particularly as I dont be in his house for any great lengths of time. But on the same hand I try not to do this too often as if I ever do get caught the game would be well and truly up. Plus as I have old injuries that play up at times I can usually get a few strips of tramadol if I say im in pain and need help getting to sleep which I find can take away any urges if im waiting on an order. But i do what you said and just chew and swallow a lot of them in one go 14 tonight (taken in 2 goes of 7 with about a 3 hour space).

 I was wondering but I dont tend to get much of a rush or buzz of this at all do you think this is simply due to tolerance or would chewing/ crushing one 70mg oxy have a greater effect than eating 7 10 mgs at once??

And your right about the community im really enjoying chatting and reading a lot of what has been said and I am now glad i have an account set up.

Is there any other opiates you would reccomend when your trying to have a break from the H?

Hi there bud, the quote button is on the top right of the post you want to quote, just click it and it will take you through to reply.

Sorry to hear about your dad, it's never good to hear when people have problems managing pain. I've heard amitriptyline can be a good painkiller as well but it isn't opiate based so no rec value to it apart from it can help with sleep.

With regards to other opiates you could try fentanyl nasal spray, I haven't tried it yet but a few people in this thread use it. I've got some on the way so will let you know.

I only really use H and oxycontin. I've tried Dicanol as well but the pill was bunk and didn't do anything. I've got a replacement pill in the cupboard which I'm trying at the weekend.

The ones I really want to try are Opana and Dilaudid but I can't seem to find anyone outside of the US selling it and don't want to order from there as I'd worry about customs. Maybe someone can recommend a vendor?

What do you use currently?

Take care mate

Currently i mainly use c63 #3 I tend to buy 2.5 grams every other week when I use I usually just smoke every night after the gym and after work (bit of a contadiction and I wonder y i dont get many results haha). With using every night the 2.5 grams tends to last a week maybe 10 days. Along side this I eat the oxy every few other month for a day or 2.

I was wondering what you opinion is on my question about my oxy use. Y do you think I barely get any buzz from taking 14 10mg tabs in 2 doses with a 3 hour gap? Do you think its down to tolerance or is taking multipile 10mg pills not as good as taking 1 70 or higher tablet? Thanks for all the responses so far I hope Im not being annoying. Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: OpiumTea on June 21, 2013, 11:49 am
Got my dutch packages today (and I have a day off work, how perfect  ;))

So.. FM no4.. good packaging (same as normal) Now the gear.. Ive been sniffing / smoking UK stuff for last week or two.. WOW, I love holland lol 8) so yeah its lovely. I remember reading just now someone who posted sayin they smoke all day chasing that buzz you get from dutch stuff. I almost forget the buzz I get from the dutch stuff untill I use again.. Im there now though! I have a question though.. the no4 is very bitty (as normal) but im finding it really hard to break down into fine eoungh powder to sniff.. any help would be muchly appreciated?

C63.. packaging is still (and will prob always be) the best I have seen both on and off the road so fairshout to that brother.. The gear.. again WOW, I love the texture, so smooth  8) smells lush and gives 'that' buzz we all know so well..

i struggle to really write up a proper review as so hard to explain how you feel off something aint it?! But anyway.. really pleased with both and will order again this weekend so I get some before I run out (meaning no uk stuff hopefully!)

OT

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: sweetpoison on June 21, 2013, 01:18 pm
Quote from: ukdabbler on June 21, 2013, 12:59 pm

How does it look? Is it very fine powder or got small rocks/ crumbs? What colour? How does it taste?
As far as i remember about N4 it should smell anhydritis and it's got tiny crumbs/rocks and it's off grey or off yellow or off pink colour.
I dont know what to aqdvise. I also don't snort, so don't know how long it takes for buzz to start. I''d say, say if it takes 10 min for buzz to state when you snort, then snort little bit every 10 min to see what's going to happen.
Otherwise without lab test its diffcult to say what it is - fent or H and if it's fent how concentrated it is

Can i ask, when was your order with c63 marked in transit?

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: sweetpoison on June 21, 2013, 01:51 pm
 acetic anhydride or anhydritis is a chemical which is used to do diacetilation, basicly,- turn morphine into diamorphine. I've never seen N4 so dark. looks like N3 to me by its colour. The only thing you can do is just do small portions every so many minutes (10-20) if you're scared to OD to see what is your dose of this stuff, let us know how you do with it!
Oh really? you got your order after 24 hour? Are you from UK or not?
I'm in the UK, normally it takes 48 hours for his packages to arrive to me, but this time it's longer,- i placed my order on tuesday night, it was marked in transit on wednesday.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: sweetpoison on June 21, 2013, 04:03 pm
If it is fent - then it's short time action med 1-2 hours, but it can be benzos- then it can last for quite long. Don't panic, if nothing happen to you yet, then 100% you'll be alright. Try to sleep it off if you can.

i got a free sample from "seeds and stuff" he is thinking of selling #3 heroin and wanted to know what we thought of his gear . he is a vendor in the uk so buying from him you wont have problems with the customs .
so he sent out the sample yesterday and i got it this morning , so quick postage under 24 hours .

the gear itself was actually ok , there was a few rocks in the 0.2g sample . when i beetled it it looked good nice dark colour not red at all which is good as it means its not jumped all over with bash . it ran well and was clean . when i took the heat away it hardened quick which is a good sign cause shit stuff takes ages to harden back up.
to be honest its not as good as the dutch vendors, c63, frank matt, but its just as good if not better than the other uk heroin vendors. so if you were wanting to buy local i would get from seeds and stuff , once he puts up his listings for the #3.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: serenedion on June 26, 2013, 10:55 am
I understand your right to be concerned but if you do your research you should be fine
this worked for me

Here is the simplest CWE I can think of. It is easy and it takes less than 1 minute:

All you need is: 2 glasses (or anything that can hold water); Tissue paper; Spoon (or your finger, anything to stir with); Water.

STEP 1. Put pills in the first container. Pour enough COLD water to completely submerge pills (from the sink, no need to cool it in fridge). No need for excessive water. Stir untill all pills are completely dissolved.

STEP 2. Take 2 pieces of tissue on top of each other, hold them on top of the second container like a filter; gently pour contents of container 1 through filter into container 2.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: NoAddedSugar on June 26, 2013, 11:25 am
Yes, and that stops you from taking in too much paracetamol.  +1 serenedion

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: pakchoi23 on June 26, 2013, 05:23 pm
Evening ladies and gents,

Back after a week in the countryside, needed the break. Only though about gear once I was on my way home, it's SO fucking psychological the bastard stuff! Some days even looking at my car is a fucking trigger *head-desk*

Anyway, bummed to see a few of you getting messed about by some UK vendors, either that or the postman is onto you and he's a junkie too.

Japan - I'm about to read your blackmail thread.

To anyone asking the 100mg morphine tablets are pretty strong. I can usually smoke 0.5-1g of c63's stuff in one day as a comparison. I did 25ml methadone IV and one 100mg morphine tablet and was so shit faced I actually went to sleep. The morphine is very long acting, I was still really pinned and numb the next day and still feeling it a bit on day 3. I just crushed it between two teaspoons to break the slow release seal on the tablet and necked it with some water. Would love to have some more.

Someone asked about Midnight Cowboy. Now this person gets great drugs, but intermittently and they have a habit themselves so don't be expecting 24 hour service. They will come through for you though, always keep you updated with good comms. They're away I believe until the end of this week. If you can spare the btc and have the time, well worth a look.

Really want to order some more from c63 but I have so much shit to do these next few weeks.


Hope you're all well (not sick) and enjoying this great British summer.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: NoAddedSugar on June 26, 2013, 08:20 pm
Hey Japan, I ordered a 0.2 of BO3's best stuff because I needed 24 hour delivery. I've been hanging out for days waiting for dispater's order which hasn't arrived and been sick as fuck. But today BO3's arrived. It's more than 0.2, you can see by eye. It's a lovely colour and cooks up really clean, smells great. I managed to get three medium strength hits from the little bag, it's too expensive, way more than c63's (!) but it arrives fast and is lovely. I saved the biggest hit for last and had it 2 hours ago. I was fully nodding for 30-45 mins and now I feel nice. Just a shame that I may have nothing tomorrow. His gear is nice though, best of the UK heroin that I have sampled. I wish I had more cash!
Oh, thought I'd share with you that every time I say your name in my head I say it like they did in street fighter 2  ;D ;)

I think Opium tea sells them. Just try not to get Suboxone, try to get subutex or pure Bupe, as the suboxone have some thing like naltroxone in them to block any opiates, and make you rattle if you do take gear with them. Pure Bupe will not block the gear or make you sick if you do use.
I take subutex most days and gear will break through them no problem, if the gear is any good that is. That is why I like them. I was on a Methadone script for years and years, and could not get high off gear, I could feel it but not like I do now on the subbies.
Best of luck, the drug abuse centers seem to always make you wait, bloody stupid they want you to stop but won't help when you need them.
I hate being on a script it really ties you down, and you have to jump through all their hoops before they help.
Best of luck to you mate, & plus 1
C
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Nakorx on June 27, 2013, 04:35 pm
 A Quick review of Seeds and Stuff   High Quality Heroin - 1g (UK DOMESTIC) which is brown No.3:
Very quick delivery, I ordered on Sunday, it was in transit on Monday and delivered Tuesday! First Class Royal Mail used, so next day delivery (90% of the time.

It was well packed, don,t want to say too much but was in heat sealed vac bag, if you had ordered something smelly it would not have been detected.
The stealth could be improved by using typed labels rather than hand written but I  have spoken to vendor about this and they tell  they like to vary their methods. (I still think typed is best IMO).

The communication was truly excellent, this is an area where many vendors are a far too lax IMO. I know they are (well some are) very busy but customers do not like to be kept in the dark and having to wait 24 hour for a reply.These guys answer within a few hours (although whether they will be able to keep this up remains to be seen.

Product weight was a tad over at 0.24g since the sample size was stated as being 0.2g (and yes my scales are accurate and regularly calibrated, complete with new batteries)

Finally the product itself was good, and this gear was better IMO than nearly all the present UK vendors except TopNotch's Afghan Brown No.3, although he off the grid ATM. I would say that it was very similar in effect to theXchanges last batch of brown before he disappeared.
It does not dissolve completely in Vit C, leaving a small residue which can not be boiled up again like some brown's can to give a bit more. But the buzz is good and the legs are average and I was pleased with it.
For the price I think it is very good value for money, and I will use again.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Nakorx on June 27, 2013, 05:11 pm
Quote from: ukdabbler on June 26, 2013, 07:01 pm
It was 0.5 of H.

Edit: I removed some details of correspondence until this case is resolved. If it's not resolved to my satisfaction i shall be posting correspondence.

If it goes to Resolution, their is no need to post the correspondence (the PM's I assume you mean). The Administrator who reviews your case will have access to all the relevant PM's whether you have deleted them or not (unless they were encrypted). I am talking from experience because I had trouble with the Xchange and had some old posts I had deleted. But it also states it in the SR Wiki.

What is your latest news with  FOREVER young? I ordered 0.5g H from him a week ago, he marked it in transit the following day and still has not turned up. Does not reply to my PM although he reads them.

Will be going to Resolution soon and am trying to understand how they work the refund rate out. But no one seems to know exactly. I think I will have to contact SR support to find out. One guy I read recently said he was given a refund rate of 8.5% yet it worked out at 0.85% if taken literally. I do not see how it can be done because of the fluctuation in Bitcoin value.

I think you will like Seeds and Stuff gear, I just put up a review above. Bot as good as the gear from Netherlands but for the price I don't think you will be disappointed.
But I want to know how many people having trouble with FOREVER young not delivering the good even though they are marked "in transit".
I have been on SR for 15 months and have never had a domestic UK parcel/letter go missing, although the chances are supposedly 1 in 150.
I thought t was just me but there seems to be at least two more who have not received. As was mentioned earlier, if we all stick together on this then when we go to Resolution we might and I say might, get a better result.
So all those who are waiting for more that 4 days for a package from FY please let me know by adding to ths thread. Thanks to all of you.

Better not to report him unless we ALL report him together, otherwise it will be dealt by different Admin staff, and by the time they realize they have had multiple reports about the same person it may be to late.
Also reporting a vendor or even an item is for when they have broken the rules in a bad way, and this is not bad although it is to us. Trouble is, some of his orders are getting through so he has become a selective scammer or he has just plain forgotten, or and this is the most likely, one of his "friends" who does his letterbox run has ripped him off.
I urge you to join the thread that ukdabbler has started or post it below. Thanks

You should be able to post on his thread un(less he created it outside of the Newbies board and I did not think he had, but I will check.

Leave your info on the thread anyway, we ar(well I am) trying to find out how many poeple have not had their order delivered (not concerned with details of order) especially after it has been marked "in transit".

There is a lot of vendors doing this now, and it makes me so angry >:(
in transit should mean just that, that your order is on its way or it has been labelled and will ship later that day (as c63 does it).
The only exception to this is people who are asked to FE before vendor will send but that does not apply here. (Unless he has got all our orders cocked up!)

Vendors seem to mark your order as in transit so you can't cancel, even though they know they cannot fulfill it until later because  they have run out of product, or stamps or coffee or common sense most likely.
Keep the info coming in guys because we (at least me and ukdabbler are running out of time!
DO NOT LET IT AUTO FINALISE - it will look real bad on your stats, he will get your money and his stats will not be affected.

Sorry linas879cizauskas didn't see you there.

It does seem though like you are clamoring for this hallowed free gram from dispater.

I've had no issues with the man, deliveries have varied from 1-3 days and quality has gone from decent to utter shite and back again.

It's not like we're all ganging up on certain vendors, just that through the general experience of the people who post on this thread the most brings up certain trends. One trend is that dispater can be a bit touch and go at times.

C'est la vie. Don't get nasty about it.

It's okay man, this thread just got a bit spammed by folk with 1 or 2 posts saying how good dispater was, it was a bit annying, no one likes spam. I have read your posts back and your posts did seem to get lost in the spam, even thought they weren't. C'est la vie. Welcome to thread (better late than never?)

As far as c63 goes it normally arrives in 2-3 days after it has been posted. E.G. Order Monday - Posted Tuesday - Delivered Thursday/Friday.  Really good service from the old Dutch/UK mail there.

Jimmy Boyles stuff is ridiculously strong. I was staggering down the street like a drunk and I never get that shit faced, ever. I was gone. Really really good shit. The only problem is the price, cos I think you get better value from, say c63 as the gear is still strong but a lot cheaper. I've had nothing but good stuff form Jimmy, I like him. And if I could afford his top level shit I would get it all the time. IT IS FUCKING STRONG, best gear ever.  I smoke not IV btw.

I really want to try his mid level stuff...but I have this fucking piss test coming up.....................




Hope that helped.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on July 01, 2013, 05:14 pm
Got some of uglydolls H through today - I must say for the price it is very good.

It's soooo cheap compared to most EU dealers - 0.2 for ฿0.17 and 0.5 for ฿0.43 and grams at ฿0.82 with delivery only 0.01.

Takes a little while to arrive, but I was pleasantly surprised about the quality - especially for the price.

Good stealth also. I'll be a return customer for sure - but it's the type of order you wanna place when you have enough gear for about 5 days, as that's how long it took to arrive. So it's certainly not recommended for a quick fix.....I have some of Best3 better batch here and some of uglydolls, and there's not much in it quality wise to be honest - that's purely based on IV'ing as I don't smoke.

Sounds legit. My bro always sends cards at xmas with not enough postage on. A card usually turns up some time in January asking for £.03 or something!

He must have used "large" envelopes and normal 1st/2nd class stamps.  Since no time or date is specified on the card I think it's safe to say you'll be fine collecting it.

I once had a pick up card for some weed I had ordered IRL.  I missed the delivery. Went to pick up at local sub-office. When the guy opened the hatch ALL I could smell was SKUNK!!!!  Lucky the guy was either oblivious or sympathetic. One of the benefits of living in a less populated area. Less tea leaves and more tolerance.

I shat myself, I couldn't very well deny the smell as I had already handed my card in. Turns out the knob head had wrapped an oz just in two nappy bags LMAO!!


Anyway, I digress.

I look forward to jimmy's cheap review and the others.

Have a good night.

Paki

I'd say there all very similar in strength.. quite a nice sniff/smoke.. defo getting me there.. unfortunately not as good as the dutch stuff (but what is!) all in all im a happy boy.. just awaiting my order from SunWu now which was marked in transit yesterday so should be hear tomorrow latest really im guessing..

Hey mate.

|Glad to hear your enjoying the number 4 from FM.. out of this world aint it ; )

I ordered 1g of the synthetic heroins about a week ago.. it sat processin for about 3-4 days but when sent it arrived next day..

This time I ordered 10g's and it was marked as sent quickly (I ordered weekend and marked sent yesterday) didnt arrive today so im hoping i receive it tomrrow..

Its really nice actually.. like some nice strong no4 but slightly different.. maybe not as warm and shorter acting but still very nice and the price is just so much cheaper.. for what I paid for 10gs I woud have got 5gs (if that) of h..

Hope your well!

Post by: uglydoll on July 02, 2013, 06:57 pm
Quote from: Japan1980 on July 01, 2013, 05:14 pm
Got some of uglydolls H through today - I must say for the price it is very good.

It's soooo cheap compared to most EU dealers - 0.2 for ฿0.17 and 0.5 for ฿0.43 and grams at ฿0.82 with delivery only 0.01.

Takes a little while to arrive, but I was pleasantly surprised about the quality - especially for the price.

So it's certainly not recommended for a quick fix.....I have some of Best3 better batch here and some of uglydolls, and there's not much in it quality wise to be honest - that's purely based on IV'ing as I don't smoke.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Japan1980 on July 03, 2013, 06:32 pm
Quote from: OpiumTea on July 03, 2013, 05:50 pm
ran out today and no show of sunwu's order.. fingers very tightly crossed it arrives tomorrow!

The bonus you've got is you always have your tea to fall back on when in need  ;D


BTW - If anyone hasn't tried OT poppy pod's they make a lovely cup of tea, very good value for money as you can re-use the same batch about 3 -4times. I really enjoyed it personally and it holds you nicely for hours and hours with a nice golden opium glow. I've kept some aside for times in need, perfect to have on stand by in case an order doesn't arrive.

Saying that, even if you have some H it's well worth trying his pods - I wasn't expecting much at all and was pleasantly surprised  8)

I'll be getting some more at some point for sure. Also once you nail the best way to make it, you can brew in bulk ad use it when you need/want to.

People moan about the taste, but I think it's fine - once you add the Lemon to help extract the goodies out of it and a bit of sugar it tastes just fine..

Haha I was only going to mention it briefly, ended up waffling out a quick review!

Post by: a1b2c3 on July 04, 2013, 10:27 am
JunkieXXL
HI ALL

I am intrested in JunkieXXL - Just to clarify Im talking about H3roin
I notice he is doing grams for about  £55 inc del - or 5 grams for £210
Although it isn't listed that means an eighth (3.5g) is about £150
Now that is getting close to OLD street prices and it means its viable as a small time street dealer to make money off of it
I just wondered if anyone has tried his gear. Obviously for these prices its not going to be top of the line 90% pure, but if we can get close to 40-50% pure Id be happy to sell that on the street as average to good quality street gear.
If I can reliably get it from his country of origin (EU) to the UK Id be as happy as butterfly on a warm summer day

Im looking for a good mid quality h3roin supplier who I can double my money on and this gentleman seems to be the man - most dealers here are selling premium gear at what is in my opinion extremely inflated prices and it just means you cant sell it on or at least not easily.
Hes got 100 positive so far on 81 transactions which is pretty fine and dandy OH and it dont require FE.

I am intrested in JunkieXXL - Just to clarify Im talking about H3roin
I notice he is doing grams for about  £55 inc del - or 5 grams for £210

If I can reliably get it from his country of origin (EU) to the UK Id be as happy as butterfly on a warm summer day



Im looking for a good mid quality h3roin supplier who I can double my money on and this gentleman seems to be the man - most dealers here are selling premium gear at what is in my opinion extremely inflated prices and it just means you cant sell it on or at least not easily.
Hes got 100 positive so far on 81 transactions which is pretty fine and dandy OH and it dont require FE.

I  have tried Junkiexxl 's gear, I had a 0.25 sample last week, the transaction went very well, they are nice to deal with, had a few messages, as I was short on the order, Junkiexxl let me off the postage,  domestic was free so he told me to use that option for postage, even though I'm in the UK. Junkiexxl could not of been more helpful .
The stealth was very good too.
The Gear was a light brown and ran well on foil, I had some of c63's at the same time and they look very similar. The gear is not as strong as c63's but that is very strong.
 It held me all day no problem and I would normally do half a G of UK gear so that tells me it must be quite strong.
I would definitely use them again.
C 

I'm also trying ugly doll, their prices are cheap too and from what I gather the gear is OK, I have a sample on order from her.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: xiferz on July 04, 2013, 02:14 pm
had a weird experience last night.  in the morning some gear from dispater arrived, was rattling a bit and it sorted that - seemed all fine.  after work had another hit - my tolerance aint that high - i only had about .25 all day but i was feeling better than i have for ages. i don't like nodding - prefer to be just this side of that - i was busying about the place doing this and that until about 2am - (had been awake since 4 am - not sleeping well lately).  Can't explain why it felt so good.  I've been using mostly local gear lately and it is crap tbh - just holds you and that's about it.  gear didn't seem much different to the last bit i got online - didn't feel _that_ special when i banged it.  damn i wish it felt that good all the time - would make all the other bullshit not matter a jot.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: OpiumTea on July 04, 2013, 06:08 pm
Quote from: Japan1980 on July 03, 2013, 06:32 pm
Quote from: OpiumTea on July 03, 2013, 05:50 pm
ran out today and no show of sunwu's order.. fingers very tightly crossed it arrives tomorrow!

The bonus you've got is you always have your tea to fall back on when in need  ;D


BTW - If anyone hasn't tried OT poppy pod's they make a lovely cup of tea, very good value for money as you can re-use the same batch about 3 -4times. I really enjoyed it personally and it holds you nicely for hours and hours with a nice golden opium glow. I've kept some aside for times in need, perfect to have on stand by in case an order doesn't arrive.

Saying that, even if you have some H it's well worth trying his pods - I wasn't expecting much at all and was pleasantly surprised  8)

I'll be getting some more at some point for sure. Also once you nail the best way to make it, you can brew in bulk ad use it when you need/want to.

People moan about the taste, but I think it's fine - once you add the Lemon to help extract the goodies out of it and a bit of sugar it tastes just fine..

Haha I was only going to mention it briefly, ended up waffling out a quick review!

Hey dude! Great read buddy thanks for that : )

and yes.. the tea has been my friend today.. I've really appreciated it actually.. its such a good opiate, im always pleasently surprised with its potency!

 soo easy mate.. just add some boiled water to the product, let sit for an hour give of take, add some lemon juice if you can, then strain and drink and enjoy ; )

Midnight Cowboy came through for me as well yesterday and I've been blasted for almost 24rs, methadone amps and 100mg MSTs. Nice.

MidnightCowboy came through for me too got 3 of those 100 mg mst just wondering what way do you take them ????


I just crush them between 2 teaspoons and neck 'em as fast as possible as they taste rank. They kick in quickly though and SO strong!

I know you can IV them but you have to extract the morphine from the waxy pill outer. I think it's done by cold water extraction but you'd have to check that on erowid or something. Also be careful IVing these puppies they are strong.  I find once I have eaten a couple then I can lose a whole day. Rather like some people on vallies, I black out, munch more pills and then wake up the next day having lost my keys and wondering who the fuck ate all the pills in the house! Best physical painkiller I have taken.

You THINK you're not usually wrong with things like this.  In my experience, which is once, you are wrong 100% of the time and thats all I go on. 

This is how rumours start - Loose mouthed individuals - the sort that would acuse total strangers of being a grass in prison -  I suggest  and would apreciate if you keep your opinions to yourself until you know you are correct.  I could make any number of accusations about you and claim I'm rarely wrong.  Just because I dont conduct myself in the manner in which your typical Glaswegian addict might,  I dont  feel I should have to prove the authenticity of my drug use and criminal activity.  I dont particularly appreciate it as it causes unnecessary trouble and suspicion.  Please carry on your with your own online activities and I will carry on with mine.  Instead of deciding you need to retaliate with anger and insults imagine someone had tried to call you out for being police and wonder if you would appreciate it or not especially on a site like this.   Cheers.

Hello again all,

 I have just smoked my small bag of Ugly Doll's Brown, I have to say it is VERY good. The letter came in a few days, well packaged.
Best of all the Gear is very strong for the price. I am more stoned of 1, 0.2 bag than if I had smoked half a G of most of gear from non Dutch vendors.
It runs great on the jimmy and the effect is a lovely No3 high, itchy nose, very talkative, and a great sense of 'well being'. It is the reason I love Smack
Thank you so much UD, I was not expecting any where near the quality you sent, it really is the best value for money I have had yet on SR, I mean a 10 bag and stoned just does not happen to me any more.
I hope to be able to use Ugly Doll's services often. Give them a try, my guess is that you will not be disappointed .
C

Finally, an order from Frank arrived today, which is swift, as he must have sent it out on Monday. Two days to the UK is very fast, and I am happy with the #3.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: xiferz on July 16, 2013, 12:22 pm
Quote from: Gregory House on July 15, 2013, 09:14 pm
Why in the UK does no one sell #4? Is this a recent drought or has it always been this way?

Been this way for a long time but probably not always.  I think it's to do with the routes
used - bulk of our stuff comes through the 'stans and into Europe from Turkey and Russia while the bulk of the Golden triangle flows around the pacific to Oz and the U.S.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: zazoo on July 16, 2013, 02:16 pm
Think there must be some big players who control the cheap prices and therefore only #3.  Strange how #4 makes it all the way to US but they dont really filter it to Europe.  Ordered with TN.  In transit next day so nto 24 hours but he is only warming up.  Smelt hot chocolate powder (very faint) and lot of smoek produced when smoking.  It is decent stuff tho but this isn't the same as his strong from before.  Glad to see him back and hopefully to his glory days soon.  Need a domestic vendor of H with good gear.  My tolly is higher tbh as I have been enjoying Golden Horse and FM #4 which arrived in 3days after FE.  Sandy small rocks of goodness. :D

Quote from: zazoo on July 16, 2013, 02:16 pm
Think there must be some big players who control the cheap prices and therefore only #3.  Strange how #4 makes it all the way to US but they dont really filter it to Europe.  Ordered with TN.  In transit next day so nto 24 hours but he is only warming up.  Smelt hot chocolate powder (very faint) and lot of smoek produced when smoking.  It is decent stuff tho but this isn't the same as his strong from before.  Glad to see him back and hopefully to his glory days soon.  Need a domestic vendor of H with good gear.  My tolly is higher tbh as I have been enjoying Golden Horse and FM #4 which arrived in 3days after FE.  Sandy small rocks of goodness. :D

Still not had my #4come through from FM!
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Gregory House on July 16, 2013, 06:27 pm
Quote from: xiferz on July 16, 2013, 12:22 pm
Quote from: Gregory House on July 15, 2013, 09:14 pm
Why in the UK does no one sell #4? Is this a recent drought or has it always been this way?

Been this way for a long time but probably not always.  I think it's to do with the routes
used - bulk of our stuff comes through the 'stans and into Europe from Turkey and Russia while the bulk of the Golden triangle flows around the pacific to Oz and the U.S.
Even so there are a few vendors in Europe who can get #4 so why doesn't the UK have a vendor? Not like there isn't a demand for it over here, some vendors need to get it sorted for the UK.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on July 17, 2013, 05:08 pm

 Anyone else tries TopNotch's Gear lately?? I must say he has a great service, the gear is very strong, I just smoked a bag, 0.2. The taste is very funny though, kind of tastes like drinking chocolate smells, if you get me. I only smoke nower days so don't know how it goes in the 'works'. The effect is good when smoked, it's just the taste to start is very strange. I seem to remember it long time back off the street.
I would be keen to know if anyone knows what the cut might be, & is it possible it is drinking chocolate??
I'm not really moaning, just interested. Any way the gear is definitely well worth the dosh, even with a funny taste. It is probably the strongest from a UK vendor, other than JB's pure Afghan
C

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on July 18, 2013, 12:28 pm
Hi
@gobstopper, not sure if its stronger than BO3, it is strong but has a funny taste when smoked that BO3 does not have.

@jdddd C63's is stronger and a nicer smoke, but takes a few day's and you can't buy small bags. TopNotches arrives quick and it works very well even if it does taste a little chocolaty. I use c63 when I can plan ahead.When I just need a bag quick I would use TN then  BO3. TN's is a lot cheaper than BO3 and for the price TN charges you can't go far wrong.

Best of luck with whoever you choose.
C

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: sweetpoison on July 19, 2013, 12:53 pm
Hi "fellow doppers"! :)
Hope everyone is alright.
I haven't been on the thread for a while myself,- had bad withdrawals (mostly psycho ones) from my last H marathon and decided to slow down and stay away from it (managed 10 days :))  ) and not to take it for more then 2 days in a raw any more. Also i enjoyed nice LSD trips being on my own in the wild. Only you need double dose of lsd if you're on subs, don't know about methadon.

2 jdddd - i think as well that c63's quality got worse a little bit, not much though! Still good H and very good service,  2 days to UK, the only reason i moved to FM at the moment is because as i IV, N4 is better for that, but his packet usually takes 3 days to arrive.
I'm also tempted to try TN's especially now when he's got 0.5 and 1 g listings.


Also, where are the regulars (shifting sands, japan, darktimes, etc)? Hope everyone is stocked up and doing well :)

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: sweetpoison on July 19, 2013, 09:02 pm
Quote from: ukdabbler on July 19, 2013, 05:09 pm

Could anyone tell me if I snort subutex it will work better? Can I catch a buzz off of it? Never used it before.

Hope you're all well people.

Take care.
1st of all you have to be withdrawing from H quite severely! - this is how sub works - it's opiate receptor agoinst/antagoinst . It withdraws other opiats from opiate receptors and settles itself on to them, if you're not withdrawing yet and take subs - what it'll do is it'll push all H out off of your receptors and it self will not be able to settle properly, causing you having the worst withdrawals ever!
 Regarding buzz - all people say different things, I don't feel any high even if i IV 20-30 mg, subs have ceiling effect,- no matter how much you take you'll only get what you get. Some people say subs give them nice H-like buzz, i wouldn't count on that just in case not to be disapointed. It's good to keep physical withdrawals at the bay and that's it (for me)
Hope you'll be alright with tour subs, only take them when you feel really bad!!!
2 pakchoi23 - thanks mate for getting worried of me, hope you are alright :) I did have a hard week last week but i'm fine now, have more LSD in transit. I've got to stay clean now for my tests till 29 th, so i'll be enjoying lucy trips for a while :)
 Hope you're all fine
I'm with you!

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: c63amg on July 20, 2013, 09:31 pm
Good Evening Sr Members,

We will have discounts on all of our listings for a couple of weeks. (till the middle of August).

The discounts are between 10-30% depending on the listing

The Discount is already withdrawn from the listings Price.

At the top of every listing you can see how much discount is given on the chosen listing.

We have a new C batch in Stock and a new H batch.

We will prepare sample packages of botch C and H that will be shipped on Monday.
(When the listing is up we will post a thread on the forums)

We hope that everybody gets a change to enjoy our listings with discount

There are special listings up for people that order to an address in the Netherlands

You can find all my listings on my homepage on SR.
Link: http://silkroadvb5piz3r.onion/silkroad/user/c55117c9a1


Regards,

C63AMG
