Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: dbz2000 on July 25, 2013, 02:04 pm
I will make a short review about my last gear which I got from some European vendors. It's about #3 which I smoked on foil. Place 1 was (in my opinion) the best, the last the worst. I bought from Frank Matthews, c63amg, uglydoll (NL), streetpharmacy, JunkieXXL (GER). I bought it in the last 1-2 months.

1. c63amg - good quality stuff. I think he provides the best #3 from the European guys. Stealth is unbeatable.

2. Frank Matthews - good stuff. Not as good as c63 but still okay for the price. But I don't like the taste from his brown stuff.

3. streetpharmacy - stuff is okay. nothing unusual good or bad. Vendor from Germany, first choice for domestics.

4. uglydoll - for the price it is very okay. I like that he (she?) sells small amounts, if you just want to have some nice hours an don't wanna spend so much money or wanna buy more (if you do this, you know you will smoke all of it  ;)).

5. JunkieXXL - it's really cheap, very fast shipping (from Germany), but in my opinion it was weaker than uglydolls stuff.


I'm not 100% sure about the last 3, because before i tested them, i smoked c63 and FM's gear 1 / 2 weeks before. But it should fit.


Best regards

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on July 26, 2013, 07:05 pm
Quote from: shifting sands on July 26, 2013, 04:29 pm
Guys,

can anyone tell me where I can get pure caffeine so I can make a #4 smokable.

you can buy it online, just google it. however if you get really desperate, in prison if you got gear that didn't run, which was often as fuckers would cut it with coffee whitener, we would put a small smear of butter on the foil then tip the gear on top before running it. works a treat and gives it creamy buttery taste, lol.

i recommend anchor butter, you can't get a better bit o butter on your foil, aye. :D

Right boys and girls and men and women quick question here just wondering do any of you drink when u use? I only smoke usually H#3 normally off C63 the thing is I tend to enjoy a drink (probs more of a problem than my H use but im by no means an alco) but I know that using both is dangerous but recently ive found if I get in from a night a take a little toke float about the room for a while then ko. Was just wondering is there a certain limit that use would all say that you should in no circumstance use H after drinking and on the flip side of that whats safest amount to have drunk (other than none) when using ?

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Waitrose on July 29, 2013, 01:03 pm
Quote from: Gregory House on July 29, 2013, 12:37 am
I see Waitrose has some feedback from his samples, anyone from this thread leave feedback? Cannot view the feedback as i assume the samples were a custom order? Be good to hear what the stuff is like, i see he has changed the picture on the listing also.

We changed the picture because because a few people messaged us asking if it was really that brown, the picture was from Google as we don't have a camera to take a picture.

The new picture is still from Google but looks exactly like our product, we should have our own pictures up by the end of the week. In the mean time if any of the samplers would like to upload a picture that would be greatly appreciated.

~~Waitrose~~

EDIT:
Heres a review from our thread:
Quote from: Nakorx on July 29, 2013, 06:35 pm
Review of sample of No.4 from Waitrose
Very quick delivery. I ordered on Friday night and it was in transit 15 minutes later, although I did not receive it until Monday, this was down to Royal Mail and not the vendor's fault. First Class Royal Mail used, so next day delivery should be normal.

It was well packed, don't want to say too much but was in a heat sealed vac bag, if you had ordered something smelly it would not have been detected.

The stealth was OK and it could be improved a tad by  having a return address  to blend it in with the regular business mail better, but this is a very minor thing.

The communications were truly excellent, this is an area where many vendors could improve IMO. I know they are  busy but customers do not like to be kept in the dark and having to wait 24 hours for a reply. These guys answer within a few hours (although whether they will be able to keep this up remains to be seen).

The product itself looks like very light brown sugar, and dissolve easily in water at room temperature to give an almost colurless liquid. (I should point out that I have a  tolerance to heroin although I do not have a habit) so I used 100mg in an IV injection.

There was an immediate "tingling/prickly" sensation in my head that passed within a few seconds, and I have come across this before. Not much feeling of euphoria , but the buzz was good and the legs were average. I wish I could have done more.

The product reminds me of the No.4 that Frank Matthews had about a 3 weeks ago. In particular,  the "tingling or pins and needles" sensation which was identical only not as strong with this gear.

The price seems good for UK, and I shall be ordering some soon to check it out properly and will update this thread to let people know.

Looks like this good be a good vendor, No FE required, next day delivery, has PGP, so an "A" for starters.

SS
c63 does not sell #4 only #3 so you can smoke it as is .
and the butter in the jail is used when you have a tiny bit and you want to get more lines out of it , put a bit of butter on with the h and it ran further (ruined it imo)

I wont be spreading my h on a bit of butter that's for sure. No, I wanted to add something to a #4 to make it smoke as pins are out of the question. I tried pinning again for the first time in years as I thought my veins may have come back but all I managed to do was make a mess of my arm and one of my hands. I don't want to sniff it and plugging it never works for me, so the only choice is to add something to make it smoke.

Also if anyone is interested I got some crack from c63amg and it blew me away. some of the best crack I have smoked in a very long time.

SS

Hi all

My sample from UK777 came today. The stealth was good, a little like FrankM's if you know what I mean, the best from a UK seller I have had.
The gear was probably a little over the 0.05 sample I ordered, that cost the grand total of about 10p, thanks UK777!
 I have got quite a good buzz from it. I agree it's better the BO3's better gear.
It runs OK on the foil and I could feel it after a few lines, & to be honest I am quite stoned off it, not gouching by any means but quite stoned none the less.
UK777  seems a nice guy too, in a couple off messages he was friendly & courteous.
I would go as far as to say that its one of the strongest Browns I have had recently off  SR, from a UK seller, about the same as TN's chocolate gear  ???   but without the weird taste.
I hope he lists plenty more, and the price is right, if so I will be ordering from him for sure, and if any one else gives him a try as I'm sure some of you will, you will not be disappointed !!
C

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion
Post by: xiferz on August 01, 2013, 11:44 am
reporting in: my first order with c63amg hit the mat today - excellent packaging, product much better than my last european order which was junkiexxl.  Fast too - ordered monday and arrived on Thursday - i do think junkiexxl arrived a day quicker - probably teutonic efficiency!  German mail service seems to be faster then the Dutch.

am a bit concerned though that a domestic order placed on the same day with dispater has not yet arrived.  but letters have been known to get delayed by a day or two so i won't be too alarmed until the weekend.

after being on the road awhile i'd like to change my details for general security reasons - but how can that be done without losing my buyer stats which show i'm a good customer?

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion
Post by: xiferz on August 02, 2013, 10:01 am
Quote from: xiferz on August 01, 2013, 11:44 am

am a bit concerned though that a domestic order placed on the same day with dispater has not yet arrived.  but letters have been known to get delayed by a day or two so i won't be too alarmed until the weekend.

This arrived today - pretty sure it's the mail service to blame for the delay, can't comment on the quality right now as i've already had some of c63amg's gear today.  But it looks the same as last batch which was good.  But not as good as c63amg's - this is very nice indeed - best that's come my way since I stopped ordering from FrankMatthews.

Reason i stopped is the F.E. business, one package didn't arrive.  After that i made one more order to a fresh address and that did arrive.  But even so I have a suspicion that one day a lot of people will lose out.  Might be down to genuine problems or a reorganisation for security reasons or a premeditated scam - pattern is the same as previous vendors - build up trust with good product, get everyone finalising early then one day disappear.

Meantime I'm still wondering about changing my details for security reasons but i guess i'll take the question of how to retain my stats to a more relevant forum.

''keep that v8 running'' yes indeed!

Post by: pakchoi23 on August 04, 2013, 02:56 pm
Quote from: isallmememe on August 02, 2013, 10:14 am
what's jimmyboyles gear like? ..i wanna try it if its even half as good as he claims

His medium strength is my current fave gear, blinding. His top quality stuff is the strongest I have ever had but not worth the money. If you just want to experience the strength of it go for it, I have never been so fucked in 20 years of using. If you want to get really stoned for less money, use his medium stuff. I'd say it's a wee bit better than C63 #3.

He is good with comms and is running a pretty tight 24hr delivery atm.


In other news... I guess there is no news about Japan1980?

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on August 06, 2013, 07:05 am
Hi, didn't know this thread was here.....been reading the thread in rumour mill thinking "why no  UK reviews?'!
     I'm after ordering a gram of brown off a UK vendor this week, or maybe .5 of Jimmy Boyles mid range if that's better value. Just wanted to know what everyone thinks of the UK vendors at moment.
     Ordered of Dispater and beston3 before, both sent me half decent gear that seemed  about the same as I'd get round here. Bit dear but not scored on street round here for years anyway. Been wearing subutex handcuffs!
     When I first found SR last year I was on 8mg subs. I tried getting some gear few times, first .2 then .5 then a g. I must have a slow metabolism because even 3 days after stopping the subs couldn't really feel it. It was fucking frustrating. The worst thing was, as soon as you start to be able to feel it a bit, its like the reflex kicks in and you cane it round and round the foil thinking "just a bit more and I'll be there.....just a bit more" till its all gone.
     Ended up hitting the last of it up but still didn't feel it right. So I realised there was no point in trying until I reduced my sub dose
     I had an IV habit since late 90s, but in recenter years stuck to smoking and found (with a bit of black market meth and benzos) it was much easier to control. Then a few years ago my younger brother died (of alcohol overdose! Choked in his sleep)and I had my children and been on subs ever since.
       So, this year decided to reduce the subs. Partly because of unwanted side effects....partly because at the back of my mind I want to get high. Had a few brnzos but there just not the same....nice at first but stop working after a couple of days.
      Couple of months ago was down to 4.8 mg.....tried with Dispaters and Beston3s gear....better this time, could feel it a bit after maybe 36 hours, but still ending up caning it too fast before could proper feel it. Ending up hitting it again and got a bit scared how quickly you get obsessed with the needle. I have to hit in my legs as I can't have marks on my arms, and the veins aren't great there... Or im not as practised at hitting them!
       Now I'm down to 3mg and I'm thinking of scoring another g....don't really want to hit it.
       Dispater would prob be my first choice, but seems to have been swamped recently. Also he has a big stack of identical feedback for 0.5 listing....seems strange why someone would order 5 lots of .5 as its more dear? Maybe a bug in the feedback.
      Top notch? Don't really want cocoa in my gear! I know whatever I get its likely cut, but,....drinking chocolate?
      Like the sound of Jimmy Boyles mid range, but its nearly twice the price, is it twice as strong?  In a way, because of the sub blocking problem, I might prefer quantity over quality...so I've got something to smoke while I'm waiting for subs to wear off.
      Wait rose sounds interesting because never had no. 4 but I don't really want to start hitting again. Its been so hot recently i need to wear shorts! Also, I like running it on foil, its a pleasant ritual.
     Any thoughts?

(Please no advice that I should leave gear alone. I know I should but I know I'm not going to....you know how it is!)

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on August 06, 2013, 06:23 pm

 @Hungry ghost, I'm on a subutex script too & your drug history is similar to mine, I'm now on 4 mg and smoke gear about 2 days a week, some times a bit more...  I use subbies early in the morning and when I get home from work to a delivery I can usually get stoned, it takes a bit more than if you can wait til the next morning.  Some times if the Gear is not the best 0.5g don't really get me high. Recently I have had C63's and that will definitely get me stoned it is very strong and only ten lines & I am stoned.  JB's  is good too very dear but very good.  Topnotch's is very strong for UK gear. I recently had a sample off UK777 and that was quite good too. You pays your money & you takes your choice.. as they say.
Happy tooting.

C

Good Evening,


We have some new listings up from a new product. B Grade Heroin
(This Is Not Our Usual Top Quality A Quality Heroin But A Second Grade Batch)
The pricing for these new listings is much lower than the A1 Quality Listings.


Because it’s a new product we have some sample packs in store so that the product can be rated and the reviews can be shared on the forums.

Don’t expect it to be as strong as our A1 Quality Heroin Listing because its not. It’s a good batch for a very good price and does its job. ( In Many Countries This Batch Is Even Stronger Then Street Level)

Quote from: charas420 on August 06, 2013, 06:23 pm

 @Hungry ghost, I'm on a subutex script too & your drug history is similar to mine, I'm now on 4 mg and smoke gear about 2 days a week, some times a bit more...  I use subbies early in the morning and when I get home from work to a delivery I can usually get stoned, it takes a bit more than if you can wait til the next morning.  Some times if the Gear is not the best 0.5g don't really get me high. Recently I have had C63's and that will definitely get me stoned it is very strong and only ten lines & I am stoned.  JB's  is good too very dear but very good.  Topnotch's is very strong for UK gear. I recently had a sample off UK777 and that was quite good too. You pays your money & you takes your choice.. as they say.
Happy tooting.

C
OK thanks, I ended up having a change of mind and going for JBs mid range 0.5.  Just waiting for the postman now! Missed my subs this morning and have just necked a few hundred mg of codiene....I can feel that so that's a good sign.
       You know when your in drug treatment they talk about 'triggers' things that make you think about drugs: tinfoil, seeing injections on TV, or seeing obvious junkies at a phonebox etc? Well since I discovered SR I have started to feel like this a bout the royal mail! Just the sight of a red van gets me all het up!
      I think I have a pretty slow metabolism nowadays. Even though I'm down to 3mg I don't think I could get high in the evening if I'd had them in the morning. The blocking effect seems to really work on me.

I know this sounds stupid, but here goes:

I am from the UK and living in the United States right now.  The stuff I get here is awful, and I have found an awesome vendor on the East Coast I order from.  However, I'm wanting to get some stuff from the UK or in Europe, just since I prefer that anyhow.  Anyone have any recommendations on UK/Euro vendors that ship Internationally, or are willing to? 

Thanks in advance! :)

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: pakchoi23 on August 07, 2013, 04:47 pm
Can't help much with international orders I'm afraid. Best you can do is scan through the last few pages and pick up the names of decent vendors, then check their pages to see if they ship to USA. I can tell you now jimmy boyle won't ship international.

As for triggers.... fucking everything is a trigger on a bad day. Phones, money, smells, a certain piece of clothing, a certain colour clipper. Worse thing is when you've been clean a while and think you have all triggers under control when a new one pops up out the blue...especially now I use Silk Road. Extra triggers everywhere.

First 10 times I used the road I thought I was going to have a heart attack right from ordering the btc to the gear coming thro the door. SO much fucking adrenalin and anxiety/anticipation/excitement/fear.

It's an arse how psychological WDs can hit you as well...  but this is all stuff for a different thread.

I have my g of jimmy boyles medium through the post today so I am a happy bunny. Still strong as fook. Took 21 hours from me clicking buy to it being in my hands. Fandabbydozee.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on August 09, 2013, 06:39 am
That's good to hear, I've got a .2 of Top Notchs coming this morning (I hope, marked in transit yesterday so should be) Finished the last of JBs gear last night, luckily I realised it wasn't going to last and bought some more codiene for this morning. With the long half life of the subs, I tend to forget I've still got a habit, but woke up feeling rough this morning.
       Anyway, someone posted a cold water extraction a few pages back, but I thought I'd post my version that I use. I wish I'd known how to do this back in the day as it would have saved my arse a few times.
        You need coffee filter papers. Not many places sell them these days but its worth looking around as 1 packet will last you. I use two tucked inside one another with the seams at opposite sides.
        Make a makeshift funnel by cutting the top off a lemonade bottle, or use a real funnel. Line it with the coffee filters, might need tp fold them slightly. Soak them down with cold water so they don't absorb as much codiene water.
       Now, ddissolve the tablets. You can do two packets cocodamol (about 500mg codiene) in one go, but any more and it just clogs the filters.
        If you aren't in a hurry, just pour on warm/hot water, (not too hot, you should be able to put fingers in it) and the tablets will dissolve (use about 300ml water). Then put in freezer until ice starts to form
        If you are in a hurry, crush the tablets to powder with a pestle and mortar (or bottom of a glass medicine bottle and a bowl) and dissolve in cold water.
       Then stick the filter funnel on a glass and pour in mixture. The codiene water should drip through and be more or less clear. About half will come through pretty quick, the rest in an hour or so. Put it in fridge to finish off as the colder it is the less paracetemol will be in it.
       Then just drink the water. You won't get high off it if you have any kind of habit, but it will hold you while your waiting for the postman!
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on August 09, 2013, 05:41 pm
Hi people,

I hope your all well, & having a good evening.

I have started the bag from UK777, & I have to say it is very good gear, tastes really nice. & even though I'm stoned off TN's gear and  I have smoked half a G of shines69's Coke that I had washed., I can still feel UK777's gear through it. It runs OK on the foil, it does not have a 'Red' tinge to the beetle, the size of the bags are bang on.
He ships very quickly, my order came in well under 24hrs, I ordered at about 4 or 5 pm at it arrived early the next morning, it couldn't be better than that. His packaging is very good too, very like another popular vendor. It is over and above what is needed for a domestic shipment, but I guess 'Belt & Braces' is the idea, after all , you can not be too safe.
I hope UK777 stays around for a long time and if he does he will soon be in the top % of vendors.
If you read this UK777, thanks and I will be back soon.

C

You know how that feels...sweating....checking the junk mail frantically 'it must be here somewhere!'        Had to go away four the day so said fuck it and went back on my subs. Dissapointing because had house to myself last night and after 3 days off the subs was planning to have a nice old toot in front of telly with feet up.
       Not doing the 'please Mr postman' bit this morning, had my subs as usual. Mrs is about all day and we are meant to be going out tonight so if it does come ill just save it for tomorrow morning.
       I've done two 'long mornings' this week already, where you miss your subs and wait for postman.....I know you're not meant to start WDs off subs for 36 hrs but I find I feel pretty on edge if I miss a morning and it just seems forever until 12. Not doing it again  this morning, I never really believe stuff will come on a Saturday anyway.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on August 10, 2013, 06:42 am
Tell you what tho there seems to be some nice UK gear on SR at moment. When I started there was one UK vendor called AfghanApothecary, and it was take it or leave it....His gear was variable, had some decent stuff off him.
       That stuff off JB was fuckin quality though. And it sounds like there's a few others.
        I've not bought gear locally for years....it was still 10bags last time, don't know if it still is, they were  getting pretty small. One of my closest friends is still into the gear so I could go to him but I don't really want to have it just a phone call away.
        Anyway the other night i saw this guy and he had some gear  he'd got locally and he said 'its pretty strong' he pulled out the foil and it was a tiny blob of red orange gear. You know when it leaves orange trails. I pulled out mine, it was half of the .5 I got off JB.  he'd paid £20 for his, I'd paid about £30, but the beetle on mine was huge in comparison, and I'd been through two foils already! Mine was dark and shiny and didn't leave any trail at first, then started to leave a dark trail later on.It was basically like the gear I used to get when I started in the early 90s.
        I've been thinking the gear on SR was expensive but if the local gear is like that its not too bad.
       Still in my head I think of gear as being £50 a gram and <£150 an eighth but that was over ten years ago.....drug prices are resistant to inflation, it was bad enough when phone boxes went up to 20p! When I last bought on street it was still ten bags. They started as being .2 but had been getting smaller and smaller over time. I don't know if the market has made the jump to a £20 bag standard yet?

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)

2 SS - ohh.. right... i didn't think about it... i myself have another account on SR with only 3 transactions in it... i might start using it one day  :)

Regarding UK H vendors - i  stopped ordering from UK after TN gone and even after he is back i still stick to Dutch vendors - c63 and FM are the only ones I buy H from,- c63 is good for his N3 and FM for his N4. After i tried them i don't want UK quality any more - really big difference! TN quality was always good but it had black tar junk floating in the solution after H being cocked. One thing isn't nice though is you have to wait 2-3 days for your package with c63 and sometimes longer with FM cuz not always he dispatches next day. From my previous post you can see that my last order is processing for 4 days now. So can't give you any advice on UK vendors really, sorry. UK vendors H (excluding TN) is way too weak and expensive, IMHO

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on August 13, 2013, 04:13 pm
my ting from junkiexxl came thru today, which is pretty quick as he only sent it saturday, today is tuesday and to the uk as well. the gear is average grade but for £13 for a 1/4 gram i wouldn't complain. it does have a bit of a sugar cut which is noticeable by the sticky beetle and the dark dots left on the foil residue. but i did have a nice buzz from just smoking 1/3 of the bag, and it runs perfectly fine as well. its as good as most of what you buy on the streets and about street prices as well. so yeah it was alright, i'd definitely buy again at that price and speed of delivery.

 I am growing to like the taste & smell, it runs nicely on the foil. Half a bag & I'm quite stoned already.   All in all for the price I know you will not get better from a UK seller, his speed of delivery is good as is his stealth, which to me adds up to the best choice for Brown from a UK seller.
I'm so glad he came back and I hope he's around for a long time.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)

Hope everyones safe and practicing good injecting techniques if thats your ROA.

NEVER SHARE!!!

All paraphernalia is free from your local needle exchange.If you live in the sticks then make sure you stock up well when you do head to town or you can even buy what you need from SR (although its expensive considering its free) Also I used to know a Tesco that used to sell 10x 1ml works for £1 but I'm not sure if they still do.Some exchanges or chemists will even send you some in the post though there maybe a small charge for this service.
What I'm getting at is there is NO excuse for sharing needles!!Dont be a smelly,skinny,scumbag, disease ridden,infected junkie.....Be a responsible heroin addict/user.Take your used pins back to the exchange.How would you like to sit down on the grass in your local park only to be stabbed in the arse with a dis-guarded works?? Or to find your child playing  'DR's' or 'nurses' with some lazy fuckers pin??

BE RESPONSIBLE !!

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on August 28, 2013, 06:28 pm
my internet got cut off friday night so i not been able to post. but the order c63 marked in transit on wednesday last week arrived on saturday morning, i got 1G of his A grade brown and half G of his crack. and fuck me if that crack wasn't the best bit of rock i had in years. blows anything currently on the street in the UK to pieces. it had that lovely proper crack taste like you used to get in the early/mid 90s, so i knew as i let that smoke out it was gonna hit hard, and it fucking did alright.

as for the A grade brown he sent me, it was .3 over and way better than the B grade tester he sent me last week. i fucking impressed.

to the guy who wants to know how to tell the difference between his A and B grade stuff. his B grade stuff has a sugar cut and his A grade doesn't. to test this just let the beetle settle and cool down. then with the foil on a flat surface like a table, dab the beetle with your finger tip. gear with a sugar cut will stick to your finger, if there is no sugar cut then it will not stick. his A grade stuff had a very very slight stick that just fell back onto the table before you could lift your finger a few inches. his B grade stuff is quite sticky tho. you can literally hold your finger there with the beetle stuck to it for ages.

when you melt sugar it turns to caramel which is sticky, there's no way to disguise that fact when its cut into gear, your beetle will be sticky. the more sugar the more stickier.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on August 30, 2013, 08:18 am
I believe you can smoke crack off foil but you are better making a pipe. A lot ofppeople use an asthma inhaler with foil bowl, or waterless bong made out ofa small plastic bottle and a biro tube. Make sure its airtight and flick a nice fat ciggy ash on the bowl. Then place rock on top of ash. The ash is to support the crack as it liquefys.
      Goddamn it I want a pipe now. Never really been a big crack head but it is kind of moreish. I cant imagine using crack without some brown to finish off.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: linas879cizauskas on August 30, 2013, 09:27 am
Quote from: zazoo on August 30, 2013, 12:03 am
I can confrm that alldrugsuk and c63 have the same gear.  I have both in front of me now and they are the same with no cut.  The #4 he has is FM's but the markup is a little steep.  Hopefully alldrugsuk can get next day delivery a priority and we will be sorted! Mine came in 2 days domestic.

I agree TN's hot chocolate had dissipated or I was thinking I was starting to get used to it.  Can crack be vaporized off foil with just as good effects btw?  Thanks.
Greetings Zazoo.
Yes you can smoke crack off foil, it "runs", but you don't get the "hit" many people like off crack. Its more of a creeper. If you've never had a pipe before, maybe you'd get a nice feeling from smoking it on foil, but once you've piped crack, you'll never go back. i use a coke bottle, filled 3/4 with water and a biro with foil cap+ash. chewing gum is a good sealant for round the biro  (the water is purely for having less air in the bottle, to make the smoke more condensed)
Man i want a pipe now too! lol

I can't wait for the postie now its confirmed as c63's good stuff w/no cut. And agree, if he can get his next day delivery down, he'll be a busy man!

Regards
Linas
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on August 30, 2013, 10:20 am
for the ultimate crack pipe, get a hack saw and cut a clipper lighter in half. with the lower half of the lighter drill a hole around halfway, cut a biro tube in half and stick it in the hole with blue tac to seal. then foil up the top with a lastic band and put your holes in. bit of ash and you're good. there is hardly any air in the pipe to start with so you are literally getting pure smoke. hits you like a fucking steam train, its the best pipe i ever had and is also nice and discreet and easy to hide etc. plus you get just as much back when you wash it out with acetone.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on August 30, 2013, 02:16 pm
i was so impressed with All Drugs UK that i said i would do a review for him, so here it is. i got to admit when i first considered ordering from him there were a couple of things that made me a little nervous. the fact that there were no feedbacks for that particular product in his listing said to me that he hadn't sold any yet. i wondered if that might be coz he hadn't got stocked yet or maybe other buyers knew something i didn't, but then i saw his stats were pretty good, so i figured i'd probably give him a try tho. the other thing was that i noticed he charges £2 for postage which is way more than sending a letter weighing a little more than .2 of a gram first class UK to UK would be. this made me wonder if he was being a bit dodgy and trying to sucker people into thinking his gear was cheaper than it looked. anyway i gave him the benefit of the doubt, so here goes...

communication 5/5 - i initially messaged him around 12/1pm yesterday, while i was waiting for my btc to clear in my sr account, inquiring about why the product had no feedback and if he definitely had it in stock. he hadn't answered by 4.30 when i was wanting to order for the 5pm cut off, so as to catch the post for that day. so i took a chance and ordered it anyway. he actually answered me about 10 minutes later saying that he had only started selling the product on saturday and as of yet the few orders he had already, had not finalized yet. this was the point when he told me that the gear he had was in fact c63's A grade gear. i messaged back straight away asking if i had caught the order in time for that days post and he replied at about 5.30 to tell me it had in fact just been posted and i noticed it was then marked in transit. i've messaged him numerous times and had 5 replies answering just about everything i inquired about, which is a lot more than you would get from most vendors. so top marks for comms.

stealth/packaging - 4/5 this is the only thing i can fault him on as the item was not vac packed. it was domestic tho so the risk was minimal, but i did message him to say he really does need to look at vacuuming asap.

shipping 5/5 -as i said i ordered at 4.30pm yesterday and it landed here at 11.30 this morning, so for speed i am actually very very impressed. i really didn't expect the royal mail to move it that fast but they did. so absolutely maximum points on speed.

product 6/5 - i actually had c63's A grade on saturday and this was exactly the same. there is no sugar cut like c63's B grade gear has, the beetle is not at all sticky when it goes hard. this gear is a really nice smoke, leaves a nice residue that's not too dark or not too clear, which is perfect. if you think of the best gear you've ever bought on the street, and this is easily on a par with that. it is quite rare to get gear of this quality on the street these days, so probably worth the slightly extra price. also i weighed the gear, it came separated in two .1 wraps which both weighed in at .11, so was slightly over weight too.

so yeah All Drugs Uk gets top marks from me. from my experience of dealing with him he has certainly well deserved this good review. i know a few people have posted here saying they had a little trouble waiting, but that certainly isn't the experience i had. as long as he keeps up a service like this i will probably use him all the time. he is a little more expensive than c63, but for the next day delivery i think its probably worth the extra bit of coin.

i also messaged him this morning suggesting that he would do well if he started selling c63s crack as well. he messaged me back prettty soon after telling me that he has that planned at some point. i also suggested that a .2 of each heroin/crack combo could be a popular listing and he told me that he knows that both white and brown go well together, so hopefully we will see that listed soon too.

in fact post a reply ITT if you think a .2 heroin/crack combo would be something you would order. hopefully we can get it listed soon.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on August 30, 2013, 06:18 pm
Quote from: Seeds and Stuff on August 30, 2013, 05:08 pm
Is there a demand for Crack in the UK?

We can supply crack

if its good crack then yeah defo. most of what you get on the streets in the UK now is fucked. the coke gets cut to fuck with rc's and phet and shit, and then when they wash it up it affects the mix and produces all sorts of nasty shit that doesn't melt properly and either burns into a nasty black lump or you get that horrible dull marble like looking rock that tastes fucking weird and gets you all pranged up all nasty and doesn't come down properly even when you smoke shit loads of brown. none of that shit is worth a wank.

like i mentioned before, the stuff c63 got is proper. has that proper nice crack taste like you used to get back in the early to mid 90s, and gets you buzzed like a proper bit of rock should.  crack is proper expensive at the best of times but that was worth every penny. a real treat that was.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 06, 2013, 09:22 am
Quote from: isallmememe on September 05, 2013, 05:34 pm
if the postman knocked on your door out of the blue asking you to sign for a letter you weren't expecting, what would you do? ..you'd sign for it and take it in just like anyone else would. so that don't really make a case for the cops at all. i mean what are you supposed to do? tell the postman to fuck off and take it away just because you weren't expecting any mail to be signed for. you don't always know when sign for mail is being sent to you.
I had a gram of H not turn up about a year ago. After waiting a few days I contacted vendor and we agreed if I paid for another .5 he'd send me a fat gram. Fair dos I thought so that's what we did, to avoid going to resolution and fucking both our stats. It came and all was well. Then about two weeks later I got a slip from the Royal mail saying 'you have an item with insufficient postage to collect'
         I dithered for a bit then decided they are hardly gonna stake out the post office. I went to get it. Unfortunately I lost the slip! The man behind the counter said he couldn't find it but he'd ring me if it turned up 'we've got 3000 items back here, just leave your number'
         I started to feel a bit para, but then realised they couldn't have predicted me losing slip.
       Later that day he rung. I flew down straight away, my arse going slightly. He handed over a familiar looking envelope. The dozy bugger had forgotten to put stamps on it!
       I didn't contact him, I felt I'd earned my free gram!

But, yeah I don't like signing for packages, mostly because I'm not usually there, and so have to collect from depot. Its usually
OK but its a bit unnerving
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 06, 2013, 10:30 am
yeah i can imagine it being a bit unnerving having to pick it up like that. but you do still legally have plausible deniability. you don't stand more susceptible legally in court because you signed for a package or even went to pick one up from the post office. its totally reasonable to accept that somebody would sign for a package that was sent to them even tho they had no prior knowledge that a sign for parcel was sent to them. just about anybody would. try asking a postman if they've ever had somebody refuse to sign for and accept a letter and i bet they probably haven't or it would have only happened once or twice.

The problem was buyers who had multiple recent buys off a vendor  using them to blackmail him by threatening to change all to one. My suggestion was to make it so only last feedback could be changed but DPR doesn't seem to have took it on board, leading to it being difficult to warn others when a vendor is turning scam.

       Anyway, got another letter from All drugs today and it is indeed fucking lovely gear.  Nicest I've had off SR, as good as jimmy Boyles mid batch and a bit cheaper. It tastes like the good old days. If you are gonna get some UK to UK gear you can't go wrong with this stuff. I hope he carries on supplying this lovely stuff it pisses all over the street gear near me. Good times for the UK SR junky contingent; plenty of good choices at moment. Seeds and stuff also has some good stuff and I believe a few others although not tried em recently. Shit you can tell I'm ducked I'm just happily rambling.
       Still waiting for someone to offer this .2 rock and .2 gear combo.... It would sell like hot cakes,  get on it all drugs!

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 12, 2013, 09:01 pm
Well, experiences seem to vary, but  when I was on 8mg sub I could not get high even after 3 days of missing dose. You can take gear during that time and it will stop you rattling but no narcotic effect will be experienced. By the third day you may be able to feel a slight tickle but however much you cane you won't get any more than that.....don't do it to yourself it is torture.I tried it several times and it was really frustrating (even IVing had little effect. I try and stick to smoking these days but I was so desperate to get high by this point)
     Once I was down to 3-4 mg I could feel something after a day or two. Now I'm down to 2.4mg if I miss a dose in the morning I can get nicely high by the evening.
    I guess it depends on your metabolism, but I read all these accounts of people getting high after a day it two and I was really dissapointed when after three days still nothing.
       I would taper your dose down to the 2-3 mg mark if you want to get high.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 12, 2013, 09:22 pm
Been ordering off all drugs as he seems to have some cracking brown, uncut from Europe. Best stuff I have had of SR, proper gouching tackle.
       However he has been marking things in transit in an unorthodox manner which is confusing. Normally a vendor marks in transit late afternoon and this means it was posted that day and (RM doing their stuff) can be expected tomorrow.
       The first order I made was a Monday morning, well before cut off of 2 pm. It didn't mark in transit till early hours (3am -5am Tue) leaving me confused as whether it was sent it not. It didn't turn up until wed, presumably having being sent Tue. No problem, just confusing.
      Next order I made late on this Monday night to catch the Tue delivery. Sureenough it was marked in transit early hours Tue, and landed Wednesday. I felt I had spotted a pattern!
       So last night (about 2am) I made another order, hoping it would be marked in transit early this morning and arrive Fri. However it has processed all day, and marked in transit about 8pm tonight, leaving me confused whether it was sent today or will be sent tomorrow. He has also updated his page to say that processing may take 2 days due to Tor problems.
       So I don't know whether to miss my subs tomorrow and check drop, or wait till Saturday.
       Its a minor gripe really, maybe he likes to change up transit times to throw off LE. I'm just used to a late afternoon 'in transit' meaning it will come tomorrow.

      Also he has stopped doing his .2 bags it seems. At just over £20 these were fucking top value for such good gear. You can buy two 0.1 samples but that's closer to £30 and not such a bargain. I don't often have £50-£60 to throw on gear, but £20 odd is always double. Bring back .2 bags All Drugs! Make an old junky very happy!
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 12, 2013, 09:36 pm
Quote from: Hungry ghost on September 12, 2013, 09:01 pm
Well, experiences seem to vary, but  when I was on 8mg sub I could not get high even after 3 days of missing dose. You can take gear during that time and it will stop you rattling but no narcotic effect will be experienced. By the third day you may be able to feel a slight tickle but however much you cane you won't get any more than that.....don't do it to yourself it is torture.I tried it several times and it was really frustrating (even IVing had little effect. I try and stick to smoking these days but I was so desperate to get high by this point)
     Once I was down to 3-4 mg I could feel something after a day or two. Now I'm down to 2.4mg if I miss a dose in the morning I can get nicely high by the evening.
    I guess it depends on your metabolism, but I read all these accounts of people getting high after a day it two and I was really dissapointed when after three days still nothing.
       I would taper your dose down to the 2-3 mg mark if you want to get high.

The way to look at it is sub has a half life of 36 hrs. The blockade occurs at >2mg. So if you are taking 12 mg a day after 36 hrs you have 6 left in you, after 72 hours (3 days) you have 3mg left and are still blocked.  It is made worse however if you have been taking 12 mg every 24 hrs for a while. After 24 hrs say you have 8mg left in blood, you take next 12=20. After 24 hrs you have maybe 12 left, +12=24. After 24 hrs you have maybe 16 left+12=28. After 24 hrs maybe 20+12=32........so your blood level levels off at TWICE or so the dose you are actually taking. Thus the time for blood levels to drop are even longer.

TL;DR: you ain't getting high any time soon my friend. Listen to the voice of bitter experience. This is why buprenorphine is so effective in weaning junkys off heroin. If you want to use you need to get down to 2-3 mg
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 12, 2013, 09:40 pm
Having said that I read plenty anecdotes of people who could take 24mg sub sand next day hit up some smack and get high, so who knows, maybe it is an idiosyncratic drug that blocks some people but not others. I know you will try anyway, so report back and let me know how you get on.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 13, 2013, 06:51 am
Aah fent might be different.  I only ever tried with H. I'm not sure where fent fits in the old 'affinity to opiate receptors' hierarchy. You might get a short acting high. Maybe fent has a higher affinity than bupe. You can hope anyway! Good luck.
     Personally your best bet is to taper down to 4mg. It isn't hard at all to taper, just do a mg a week. Don't tell the prescribing drug agency (those fuckers haven't a clue anyway) and you'll have a nice stash of subs build up as well.
     I've always found it fairly easy to taper off meth or subs, its just that last bit that's the killer. When your body starts to realise no more opiates are coming.......

YES I have heard of the anecdotes, but all the people i knew IRL who used Subutex could not get high no matter how much gear they took. And considering how the Subutex fills up the mu (??) receptors in the brain it is not surprising, I think all those anecdote were urban myths, people bragging about how many drugs they could take before they passed out etc.

There maybe the exception that proves the rule, like one person in a hundred or even more, but doing gear is just a waste of time when on subutex, suboxone even better -LOL. That is the whole point, stop gear heads wasting their money cos there is no way they going to get high.

Yeah, sorry CLK you ain't getting high if I'm honest. Once I cut down to about 4 mg I could feel it after maybe 48 hrs. Now I'm down to 2mg I can miss a dose and get high, but it takes a lot more than it would.....I don't know if that's tolerance from the subs or blocking but I have to cane it round the foil to feel it usually. I've been tempted to start hitting again, but the time I did it frightened me how quickly I got obsessed with the pins. After I finished the gear I started hitting up my subs for a day or two until I thought 'fuck this' and now I just stick to smoking it again. Other than that I stopped using pins about 6 years ago and I can honestly say I've had so much more control over my habit, even before I started on the subs.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 14, 2013, 05:13 pm

@Greg I've always found #3 to be really effective insuffulated, 3rd best ROA. Just cause it doesnt dissolve water doesn't mean it doesnt get absorbed by the blood vesels in ya nose

it does a lot better if you use some citric with it. for best results cook it up with a little water and then snort the solution. its a lot easier than fucking about with the chemistry set trying to refine it into #4. if you snort #3 without citric it will have problems absorbing through the membrane and into your bloodstream.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 14, 2013, 08:42 pm
Yeah All drugs is top gear at moment. At those prices its a bit dearer than street but the quality makes it more than worthwhile.
     Had a bit of a disaster today. Got my .2 this morning and threw it on foil,smoked a good few lines, nicely high. Normally I'll store my tube and foil in a DVD  case (the sleeve note clips hold the foil nicely.) but today I knew I was going with missus and sister in law for a pub lunch, so I needed a pocket sized kit. I decided to use an empty subutex box, ideal size. Folded over edges of foil in case beetle came loose.
     While waiting for main course I decided a liitle toot might be in order. The toilets in this older pub are ideally suited for private tooting, not cubicles but actual seperate rooms. I ensconsed myself in one of these black and white tiled chambers and unwrapped my foil platform, tube in mouth.
      Hang on.....WHERES THE FUCKING BEETLE? It had been a nice sized blob, now there was only a vague outline. The beetle had detached itself and crumbled into fragments. I frantically examined the box and pocket but no joy. My heart was beating and I began to feel like I was instantly  withdrawing.
        A few fragments were lurking in the folded edges of the foil, but the larger pieces were to he found on the (fortunately clean and dry) toilet floor.
       Its at times like these, as you scrabble on the floor of a pub toilet for pieces of heroin that you begin to question the sequence of decisions and life choices that led to this sorry situation.
     Fortunately I was able to salvage and reconstitute most of it, but it began to frazze soon after, far sooner than expected, and I couldn't help but attribute this to its visit to the toilet floor. Bad times.
       Luckily my tube was generously encrusted and having just smoked that I'm having difficulty focussing to type this.
       Further bad news is that AD has taking his listings down for now, so no more cheap high quality gear. The other vendors have some pretty decent gear at competitive prices (seeds and stuff being my second choice) but its not as good as ADs stuff which is pretty specials. Top notch is also great despite choccytaste but on a break too. Any other recommendations?
        Insuffalating No. 3: I have had some success with snorting small lines of No 3 in past. you get a nice creeping rush. Be careful though as you can OD using this method specially in combo with benzos.
        Running gear on foil is a pleasant ritual though. I've seen some people claim they get more by 'spotting' : putting a little out on foil at a time and frazzling it but this seemed a waste to me as you want to vaporize your gear, not burn it!
       What about hitting rock with gear for that bell ringer effect? Rocks taste nice smoked but that sickening rush you get from hitting up a crack/smack combo is pretty memorable.

      Be careful with that GHB  CLK, its easy to start redosing 24/7 and enter a world of pain. When you could get GBL legal in UK me and my friends got fucked up good and proper with having unlimited access to GHB. Its not a good drug for those of us with poor impulse control! Messy messy times.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 14, 2013, 09:25 pm
Quote from: Hungry ghost on September 14, 2013, 08:42 pm

        Running gear on foil is a pleasant ritual though. I've seen some people claim they get more by 'spotting' : putting a little out on foil at a time and frazzling it but this seemed a waste to me as you want to vaporize your gear, not burn it!

that sounds fucking mental to me. i've noticed over the years that the smaller the beetle gets the faster it disappears. i always put as much on to start as possible specifically because it lasts longer by doing so. a nice big beetle of decent running gear lasts ages. especially now i do much smaller lines. i've found doing lines any longer than 3 inches is a total waste. you just breathe most of what you've inhaled straight out without most of it getting absorbed in the lungs. i run a line usually around 2 inches and i still breathe vapor out. if i'm clucking, 8 or 10 small two inch lines sorts me out. exactly the same as if i was doing six inch long lines, it would still be about 8 or 10 lines before i feel right again.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 15, 2013, 07:15 am
Yeah I started doing that, partly because my lung capacity isn't what it was. Its better to have a bit of room to spare in your lungs so you can suck in a bit and hold the smoke in longer. Definitely get more off your gear that way, especially if you've got time to take it slow.
       I'll normally have a foil 6" x 4" and run it end to end, but like you say do kind of half lines each time. If I try and do a full 5" line I just end up burning gear and smoke drifting up past my face.
     But yeah the guy 'spotting it'.....tried telling him he was wasting it but I think he thought he was 'getting all of it' that way. Like putting a little match head out and just frazzing it on the spot. He probably was getting a nice little hit if each one but overall wasting it.
      Putting it all out in a big beetle is defineterly more effective. I just hate towards the end when your like 'its gonna frazzle......its going......just tease it abit further....oh fuck its gone."
    Then its tube time....anyone else favour the pointy tube? You fold it kind of like a paper aeroplane before rolling it round a hexagonal pencil/pen. The point and the grooves seem to make it collect more. Usually get a good few lines off it. Swings and roundabouts I suppose though its not like its appeared by magic.
      Oh well just tormenting myself cos gears run out and back on the subs for me for now. Always have a little binge after a piss test but I think shows over now. Feeling kinda shitty this morning so I take extra subs which has the bonus effect of preventing me getting any more gear for a few days at least.  Got a few vallys to tide me over the transition back to normality.
 
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on September 15, 2013, 09:34 am
Quote from: Hungry ghost on September 15, 2013, 07:15 am
Yeah I started doing that, partly because my lung capacity isn't what it was. Its better to have a bit of room to spare in your lungs so you can suck in a bit and hold the smoke in longer. Definitely get more off your gear that way, especially if you've got time to take it slow.
       I'll normally have a foil 6" x 4" and run it end to end, but like you say do kind of half lines each time. If I try and do a full 5" line I just end up burning gear and smoke drifting up past my face.
     But yeah the guy 'spotting it'.....tried telling him he was wasting it but I think he thought he was 'getting all of it' that way. Like putting a little match head out and just frazzing it on the spot. He probably was getting a nice little hit if each one but overall wasting it.
      Putting it all out in a big beetle is defineterly more effective. I just hate towards the end when your like 'its gonna frazzle......its going......just tease it abit further....oh fuck its gone."
    Then its tube time....anyone else favour the pointy tube? You fold it kind of like a paper aeroplane before rolling it round a hexagonal pencil/pen. The point and the grooves seem to make it collect more. Usually get a good few lines off it. Swings and roundabouts I suppose though its not like its appeared by magic.
      Oh well just tormenting myself cos gears run out and back on the subs for me for now. Always have a little binge after a piss test but I think shows over now. Feeling kinda shitty this morning so I take extra subs which has the bonus effect of preventing me getting any more gear for a few days at least.  Got a few vallys to tide me over the transition back to normality.

 Hi

 I have read your posts for while now HG, you sound quite like me. I'm on 2.4 subutex at the moment and can get high after missing a morning dose. I usually binge at the start of the month for a week or two.
When I stop I use the Sub's I haven't taken while using to up my dose a bit. If I feel the need I snort a few MG's
 & that will sort me out. Trouble is I sometimes get the Generic Bupe, and they are rock hard and do not crush as well as the real 'Subutex".

 I have been using a few bags of street gear lately, after meeting an old friend. The quality was very good,it all came about after the quacks fucked up my script. So I had a rattle on, but One ten bag held me for 24hrs, it ran lovely and was a great high. I just wondered if any street gear users had noticed an improvement in the bags around now, or is it still  hit and miss ?(If its a SR order, half a G of UK gear last me 2 days, & C63's 3 days) Which seems to make the street gear much better value.
My TOR Browser bundle fucked up after an update and Iwas off line for what seemed like ages. I now have TAILS with persistent volume, I am getting on in years now and am not in any way a techy. It took me 3 days to get it working but it is great now.
Sorry for the long post, babble babble, Sunday Morning no gear but lots of weed & subbies so I am quite High.
C

 Has any body tried Dispaters new gear??

Hes had consistently good stuff for months, and the price isnt bad at all, its why i ended up going on subs.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Gregory House on September 15, 2013, 11:31 am
Quote from: isallmememe on September 14, 2013, 05:13 pm
Quote from: CLK on September 14, 2013, 02:53 pm

@Greg I've always found #3 to be really effective insuffulated, 3rd best ROA. Just cause it doesnt dissolve water doesn't mean it doesnt get absorbed by the blood vesels in ya nose

it does a lot better if you use some citric with it. for best results cook it up with a little water and then snort the solution. its a lot easier than fucking about with the chemistry set trying to refine it into #4. if you snort #3 without citric it will have problems absorbing through the membrane and into your bloodstream.

Any recommendations on who's brown to use for this? or am i simply looking for the purest stuff about at the minute?
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: CLK on September 15, 2013, 01:43 pm
@ hungry & isall, When i first started smoking i actually did that, put a spot on and do a tiny line till it frazzled. It does work, and can be good for nerbs to smoking cause otherwise theyd waste a hell of a lot. But once i put a proper amount out on the foil, and saw how much longer it lasted, and how much mroe i got for my money.. god i love everything about gear! Pretty wasted today, so i'm craving ta fuuuck. Amazingly one of the things i miss most (pther than that IV rush) is the taste of it when smoking off foil, its lovely, and the whole routine.. mmm

Aye i kknow about the ghb risks, i did a month or so 24/7 dosing on GBL when it was legal here, gets you hooked real fast and having to redose 5 times a night to get some kip, cause after you knock yourself out on it you wake up again on the dot 2.5hrs later cause of the domapine rebound effects.. nasty stuff, rattled off it n didnt touch it since. Nah i just got it to come down with from the various cokes i'm getting, since opiates won't work for it, and i've abused benzos to the point of uselessness for comedowns. I gotta say aswell, coming off a real benzo habit is much much harder than any rattle i ever had to do, even worse than when i took naltrexoone after a opiate session cause i was so fucked i forgot id even done it. The precip wds from that were torture.. ugh. And coind off benzo habit was still wose.. glad i'm nto hooked on them again

Anyways i'm rambling, happy hunting folks! & @Greg - id try a small line of the #3 youd get before dissolved it in citric etc, se how you get on. Its pretty effective, not as good as smoking or IV but better than any other ROA. If you aint satisfied then go ahead with the dissolving in citric.. Though wouldnt it be better to do the solution with vit c/Ascorbic acid? Because they're much less acidic/corrosive etc and would be a nicer final product to use :)

@Greg I've always found #3 to be really effective insuffulated, 3rd best ROA. Just cause it doesnt dissolve water doesn't mean it doesnt get absorbed by the blood vesels in ya nose

it does a lot better if you use some citric with it. for best results cook it up with a little water and then snort the solution. its a lot easier than fucking about with the chemistry set trying to refine it into #4. if you snort #3 without citric it will have problems absorbing through the membrane and into your bloodstream.

no i mean actually snort the liquid. use as least water as you can, cook it up then let it cool a bit. then use a drinking straw as paper will soak up the liquid. then just snort the liquid up like you would with powder.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 15, 2013, 02:53 pm
Yeah the first time I ever had gear I must have been about 17 and we used to score weed of this punk guy with a habit. Eventually we mithered him into scoring us some gear. We got it back to my mates bedroom, and one of us who claimed to be an expert said you put it on foil and burnt it wit a lighter underneath. I had a fivers worth (and this must have been early 90s so a ten bag was pretty decent. I had a glass funnel and hoovered the whole fivers in one frazzle and filled my young healthy lungs. I was instantly extremely fucked and nauseous… but when I led down I was more content than I'd ever been before. I think I knew then I was going to have a long relationship with this substance.

       Charas, I haven't actually tried the street gear near me recently. It might be fantastic. I have a close mate(you know one I grew up with) who is still into gear and so I could get him to score and trust him, but I'm kind of worried that if I end up where I can just pop out with a tenner on a whim and score a bag it wouldn't be good for me! With SR you have to plan a bit in advance, get a bit of cash together, buy coins and wait a day or two. It stops that kind of 'fuck it its been a hard day I could have a bag in front of me in twenty minutes' impulse. So it helps me not slip back into a habit. I  have been tempted to go and show him some of the nice gear I got off SR though. Weirdly the few mates I've mentioned it to don't seem that interested. Not sure they believe its real or something.
      I've been doing the same though, the subs I don't take while I'm smoking gear I use to top up the day after. I'm finding it works pretty well. A few Valium take the edge off. Been doing quite a few of them since I found SR too. Wary of getting a benzo habit but I find I can binge on em for a couple of weeks then taper off them in a few days quite easily. While they are addictive they don't have that craving you get with gear. You feel shit if you stop taking them too suddenly but they don't creep up on you like gear does. You know where you only have it at weekends but then one Wednesday its a special occasion.....
      I have asked the drug treatment place to pause me at 2.4 for a few months. I just wish they'd give up the constant low grade pressure to come off completely. You just want to tell them 'look I'm an opiate addict, I have been a long time but I can manage it quite happily with the proper combination of meds. Just stop with the idea that your job ain't done until I'm completely drug free. Because ill be fucking back here in a year having fucked up my loved ones again."

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 16, 2013, 10:30 am
Quote from: CLK on September 15, 2013, 03:52 pm
Ahh my first time, few lines off the foil and i spent the next 3 hours puking my guts up, i've never thrown up so much in my life! Makes me wonder why i persevered.. its a hell of an acquired taste though

Be careful with the benzos pal, it seems you've got the right idea but because they dont get ya fucked and are just a nice addition to the day, a habit can creep right up on you, i was hooked on em for 7 years and lost my marbles completely whilst detoxing
At the moment I get piss tested every 3 months(!) fairly pointless but I've been a good boy so long I don't want to disappoint them.benzos seem to take a month to leave my piss (Valium). So I have to take a month off so that helps me stay on top. Also I learnt a long time ago that less is more with benzos (shortly after discovering you could order large quantitys from online pharmacies in early 2000s funnily enough).
       The first time you pop 10mg Valium when you not had any for a while it gets you all nice and woozy. But the tolerance develops really quickly. I've learnt not to start necking 3 or 5 trying to chase the high. I only ever take one at once, and usually no more than 2 or 3 in a day. If I do this for a month I can usually just taper off over a few days; like 20 mg for a day or two then 10 then 5 and normally avoid any ill effects.
      It's all fun and games now while I'm still on a script. But I'm uncomfortably aware that if I let them continue to reduce my subs after xmas I can't carry on having a bag or two every week.  I'd need to stay away when the final weaning process took place.
         My drug treatment place is having one of its regular  changes of management soon so god knows what attitude the new regime will have. Having gone from a full on skeletal junky seven years ago to a totally stable family man on subs they have been pretty much wiling to leave well enough alone recently, in fact it was my suggestion to reduce the sub dose ( but secretly doing the smack head double think "hmmm I could get high again  mwa ha ha") due to unwanted side effects. I have actually seen the SAME doctor for the last three visits which is a first in my 15 year experience of this drug treatment agency!

you know next time you're clean you should freeze some piss and keep it till you get tested. on the day take it out, defrost it in a pot of warm water then stuff it down your pants when you go in the clinic. works a treat. where i went they would tell you to take the testing pot in the toilet and empty it so i would pour it back in the bottle and take it back to the freezer at home. i had them testing the exact same sample of piss every two weeks for over a year.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 18, 2013, 01:04 pm
Well lucky old me got my letter from s and s this morning containing the .25 of gear plus a very healthy sample of rock. It was fairly powdery, I guess due to stealth requirements, but I got out a nice simple metal hash pipe (you know the kind you can get for a couple of quid from any head shop, that screws to bits, with a picture of bob Marley on it.) I like these for rock as they are totally air tight and you get a hot blast straight to your lungs. I reckon the sample was easy .2 so thanks seeds and stuff ! I split it into four pipes, amassed a nice healthy bed of ash and hit the pipe.
     I've not had any rock for a while so the effects were pretty pleasant! I lay back and made a few traditional cheek blowing noises like 'phew…' and enjoyed the rush. I would say this is decent crack and it did the job nicely! I would definitely buy this stuff off him (when my budget allowed… the trouble with rock is its over so quickly and then you feel this intense sadness and desire for more!).
     The gear seems pretty tasty this time too so all in all a pleasant lunch break!
What more can I say, I am not a crack expert so you will have to wait for some more considered judgements, but it got me very  nicely high and euphoric  and I want some more!

Be patient guys the sample of stone is free he can take as long as he likes to ship it :) nagging him will just convince the guy not to do samples again

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 18, 2013, 07:49 pm
Quote from: isallmememe on September 18, 2013, 02:18 pm
how long did it take to arrive hungry ghost? was it next day?

Yes it came next day with my h order, I presume because I also had made a normal order he was just able to throw it in with that. Like you, I couldn't take smoking a stone without brown to go with it. I like to be able to take the rush and then switch off the unpleasant after effects with a few toots of gear. I had half a mind to pick up some works and have a speedball but thought better of it.
       As a rule stimulants don't really agree with me. I always enjoy the come up but then there's always a point where its like 'beeeeoooooop!' Comedown, and over the years that point has moved forward until its not long after my first line. I wouldn't touch any speed like compound (with the notable exception of MDMA) and coke is just chatting bullshit while wanting another line. A mate of mine once said the high of coke consists of knowing you can have another line.
       I like crack because its just like 'proceed directly to release of dopamine' no messing about, its like the distillation of the experience. I don't like the way I feel after though; like a fucking praying mantis with my wrists all bent in, moving about slowly and deliberately as I load up another pipe. That sample had to day was jjust the right amount for me, four genuinely enjoyable pipes with a couple licks of brown in between to steady my nerves. I've never seen the point of spunking money on rock after rock, you never get the hit you do off the first couple.
      If S&S  can put together a package with .25 of each I think it would be very popular. I think my sample was about that and I got four fat satisfying pipes out of it which seems about right to me. Like I say I've not scored off street for years, particularly rock, but compared with the rocks I used to see for a tenner,aand assuming the white would be priced similarly to the dark, then it'd be decent value.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 18, 2013, 08:39 pm
Yeah I used to do a fair bit of speed in combination with pills for going out dancing in early nineties (god the thought of me dancing now! I was a bit more slinky then!) But the gurning comedown was always nasty, and a bit of brown always helped. Its weird because my group of mates went from weed>smack and only later got into the ravey stuff. Coke passed me by pretty much, but like I say, with stimulants its like the come down just got closer and closer to the start each time until now if I were to be offered a line of coke I'd turn it down.
(Actually who the fuck am I kidding, I'd hoover it up and then spend the next hour chewing my lips and feeling paranoid. I have turned down Es several times recently though when round my mates for a couple beers and a spliff. I have kids and I just couldn't deal with the comedown the next day. Plus my Mrs would leave me and take kids with her!)
         So I have downers mostly, because they are actually useful tools for dealing with the many stresses of my life. I have to be strict with myself though because I've got a lot to lose these days. If I were to have rock it'd be an occaisional treat.  I can smoke a pipe toot a bit of brown and get back to work. 
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: CLK on September 18, 2013, 09:34 pm
+1 for me, i used to love any and every stimulant, until the highs got lower and the lows got lower, i swear i'm coming down an hour after a fat bomb of MDMA:(, also the comedowns became completely unmanagable, this was before i properly got onto gear and valium didn't touch it.. then i experienced the beauty of downers, and i've never looked back (well, i have a peek every now and then)

With this stone since i cant use gear to come down from it, i'll probably smoke/shoot it before i take my subbys, even if not 200mg of crack is more than managable :). It might just be me, but i've really often found crack a huge waste of money, once or twice its got me just right, but mostly i find the rush mediocre, i'd feel better off a massive line of mephedrone.. But then i was never really too much into stone, just gear gear gear

But aye, it seems to be the way with most who carry on after party days, stims gradually changing to downers, which are much much nicer but come with the cost of an addiction heh. Though there are plenty of phet heads, god hardcore speed junkies are a complete wreck

Oh thats just reminded me actually, i have maybe 50mg of extremely high purity speed (a 40mg bomb kept me rushing all day), and i've never actually IVd speed before, whats the rush/high like? Is it worth a shot just this once, since i've only got this tiny bit lying around? Would love to hear what the rush and after effects/overall high is like from one of you guys, you seem to be on the same wavelength drug-wise
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: zazoo on September 18, 2013, 09:41 pm
I got a 0.25 of his brown, next day delivery.  Good to have next day domestic as ADUK and TN are down.  TN particularly whilst he has good decent value domestic gear, he seems to have lost the consistency of when he started and seedsnstuff seems to be filling those boots for when ur needing sthing to tick you over.

The gear runs well but has a sour taste to it.  It is decent value for domestic so I am happy with my purchase and will use again.  I would say it is weaker than TN's chocolate batch which in turn is weaker than ADUK's.  Hard for me to quantify but if c63 is an 8.5, TN is a 6.5 and seeds is a 5.5.  What you guys reckon?

Think we are all grateful to see a domestic guy doing next day and 0.25 for a decent price.  Sure strong gear would be great but I dont expect UK gear to be strong so shop in Asia/Holland for that. ;)
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 18, 2013, 10:24 pm
ADUK is back up, however I was favourably impressed with the latest bag off seeds. The powder seemed a darker colour in the bag, and it gave a nice dark beetle without that red tinge. I think I'd rate it higher than TNs chocolate stuff. I think that seemed stronger because it burned up quicker and tasted harsher, so you'd get more gear with each toot, but it wouldn't run as far. I think ADs has the slight edge for strength but Seeds is  more reliable for next day, and the bags are a bit bigger. I think all three are reliable sources who I can order off and be confident I'll be happy with what I'll get.
          Dispater and Beston3 I have less experience with, and when I ordered off them I was still on over 4mg of subutex, so it was difficult for me to judge the effects properly. I'd be interested to hear what their current offerings were like
            Jimmy Boyles mid stuff was a lovely bit of gear and not that much more pricey. He only does .5s though, and being on the low dose subs, I find I can do a .2 bag in a day and resume normal subs the next day with no ill effects. The two/three day binge of a .5 or a g I find is harder to adjust back to my subs, and anyway, I don't like diverting that much money to what is basically my dirty little secret. 20 odd quid every week or so I can square with my conscience.
      Shit its good to have some good UK gear available on SR. When I started there was maybe one or two, neither of whom were very reliable or consistent in quality.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 18, 2013, 10:31 pm
Another good development I've noticed recently is sellers on localbitcoins selling about 10% cheaper than the 'official' rate. Not so long ago it was the other way about.  I guess a lot of vendors are using it to cash out and so will sell to the professional middlemen cheap, and competition keeps them passing on the savings to small time buyers like me. I suppose as long as they can sell the coins for more than they paid for them the current rate doesn't matter much to them
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: CLK on September 18, 2013, 10:57 pm

Wonder why silk road was always so much cheaper (thus more expensive lol)

Might buy a few coins as an investment while the price is lowish.. wish id bought some when they were £2 each! Stupid old me thinking 'itl never take off', people i know made 10s of 1000s from buying a few really early on! Lucky sods
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 18, 2013, 11:53 pm
ahh man, i had a little fright on localbitcoins this morning. i was up early trying to get my coin quick so i could get my orders done in time for todays post. i made a transaction to one seller but he still hadn't responded in like 45 minutes. so i cancelled him and moved onto another. he answered pretty quick and told him i was transferring the 100 quid now. i did the bank transfer and marked payment complete. and then i waited, and waited, for like 10 minutes. i've never waited more than two before my btc were in my wallet. so i messaged him to ask if he got the payment and waited for the reply. suddenly it showed a notification and i clicked it assuming it was him messaging me back. the first thing i read on the screen of the next page was 'transaction cancelled by seller'. i felt my heart drop into my stomach proper when i immediately realized i had sent the transfer and was too late to stop it. i'm like wtf, messaging the seller and asking wtf he was doing etc. i sent about 4 messages to him and even contacted resolution before i realized the transaction that was cancelled was referring to the previous one from the guy who i waited 45 minutes for. it seriously had me going there for a minute. i know i didn't read the screen properly but i reckon localbitcoin do need to format their site a bit better. still i defo noticed its cheaper to buy coin from there lately, i often end up with more cash worth of coin in my sr wallet than i actually bought, which is awesome.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 19, 2013, 03:21 pm

yeah it was ok, not the best white ever, but as good as anything you'd get on the street now a days. the brown has violin rosin cut in which is something i haven't come across in a good few years. back in the days you would get gear cut with it now and then. not the best thing you could cut gear with but then not the worst either. its just it gives it that funny unmistakable pine tree resin taste to it. all gear is cut with something tho, the gear is fair enough strength which is the main thing.

definitely spot on 10/10 for speed of delivery and stealth tho. both were awesome.
