Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 20, 2013, 01:34 pm
Anyone else waiting on All Drugs to process? He put his listings back up Wednesday morning. I ordered a .2 off him on Thursday morning then realised he hadn't logged in since putting listings up. (I should of stuck with seeds and stuff but I only had .3 btc in my account which was enough for AD but not quite for seeds) I knew he takes a bit longer which is why I ordered on Thursday morning hoping  he would mark in transit thurs night (he always seems to put in transit overnight meaning it doesn't actually get sent till following day) and arrive Saturday, when I want it for. But he didn't log back in until late thurs, when he posted on his page he would work through the backlog and get everyone posted on Friday. This morning (according to discussion) all the wed orders are in transit but my thurs morning is still processing. I am hoping he doesn't mark it in transit this evening meaning it will sit in a post box all weekend and not come till Tuesday. I get the whole 'this ain't eBay' thing, but most of the UK smack vendors have a cut off time and they'll get it to you next day. I'm just wishing he hadn't put his listings back up on Wednesday morning if he wasn't ready to start processing until Thursday night. Id have gone and got another fiver off local bitcoins and gone with seeds and stuff if I'd known.
      Obviously if he gets it in post today ill be eating some humble pie but I'm getting fed up of checking and seeing 'processing'. I keep telling myself to forget about it, it'll come when it comes but you know what it's like.
      We really need a third category.
"Awaiting action" for before vendor has seen order, and buyer can cancels
"Processsing" when vendor is packing etc. there could be a limit on how many can be marked processing at once, to prevent vendors just marking all orders straight away.
"In transit" as normal.
       I've proposed this in the past but you just get shouted down  by vendors saying "yeah but people would just be cancelling after I licked a stamp and everything"(having not read or fully understood the proposal.)
Vendors work really hard I get it, but it is annoying when you are stuck with one vendor who is too busy when you know there are at least two or three others who would deliver by tomorrow.
         It's like if I ring a street dealer and he says ' twenty minutes mate' then switches his phone off for three days, at least my twenty quid isn't tied up waiting for him, I can go elsewhere.
        And All Drugs if you are reading this I DO NOT MEAN THAT I WANT TO CANCEL! It's too late now to go elsewhere, just please hurry! Thanks
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)

Theyv been the only 2 with 100% good communication and honest shipping times. But i cant see how an extra catagory would help, itd be the miorty of vendors who would change anything about how often they lie about it being shipped..

      I'm not particularly slagging All Drugs off, I just was hoping to get it for Saturday and now it looks like its going to be next week

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on September 20, 2013, 03:53 pm

Quote from: CLK on September 19, 2013, 10:16 am

Report back isa! We need to know!

yeah it was ok, not the best white ever, but as good as anything you'd get on the street now a days. the brown has violin rosin cut in which is something i haven't come across in a good few years. back in the days you would get gear cut with it now and then. not the best thing you could cut gear with but then not the worst either. its just it gives it that funny unmistakable pine tree resin taste to it. all gear is cut with something tho, the gear is fair enough strength which is the main thing.

definitely spot on 10/10 for speed of delivery and stealth tho. both were awesome.

thx S&S

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 20, 2013, 08:03 pm
Quote from: Hungry ghost on September 20, 2013, 01:34 pm

      We really need a third category.
"Awaiting action" for before vendor has seen order, and buyer can cancels
"Processsing" when vendor is packing etc. there could be a limit on how many can be marked processing at once, to prevent vendors just marking all orders straight away.
"In transit" as normal.
       I've proposed this in the past but you just get shouted down  by vendors saying "yeah but people would just be cancelling after I licked a stamp and everything"(having not read or fully understood the proposal.)


i dunno, my guess is that the smarter vendors have their tor connected computers at a different location to their packaging place. that would cause a lot more fucking about and just serve to slow down orders even more.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: zazoo on September 20, 2013, 08:46 pm
I prefer TN's choco cut to SeedsnStuff cut but tbh after a couple lines you get used to it.  The price is slightly cheaper as well I believe for Seeds.  Anyone know wtf happens with TN these days?  Is it stock issues or security?  Seems he cant get the ship sailing like it was back in the day.  Few weeks here and there.

Also ADUK I am not sure when he marks orders in transit/ posts them.  I have ordered off him in the morning of (for example) wednesday and ordered tuesday night.  Both orders are marked in transit wednesday later evening (after post collection) and they arrive on friday.  I hve had 3 orders now and all of them have taken 2 days rather than next day delivery. 

Anyone else have this?  One time I am certain he marke din transit early afternoon and still took 2 days.  Never had this before and tbh I can order from NL in the same time and for cheaper.  Not saying it is vendors fault but curious if others get this.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 20, 2013, 09:12 pm
Yes, every time... He marks in transit overnight and I asked him about it and he said yes I posted it then, it'll be collected in morning. Which means it doesn't come till day after. Most vendors will mark in transit early evening and that means "I got it in before last post for you, expect tomorrow."
       I am currently in this position as, knowing his usual time taken, ordered Thursday morning hoping to get Saturday. He marked in transit about 4pm today. I hope this means it'll be there tomorrow (made last post) but I won't be missing my subs in the morning in expectation, it makes the wait seem too long if there is possible disappointment. If it comes well and good, I'll save it for Sunday.
      If not it won't get here till Tuesday will it? As you say it might be good gear but I could have ordered it from NL myself in same time. We will see.
      I'll be tempted to stick to Seeds and Stuff, or Top notch  if so, there gear might not be quite as good but it does the job fine for me and they never fail to deliver. Seeds in particular is really good to deal with.
      Or jimmy Boyle if he ever comes back!

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 20, 2013, 10:24 pm
I know but a) as far as the missus is concerned I don't dabble and if she found out then all hell would break loose.
                 b) if I was on methodone there really would be no barrier to me using as much as I wanted.
          Like at the moment if I do a bag a bit too often and feel shitty after, my first thing to do is take a larger dose of subs, which makes me feel better and also blocks gear for a few days until I get the dose. down again.
          With methodone in that circumstance you can take can larger dose and actually get a bit high which can set you penduluming and actually make things worse.
        I am uncomfortably aware that its getting more often though. I'm also aware that this current period is like a grace period, its working pretty well for me, 2.4 subs is just right so i can dabble one day and still itll hold me the next. but if  I proceed with the subutex taper and carry on doing gear I'm just going to end up with a habit. I mean obviously I still got an opiate habit but I mean a heroin one. I've got a sizeable stash of subs saved up, and if I do continue to dabble I'll stick to only buying .2 s and having a couple of valleys after to ease back in.
        To be honest before my four year period where I did nothing but subs I managed to dabble fairly successfully for a few years, mostly by  being shit scared of getting another habit! I never want to end up in that waking up every day with the countdown ticking. You hit up and turn the hour glass over but always the sands running out. If I found myself heading back that way I would just ask to be out back on subs before it got out of control.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: charas420 on September 21, 2013, 06:24 am

Hi
I've ordered a few times from ADUK, Opium ans Smack every order has taken 2 days, 1 took 3.
Which as said is no qucker than a C63 order and a lot dearer.
 On the subject mentioned of subs and Mathedone. A few weeks ago, the DRs fucked up my script so I did not get my script for a few days. I went into panic mode once the Chemist said 'you pick up is suspended'.
I had to chase an old friend, he gave me a few 100ml of Methedone and a few 10 bags of Brown.
I am on 2.4 Subs, I had not had any for 36 hrs, I thought 5 or 10 ml of Meth would hold me easily! 60ml later I was still ill. I did not take any more, I stuck with the Brown for 3 days & a ten bag held me for 24hrs.
I never got on with meth when using too, I found it blocked the 'nice ' effects from the Gear,  and I can smoke a ton and not get off on it, now I can take the 2.4mg subbies at 4 or 5 am and by the time I get home from work at tea time I can get wrecked off a small bag of gear with no problem the next day going back to the subs, even if I binge for a few days, I might have to up the subs dose but it is really quite easy to get back stable on the subs. So for me Subutex beats Methedone hands down.
When I was younger I had been on Meth for over Ten years, I had a script for Amps and Physeptone  tablets, I was on sugar free for a while, we used to boil that down a bang it up, that was in the days when UK addicts were dealt with at the Psychiatric part of the hospital. I did a complete stop after working down from about 75ml to about 25ml I stopped dead! The rattle went on for Months!! If I remember right, It started in early September and was still not 'right' at Xmas, I went weeks with practically no sleep.
I never want to do that again, and although I have not done a Subs detox yet, it could not possibly be as bad as a Methedone rattle. The fucking stuff was the Nazis invention and was used in their camps as Method one you can guess what for.

I have only subbies for a week and have not had a smoke for over a week, & I'm hanging out for a toot.
I hope you are all in a better situation than me.
Take care every one.

C
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 21, 2013, 08:11 am
Yeah, 2 or 2.4 mg seems to be about the magic dose for subs, from what I've read it'll hold most people , even with full on H habits. The only reason it gets prescibed at such high doses is a) drug treatment agencies are staffed by well intentioned lovely people who haven't a fucking clue. b) the higher doses effectively block illicit opiate use for up to a week, making it very effective at keeping addicts on meds. and c) in america, where many junkys won't have health insurance and must pay $100s for their scripts, a bunch of 8mg pills won't cost much more than a bunch of 2mg ones, so kind doctors prescribe the 8s with a wink, knowing the script will last the addict longer.
             The trouble us that the workers at my place, having read all the literature from the drug companies, believe that buprenorphine withdrawal is much easier than heroin, and that 2 mg is basically an insignificant dose. I have been urged to 'jump off' and take a 'medicine called lofexedine, which isn't an opiate but will alleviate your symptoms'( I know what lofexidine us you patronising student doctor, I have seen your kind come and go over and over, and I'm not taking that horrible shit again)
          Eyebrows are raised at my proposal to slowly taper to .1 mg of subutex and knowing looks exchanged. They've heard about this psychological addiction. Best humour him.
         I would dearly love these doctors to be made to take 2mg of subutex daily for a few  months and then tell me about psychological addiction.
        Its like the doctor I heardon the radio  explaining his research had shown that heroin addiction was largely in the head, and the WDs were little more than mild flu. 'They just like taking it' All doctors who make  such statements should be forcibly injected with heroin four times a day for three months and then have their dose replaced with placebo saline. If they are correct they won't notice the difference.
         I'm not sure whether to just insist to my drug workers that I stay at this convenient dose of 2.4. The agency is going through one if its regular management changes. I feel sorry for the staff really. On the one hand they have their clients constantly lying and disappointing them and kicking off because they spent the last three days smacked up and didn't bother to collect their script and now its been cancelked . on the other hand they are getting constant pressure from above to meet constantly changing targets.
       Still I may be able to turn the confusion to my advantage. On the other hand I might get some hard line dick head who is like 'you have fannied around long enough my freind' which in fairness I have.
        The way this governments drug policy is heading I may end up getting sent to some kind of reeducation centre  and getting electric shock based aversion therapy.
         Couple of years ago there was some talk of a program called "intuitive recovery". I looked at the site and it was just a load of NLP, self help bullshit about how basically there is no such thing as addiction, 'addicts' just like taking drugs because they are pleasurable. So addicts just need to stop taking drugs. I declined to attend but what angered me is that the council was paying hundreds of quid per client to these fraudsters. The drug treatment centre is already woefully underfunded and my council tax was been given to these dickheads.
   ( I do pay council tax plus am being made to pay for all the years where I didn't pay ie most of my adult life. The council tax never give up and they ask ways find you eventually. All other forms of debt can be ignored and will eventually give up, in my experience. Lucky for me! Oh and court fines will get round to you eventually too.)
       Anyway had my subs this morning and if All Drugs defys my expectations and delivers I'll save it till tomorrow. Unlike crack, I can save H as long as I'm not rattling.


Incidentally Charas, is opium any good? I have been tempted but worry that basically I'll be getting weaker, unrefined heroin and will wish I bought smack instead. Its like all those American opiates; oxys and whatnot. I'd like to try them but cant believe they are worth the prices.

Still, Missus is working all day and all night tomorrow so that'll be me with my feet up tooting at my leisure.
      Just wanted to add I thought seeds crack was fine. About what I'd expect from good street stuff but with the advantage of being a proper weighed amount instead of some dipped travesty. Get it listed and I can waste some money on a drug that lasts ten minutes at best! Aaah crack you bastard. I don't even like you but I want you right now. Not like good old reliable heroin, my trustworthy friend and companion. At least you give a fair deal. It's selling your soul but getting a fair price.

I have used them for way to long, I even had a lesbian couple that used to ring up to try to score for their new client who would not be able to see a Dr till after weekend, & then it turned out to be for themselves.
I would love to be able to get away from the whole thing and manage my own habit, but at the moment it just is not practicable or affordable, I saw a 2mg on SR selling for £11 round here you can get 7x8mg for 10 or 20 quid, depending on how much they want their next stone.

I have not been able to order for week, and can't for another week yet, & I am hanging out for a smoke, got plenty of subs & weed, but it aint the same with out a toot.

 My mrs will have her share of freebase/crack, so I can get away with a come down bag , trouble is that bag is usually 2 or 3 half G's all ordered together so I will be almost guaranteed to have some when the coke/crack arrives.

 Oh and I had not had Opium since I was a kid and wanted to try some, but I would not bother again, I just kind of got a sicky heavy feeling. I will stick to the Brown it is MUCH better value.

Sorry for the long post, I just smoked a spliff and am a bit babbley

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 21, 2013, 05:18 pm
Quote from: JumpinJimbo on September 21, 2013, 04:30 pm
I really wanna buy some brown stuff off the road but the whole bitcoin thing puts me off. Il probably take the plunge early next week with an anonymous bank transfer on localbitcoins.

you don't have to do a bank to bank transfer, you can do a cash deposit into your local branch of the sellers bank, over the counter. say for example the seller was with lloyds, you just go into your local lloyds branch with the sellers name, sort code, account no and the reference number. give the details and the cash to the teller, and they will make the payment. it goes in immediately and keeps you pretty much anonymous, bar the cctv in the bank, but that's not going to get checked for something like this. just make sure you write down the details clearly and exact, like absolutely 100% exact every number. especially the reference number.

also use only localbitcoin sellers with (100/100) next to their name

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 23, 2013, 01:48 am
@mercurny - C63s A gear really is good, i've had it about 4 times now, its excellent strong quality every time. it has a slight dark color to it and is very fine dusty powder. you certainly wouldn't be complaining about it tho.

his B grade stuff is similar color but has a bit of a sugar cut to it. its still not bad gear tho, still you wouldn't complain considering the price. i would definitely give my recommendation to either of them but if you can afford then its worth getting the A grade, it is the best gear i know of on sr within the Eu and i doubt many people would argue about that.

@latexpods - you could try alldrugsuk, he resells C63s A grade gear, i've had that too and it really is exactly the same. he's a bit more expensive than C63 but he is domestic for me so i like the next day delivery that i get from him. C63 specifically states that he won't ship to the US, but aduk doesn't say that.

do you just rewash it in just hot water or what? i was thinking of doing this with his rock but don't wanna fuck it up obviously.

  Yes mate, in to a spoon with water heat a bit until you get a blob of oil, then let it cool or dab at it with a cold butter knife and the Rock will stick to the end. filter the last bit if you haven't magaged to get it all to stick.
It is really very simple and ensures its a clean wash, which helps if the first wash was with Ammonia.
C

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 24, 2013, 06:51 am
Maybe I'm being unfair to him, but the same happened to me with him (didn't log on for a couple days, meanwhile everyone who ordered stressed out, then he logged on and processed everyone , so he wasn't actually late in my case)and I was thinking, if he is reselling, and he reups, maybe he isn't buying huge amounts and so he runs out, then doesn,t bother logging in till the reup delivers; meanwhile he has collected a healthy backlog of orders.(mind you he sells multiple items so ths doesn't really fit)
       Either way its annoying when a vendor goes AWOL without notice, and you make an order. The good vendors will put a big noticable update on their page warning of it. Once might be a personal emergency, but AD seems to do it as he feels like it and it makes it difficult to plan.o
       It reminds me of dealers who you ring up and they go "outside tesco in 20minutes mate" and you get there and there's five different junkys trying to wait inconspicuously, and five more turn up while you are waiting, and then they drive up and serve everyone at once. Of course IRL this is risky for the dealer, but doing it online is easier.
          ADs gear is nice though and being fair, its always been with me in 2 days as it says on page so I guess I've got no complaints.
         Its weird though, I got it Saturday and so started on it early Sunday, rather than early afternoon like usual. Whern I put it on the foil it had that smell even before I turned it, so it was top gear, but I smoked it all day and didn't really get proper nod off it.This has happened before when I start it so early so it wasn't the gear; I don't know whether its because its slightly closer to my last Sub dose (although I can't see six hours making such a big difference) or perhaps because I'm trying to make it last all day. Either way I seem to have a bitch of a tolerance and 0.2 just ain't doing it anymore. I guess I think of myself as having been clean a long time but in fact I've been on subs all that time.
     Taking into account both quality and service, I guess Seeds would be my favourite at moment. Admittedly ADs stuff was stronger but I didn't notice a huge difference, and the unpredictasbility of AD counts heavily against him forme.
      BestOn3 has small listings back up, last iI ordered off him it was when I still was on too high subs so can't reasll make judgement of him or dispater. (Also, after being messed about on local bitcoins, I was trying to make a late order at 4.30. I messaged the vendor to see if I made cut off for next day, and when I next logged on I saw he had marked in transit "Nice one what a guy" I thought....then I noticed the message "if you FE now I will send today. Up to you"   This pissed me off but I thought if I don't, whos to say he won't mess me about tomorrow. I should have asked to cancel (it was after last post anyway) but like a mug I FEd. The gear didn't come until day after next anyway. I can't remember whether it was dispater or beston3 who did this but it left a bad taste and I have avoided both since. Bit unfair, but the innocent suffer along with the guilty!)
         Jimmy Boyle is back on. His mid was the best gear I have had since time immemorial. (In legal terms that refers to the reign of King Henry II, so forever realky) When you are buying .2 s and .5 s anyway it isn't much more expensive. It literally ran clear on foil for first couple of foils. Don't know if his new batch is the same but I'd be inclined to trust him.
        There is a french seller offering 0.25 samples for 0.17 btc, that's like £15! Tempted to have a gamble but feedback is very few, with one "this wasn't even fucking gear wouldn't cook up" I've seen similar feedback in gear I know to be good though so meh.
        Won't be ordering for a week or so anyway,got some valleys coming soon (black tuna gang, decent strength and v. reliable)so gonna reduce my sub still further. I'll see whos on then. I just want a proper gouch, but I don't want to start hitting my veins again. Once you do that its hard to go back to smoking, and I do like a nice chase. Apart from the blocking, the subs seem to have set my tolerance proper high, when a .2 of nice gear only gets me feeling relaxed. I was up and down the foil like 'one more line one more line....OK one more, change foil, just a couple to get it started' but its like I couldnt get past a certain point.. Its like the subs are still blocking somewhat. Want to see what haspoens when I reduce down to 1.5 or 1

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 26, 2013, 06:42 pm
years ago i figured that the less air you have in a pipe to start the better the hit would be. so i looked for the very smallest thing i could make a pipe out of, and that was a cut off clipper lighter. i sawed the top off with a hack saw, drilled a hole in the side, put in a pipe and sealed with blutak then fitted the foil over the top with a laggy band. works fucking brilliantly. i started a bit of a craze for a while where everyone round my area were making them. i got one now i made the other week. i'll take a pic so you can see.

here, its just the usual cigarette ash type pipe but works great.

http://torimagesbp2vt3u.onion/i/dEKf.jpg

http://torimagesbp2vt3u.onion/i/Ih6b.jpg
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 26, 2013, 07:22 pm
As I said, I found a cheap metal hash pipe consisting of a metal bowl with a screw in metal pipe very effective, with a gauze, and a blob of ciggy ash to support the liquifying rock. Air tight and simple. My mate used to use a short right angled copper pipe (with pin poked foil and elastic band.) The clipper idea sounds like it would work well.
       You can get a screw fitting pipe with a picture of Bob Marley on it for couple quid at any car boot sale or head shop, strip it of any excess crap.you basically want a airtight tube long enough to stop you burning your lips.
       Some like the air chamber of a small panda pop bottle with a birotube stuck in it, made airtight with blutack or gum or tape. Then a foil top secured with an elastic band.
       I always wanted to try a proper glass stem, where you have a tiny ball of steel wool in the end to hold the vaporizing rock, and you hear the outside of the pipe.
     You can probably run it on foil but you would waste a lot if you didn't time yoursuck and suck hard,
      Great now I want a pipe! Crack is weird. I think it has no physical addiction and never had any problem leaving it alone but just thinking about it causes a pang of intense longing for that taste. I don't even know if I find it euphoric like did the first few times, it just causes a sensation that my brain wants again. Its like when I have it I will use it compulsively till its gone and then have a few licks of brown, and I don't particularly get the urge to get more, even if it was just a phone call away. If its in front of me I'll slap tenners down until my wallets empty but its like a short term addiction.
       I always feel more than one rocks a waste. You're just a gibbering fiend after first one and its hard to describe keep hitting the pipe as pleasure.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 26, 2013, 08:43 pm
i had one of them little metal pipes you're talking about once and it wasn't air tight at all. maybe it was just a faulty one but the thread on the screw in bit was rubbish. i could never get the whole hit cause i was getting so much air coming in.

seriously tho guys, get an old clipper and make the pipe i showed you. its easy as fuck, takes five minutes if you have a proper hack saw and drill. just burn the fresh cut edge a little with a lighter to blunten off any sharp edges and you're good to go.

even if you just do one pipe through it to try.

i bet you don't only do one pipe tho.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 26, 2013, 09:48 pm
Quote from: jdddd on September 26, 2013, 08:57 pm
Thanks for the advice guys/gals can I just ask one last very obvious question that im 99% sure I already know....

Is it ok to hit the rock with the flame directly or is the aim to heat up around it?

the trick is to sort of dance the flame back and forward over it. the flame does actually need to touch the rock to burn it but if you just hold it there the rock will melt and a lot will actually drip straight through the ash and the holes into the pipe. you will also burn a big hole straight through the foil. you want to be holding the flame for just a second or so then take it away for a moment, then back on for a second or two.

its obvious you've never used crack before so i will go over a few things. for one you will probably want to scrap the pipes that we've been telling you about and get a clear pipe of some sort. a miniature bacardi bottle would be ideal or as small a plastic clear drink bottle you can find. this will enable you to see how much smoke is coming into the pipe and will help a great deal for how regularly to put the flame to the ash. basically if the bottle clears of smoke then you need to be running that flame across the ash again. the trick is really catching it before it completely clears.

now the rate at which you inhale is also important. but first let me advise you on something else that a lot of noobs do. you need to completely clear your lungs before you put that pipe in your mouth and you have to be very careful not to blow out or exhale once that pipe is in your mouth because if you do the slightest little puff into that pipe will blow the ash and the rock straight off and it will be all over the place. there's nowhere else for that air to go except out the top of the pipe where the ash is sitting right on top. ash is very easily blown away and you'll likely lose some or even all of the rock if you do this. even the best case scenario is spending the next five minutes setting up again and having to dig all the bits of gear up. and especially with c63's because it is powdered up so trust me you will lose most of his gear if you do this. i usually start sucking slowly just as i put the pipe to my lips even before i put the flame to it.

back to the rate of inhalation. its a fine balance but i always tell noobs to use a medium inhale. if you inhale too slow then the rock will burn and produce more smoke than you are drawing into the pipe and it will just float off and you'll lose it. if you suck too hard you will suck the flame into the pipe, it will melt a hole into your foil and you risk gear dripping through the pipe. basically if you see the flame being pulled right into the pipe then you are sucking too hard, slow it down a little.

anyway when you first put the flame to the rock it will immediately melt into the ash and you will notice a black patch in the middle of the ash. that is the crack soaked into the ash. just keep waving the flame across this, if you use a clear pipe you will actually see the clouds of smoke fill the bottle as you run the flame over. once the crack has all been burned the black patch will turn white and you will notice no more smoke coming from it. its now done, dead. hold the smoke in for about 5 or 6 seconds then exhale quickly. as you exhale it will hit you like a ton of bricks.

(Get a plastic bottle and a metal cheap stock stock then mod it by putting some metal gauze or tin foil with some small holes into the stock put some ash on top of this then the crack). Im assuming not to put water in it?

In terms of a dose about how much of the half gram bag should i put in?

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 26, 2013, 10:20 pm
no its the other way round for a crack pipe. you put the foil on the top of the bottle, where the stock goes you just put a bic pen tube or similar to suck the smoke through. you will hold the bottle upright at all times with a crack pipe otherwise your rock will likely roll off the ash..

the reason for this is with weed you have the stock going into water to cool the smoke. you can't do this with crack because cocaine is water soluble and the crack will dissolve into the water before it gets to you. also the water cools the weed smoke to make it less chokey. this is unnecessary with crack because it will numb your throat as the smoke goes down and will not be chokey at all. not unless its some shit crack anyway, but it will not be the case with what you get from c63.

the only reason for putting water into a crack pipe is if the bottle is large, then it is filled with water to below the pipe level. this is solely for the reason of reducing the space inside the bottle meaning you will need to suck less air out of the pipe before you get to the crack smoke. you do not want the smoke going through the water at all.

it also makes it easier to set up cause like i said earlier if you tip the pipe at any time the crack will roll off the ash. this way you can sit the pipe down and lay on the ash and then place the crack on using both hands and not having to hold the pipe at an angle with one hand. it will be tricky trying to set up with only one hand. much better to have both hands free. the powdered stuff with c63 especially cause you will need to scoop it up to put on the ash.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 26, 2013, 10:25 pm
here, i just found a pic on google that shows you perfectly what you want. this set up would be ideal for your first go

http://cdn.c.photoshelter.com/img-get/I00009JIChpad7Gg/s/750/600/Crack-Pipe-2.jpg

one thing tho, get a small piece of blutac and work it in your fingers, stretch it out and get it nice and soft. then use it to seal around where the pen tube goes into the bottle. it is very hard to get a proper airtight seal without it.

oh and use an elastic band around the foil where they have just put the break off part of the bottle lid. you'll just tear the foil trying to do that and elastic band is so much easier and gives 100% airtight seal.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 26, 2013, 10:51 pm
you know what, thinking back to the first time i ever did a pipe, a friend sorted me out with it so it was just an average size pipe. i wish for my first ever time i had bought a bit and put a whacking great lump on cause you can never get the feel of that first hit again.

but generally if i had a .2 stone i would do it in 4, maybe five if its a nice sized one. but putting a full half of a 20 stone on, which would be about .1 does make for an awesome hit. its up to you really, a .1 on the pipe won't hurt you anymore than if you split it in two, but the rush will be absolutely fucking awesome. i'm guessing if you're getting of c63 then you're getting half a G. so i'd say go for it on your first and do a .1

then switch to about half that at a time to keep topping it up. about .05 i'd call an average and perfectly fine pipe usually tho, it all depends how hard you like your hit and how many pipes you want to make from what you got.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 26, 2013, 11:37 pm
you can't smoke crack alone on the foil properly. the only time i've known anyone smoke it like that is mixed with heroin to make snowball. to get the high with the low. its just a slight bit of high you get from the crack as on the foil you are smoking it gradually like heroin. but then if it gave you too much high it would dominate the downer effect of the brown completely. its no way to smoke crack on its own.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: c63amg on September 29, 2013, 01:37 pm
Hello Everybody,

Last week we were busy with building a new environment so that we can speed up our working process and run thing smoother.
This cost us some extra time, so that’s why there are still people waiting for replies on there messages.
We´ve been working on SR for almost two years now and never took a day off only when it was necessary and when it was in the advantage for our beloved fans and customers.
We hope that everybody understands that when we are not replying fast to his or her messages or processing of an order takes longer than 24hours it´s not because we don’t want to ship or reply to your messages but it means that we are trying to figure out methods how we can work faster, built a stealthier package,  a better work environment or something else that´s going to be in the advantage of SR.
Since yesterday we took the whole day to built up our buffer again in packages so that we can ship ASAP again as usual.
We have a new C and H batch and the samples will be up tonight or on Wednesday but I will keep you enlightened.

For everybody that has an order that has not arrived please gives us till tomorrow night to reply to your message we don´t scam and all issues or matters will be sorted out as always.
 
Have a nice Sunday



C63amg

C63amg

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: Hungry ghost on September 30, 2013, 12:02 am
Well I took plunge and bought a couple of bags off the street. I have a close friend who is still into the local gear scene and knows who has good stuff. I got a couple of ten bags, The gear was fairly decent (about the standard id exoecr from most UK SR sellers but the tenner bags were pretty small; this makes sense too as they have been selling ten bags for twenty years now, inflation has to take hold somewhere. These were probably closer to .1 than .2.
      So its pretty much confirmed what I thought; gear on SR IS expensive but not too much.  Mind you I've smoked one of these bags tonight and I'm having to concentrate typing, had my subs this morning too so not getting full effect. So must be pretty strong. I'll smoke the other in the morning to see.
       I wanna get some of Jimmy Boyles stuff to show him. At 60 quid for a .5 its like £15 for a 'local bag' and I reckon there's some pretty good strength/value ratio going in there.
     This local stuff is decent tackle though, kind of reminds me of top notches(no choc taste though): bit dirty but strong. Getting a bit of a nod going now so best go to bed........
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: mercurny on September 30, 2013, 03:08 pm
Quote from: c63amg on September 29, 2013, 01:37 pm
Hello Everybody,

Last week we were busy with building a new environment so that we can speed up our working process and run thing smoother.
This cost us some extra time, so that’s why there are still people waiting for replies on there messages.
We´ve been working on SR for almost two years now and never took a day off only when it was necessary and when it was in the advantage for our beloved fans and customers.
We hope that everybody understands that when we are not replying fast to his or her messages or processing of an order takes longer than 24hours it´s not because we don’t want to ship or reply to your messages but it means that we are trying to figure out methods how we can work faster, built a stealthier package,  a better work environment or something else that´s going to be in the advantage of SR.
Since yesterday we took the whole day to built up our buffer again in packages so that we can ship ASAP again as usual.
We have a new C and H batch and the samples will be up tonight or on Wednesday but I will keep you enlightened.

For everybody that has an order that has not arrived please gives us till tomorrow night to reply to your message we don´t scam and all issues or matters will be sorted out as always.
 
Have a nice Sunday

c63amg - new HEROIN A QUALITY BATCH OR B QUALITY ALSO NEW?

It's a new batch of his high quality stuff, but I don't know if he's had a restock of the B quality at the same time.

I was lucky enough to get a preview sample from c63 this morning and it's very high quality, knockout stuff!

I've been in communication with him since I noticed a drop in quality in his previous restock in mid-August and he promised me a sample of his latest stuff as soon as he got it. True to his word he sent it on Friday and it arrived today. :)

I'd noticed that the previous stuff was a little darker and less fine powder than before. More mid-brown and a little gritty. The really good stuff was very fine powder, almost like dust and very pale brown. I was using it at least twice as fast as before and that was down to quality, not tolerance. I weigh my stuff every day to monitor my usage and it jumped from 150-200mg/day with the good stuff to 400-500mg/day with his August restock. Not good.

That was a huge drop in quality, did anyone else notice too? My first thought was that I'd been sold C63's B quality by mistake, but he assured me that I was sent the A quality and there was no chance of a mix-up.

Anyway, that's history now, the new stuff is amazing, back to his previous high quality if not better!

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on September 30, 2013, 11:34 pm
i dunno what was wrong with yours then but i had a few of his last batch and they were all good. really nice clean gear with nothing wrong with it.

i also had some of his B grade and its ok for the price. it does have a noticeable sugar cut which gives it that slight amber color to the beetle, and the beetle will have a stickiness to it as a result. but its smokable for sure, just don't expect the strength of his good gear, its more akin to what you find on average on the street.

Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on October 01, 2013, 08:48 am
its not unknown. i've bought two bags off a dealer on the street a few times, or been with a mate and we've got one each, and one of them have run fine and the other just frazzled up. sometimes when stepping on the gear its not all quite mixed up properly and you can get a lump of the cut clump together and get picked up and weighed off like all the other deals, but that deal ends up being nearly all cut. especially can happen if the step isn't shaken up properly and then its dampened and repressed.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on October 01, 2013, 01:32 pm
i'm pretty certain his last stuff was cut with brown caffeine powder, which is what gave it that darker than usual color. brown caffeine powder looks like this..

///***CLEARNET WARNING***\\\

http://www.alibaba.com/product-gs/737571832/100_Natural_Caffeine_Powder_Bulk.html

///***CLEARNET WARNING***\\\

recognize anything??

its actually one of the better cuts for heroin. anything you get is going to be cut with something, and if anything this is one of the cuts you'd prefer. caffeine will melt and run just like heroin and won't affect the taste. its way better than your sugar cuts or some of the other shit i've come across like violin rosin or make up foundation powder. those things will really fuck up your gear. caffeine and mannitol are usually only used by professionals who know what they're doing. so you will usually find when these cuts are used then the percentage will be kept to a minimum and the cut will be mixed in well. although that's no assurance that dealers further down the line will not have cut in anything else, but with c63s gear i could not detect anything else.

there was definitely no sugar cuts, those are easy to detect by dabbing the cool beetle and seeing if its sticky. c63s wasn't sticky in the slightest. sugar cuts are also often noticeable by tiny little frazzled dots in the residue left on the foil. this is because sugar turns to caramel when heated and small pockets of caramel in the beetle will often stick to the foil as the beetle runs off. they then just burn up and leave those tiny black dots speckled in the residue.

so yeah i had 3 lots of his last gear and although it was a little touch on the darkish side the gear tasted great, always run fine for me and was nice and strong. i can't wait to get my hands on this lighter gear that is said to be even stronger than the last. sounds awesome.
Title: Re: UK and EU H vendors discussion ( Ex TopNotch processing orders)
Post by: isallmememe on October 01, 2013, 02:15 pm
his B grade stuff has a sugar cut and is noticeably sticky when you dab it with your finger, it will stay stuck and the whole foil will be stuck to the end of your finger. if he'd cut any of that into the A grade stuff then there would be at least a slight stickiness to the beetle. i dabbed every one and there wasn't even a slight tackiness to it.

that said his B grade is still ok to smoke, not the best smoke but its still easily smokable. its ok if you're on a budget and want your gear to last longer as its half the price pretty much. a gram of that will last longer than 1/2 gram of his A grade but will obviously take longer to get the full hit. but as you said, if you are IVing then the A grade is definitely the one to go for. a lot of us who smoke like the practice of smoking in itself, so it can be nice to have £40 last two days of booting rather than just one.

Even then i just never felt quite right on them and hated not being able to get anything off gear unless i planned ahead and stopped taking them or was on a low dose. Longevity is key and therefore have to cede respect to BMR.  Sheep, if you look on redditt seems to be based in Czech rep and many flaws/lots of info revealed about servers.  This SR 2.0? Nothing will enrage the feds more than a complete copycat website.  SR is finished, make a new name/site.  They may bust this incompetent site quickly just to instil fear.  Seems far too rushed and in my experiences, when you rush things you make mistakes/ leave yurself open. 

Hope there is a new website, but it will take half a year I think.
